6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Saw farm boss cutscene
8: Fought farm boss
9: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
10: Opened forest by talking to guard

Head Priestess:
Well.

That was intense.

Head Priestess:
We have managed to remove the first of the 
three seals on the goddess's prison.

Already her power begins to flow out. Look,
it has started to rejuvenate this park.

I hear the voices of many animals crying out
in fear to the north. To undo the next seal, I
believe you will have to travel there and 
sooth them.

Bring back a remnant of the problem and we
can use its power to break the next seal.

Thank you again for your help, O wonderful
Hero!

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Head Priestess — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Oh Hero, the Goddess is already helping heal
the world! 
I'm so excited!

Let me heal your wounds before you go to
confront the evil to the north.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Head Priestess — p3
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Praise the Goddess! I sensed your defeat of
the evil to the north!

I can tell you carry its remnants with you. 
Please, give it to me so we may become one
step closer to the Goddess's awakening.

Demon... something handed over.
Still dripping.

The head priestess takes it gingerly with the
tips of two fingers, wrinkling her nose.

Head Priestess:
Well. This is certainly an interesting choice of
bits to harvest.

She steels herself, then grabs it firmly with an
audible squelch. Her hand begins to glow.

Head Priestess:
The seal is released!

Head Priestess:
Praise Florauna!

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Junior Priestess — p1
passages.content:
Junior Priestess:
I can feel the goddess's energy flow through
me!

It feels \{so good!\}

Junior Priestess:
*Looks down at herself*
Praise be to Florauna!

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Junior Priestess — p2
passages.content:
Junior Priestess:
*Looks down at herself*
Now this is why I worship the goddess. <3

Would you like to buy some equipment?

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Junior Priestess — p3
passages.content:
Brad and the junior priestess are talking.

Junior Priestess:
You have proven yourself to the Goddess,
Hero. \.\.
Step forward and gain her blessing.

It is weak for now, but every great deed you
do will make it grow. \.\.\.
In time it will be everything you desire and 
more.

He steps forward, eyes fixed firmly on her 
massive cleavage. \.
She raises her hands and rests them just
above his shoulders.

Junior Priestess:
Oh Goddess Florauna, please bless this worthy
hero.

Her hands begin to glow the soft green of 
spring leaves.\.\.
The glow spreads to cover Brad's body.

As you watch, Brad's body almost seems to 
deflate. It's odd to watch. \.
He's shrinking in all directions, but not
evenly. 

His hips, for example, are staying almost the
same. But his waist is rapidly shrinking, while
his chest is deflating more slowly. It's leaving
him with a much curvier figure than before.

This is happening all over his body. His face is
rounding inwards while his eyes and lips stay
the same, looking much bigger proportionally.

His chest is shrinking too, but his nipples are
staying in the same place, dragging two small
mounds out behind them as the rest of his
chest recedes.

It's an odd sight. It's like Brad was a balloon
blown up into the shape of a man, but hiding
a figurine of a woman inside.

Now the air is leaking out, letting the balloon
deflate to take the shape of the feminine 
structure underneath.

His clothes would be much too big for him, as
he loses inches and pounds. But they're
shrinking as well.

They lose a lot of fabric, baring a lot of the
new woman's body and clinging to her figure.

As Brad is growing smaller almost
everywhere, the priestess is growing. \.
It's almost like the mass Brad is losing is
moving to her.

But unlike Brad, she's only growing in one
place. \.\.
Her chest.

You can see the two sides of her robe start to
spread farther and farther apart as her breasts
grow too larger for even its generous size to
contain.

Finally they slip fully

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Junior Priestess — p4
passages.content:
The junior priestess smiles fondly at Brad as
you walk up.

Junior Priestess:
She's just started on her path, but she holds
such great promise.

Let me show you our equipment.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Bathroom
passages.content:
Huh. This outhouse is surprisingly
well-equipped.

You finish up and wash your hands.

Choose between the paper towels, hand
dryer, and actual towel.

Check out the vending machines.

Lounge on the couches and watch a little TV.

And finally, check yourself out in the full-
length mirror.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Bathroom

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2
passages.content:
Welcome to Garden Park!

Today is Volunteer Day. Help keep the park
running!

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Elina wondering
passages.content:
\N[2] sidles up to the priestess.

\N[2]:
Those are impressive.

*The Head Priestess hugs her enhanced
breasts and smiles widely*
In the old days many Priestesses of Florauna
would have these signs of her blessing.

As a show of her favor, she would bless them
to blossom forth more than any other mortals.

And of course, bless their back muscles as 
well.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2
passages.content:
\{        DO NOT DISTURB      

\}Sleeping Goddess

Head Priestess:
Yes, we really should have paid more
attention to that.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Witness — p1
passages.content:
Park visitor:
It's a lovely day to be in the park.

Park visitor:
Only thing that could make it better would be
a picnic.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Witness — p2
passages.content:
Park visitor:
I think I just saw a cosplayer run past into
the woods.

Park visitor:
Really good costume, too.

I didn't know there was an event going on.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Elf scene — p2
passages.content:
You hear faint moans coming from inside the
grove of trees. Take a look inside?

You peer past a tree trunk and see one of the
other players sitting against a tree. The same
player you recently saw change in the hedge
maze.

They seem... distracted.

Player SocraticMachine:
Yes... Ah! Such... versimmMMMmmilitude!

I can't believe- mmMMMMmmm! 
The sensations....

Ten out offffFFFFFFff ten!
Game of the yeeEEEEEEEAAAaaaar!

\}So good...

You back away.

passages.name: Elf houses real — p1
passages.content:
System Message:
Event loading.
Please stay out of this area.

passages.name: Elf houses real — Player Gregory — p1
passages.content:
Player SocraticMachine:
Well then.

I have retrieved the twelve Sacred Boughs,
cleansed the Holy Fount, and gotten you
an espresso.

I believe you stated you would grant me the
power of the elves in return?

Elf Priestess:
Yes brave hero!

Simply step into the magic circle and I shall
grant you all the power of the elves!

The elf priestess begins to cast.

Player SocraticMachine:
So far this is just a light show.

You watch as his hair suddenly begins to
shift color, slowly lightening to blond. His ears
begin to lengthen into points.

Player SocraticMachine:
I could see this in any game. Better quality,
too.

His hat curls itself up into a narrow hairband
as his newly blond hair begins to lengthen
and curl past his shoulders.

The rest of his clothes are following suit. The 
sleeves of his jacket pull off at the shoulders,
crawling down his arms and forming long 
gloves.

His pants split horizontally. The bottom half
shrinks down a few inches, forming long
white stockings. 

The legs of the top half merge together into a
skirt, shifting to a nice forest green as they go.

Player SocraticMachine:
Animated music notes? Really?

I can already tell that you're chanting.

And those notes were pixelated. Really, where
did your graphical budget go?

His shirt splits apart again, this time along the
top of his chest.  The top portion begins to
wrap itself around his neck, forming a long 
scarf that waves behind his now-golden hair.

The bottom portion shrinks to a narrow band 
around his chest, then begins to stretch 
outward as his chest rapidly expands into a 
generous pair of breasts.

Player SocraticMachine:
More stock effects. This had better give me an
impressive stat boost, because I am otherwise
very unimpressed.

My followers will be duly informed of all the 
flaws of your game, you may be certain.

As he speaks, his breasts continue to swell,
stretching out the front of his now-tiny shirt.

His skirt begins to grow shorter and shorter,
growing more transparent as

\C[3]Well.  I suppose this is where the
graphics budget went.

\C[3]How did they even get these effects?
I've never seen anything like this before.

\C[3]I can't wait to see where they take them

yourself.

\C[3]I have to go explore this further.

Welcome hero!  Make yourself at home.

A spectral horse is pressed up against the 
corner.

It looks terrified.

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Horse Spirit — p2

the room, taking tiny bites at the dried leaves.

It looks at you with disinterest.

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Horse Spirit — p3
passages.content:
The spectral horse looks up as soon as you
enter the room and canters over.

It starts nosing at your pockets, ghostly nose
passing without effect through your legs.

It pauses, then leaps into your inventory. You
hear crunching noises.

Great Mare acquired!
Carrot lost.

passages.name: Elf houses ARG
passages.content:
The book is written in some obscure language.
You can't read it.

Wait, is this Elvish? Like from Lord of the
Rings?

You hope no one's going to get sued over
this.

passages.name: Elf houses ARG
passages.content:
This appears to be a recipe book for potions.
Two recipes are visible, one on each page.

On the left: "For Thee Cayre Of Thee Skynne"
On the right: "For Makking Thy Muscles Swell
Wyth Vigor"

You take a quick look at both.

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Alchemy
passages.content:
Looks like a set of equipment for making
potions. Lots of weird glassware and burners.

There's a sign on the equipment:
ALCHEMISTS ONLY
WE MEAN IT

It looks like there's a little bit of ingredients
still in bowls around the equipment. Want to
try to make something?

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Elina alchemy — p1
passages.content:
\N[2]:
Have you done much alchemy? It looks like
this is a well-stocked setup.

It's not using the ingredients I'm used to, but
if you can find me a recipe then I should be
able to make something.

Make sure it's something you want. I think 
there's only enough stuff here to make one
potion.

Looks like the only thing missing from the
supplies is an apple. Fortunately we've got
one on hand.

She spends a minute tinkering with the 
equipment.

\N[2]:
There we go!
*She holds out a bubbling pink flask to you*

Your hand of course passes through the flask.
When it does, the flask bursts, flinging a mass
of pink goo right at your face.

Nothing hits you, of course. But you still feel
like a thin coating of something is on your
face. Something that won't come off no matter
how hard you rub.

Your face feels a little odd too.

\N[2]:
That's interesting. I wish I had more supplies;
I could see if it would do that again.

I've got everything here except an apple.
Something about "applying the blush of the
apple to your rosy cheeks."

Let's see if we can find one somewhere.

The only thing not here is a watermelon, the
"most vigorous of fruits".  Good thing we
have one with us.

She spends a minute tinkering with the 
equipment.

\N[2]:
There we go!

She pulls a bottle out from some sort of
funnel. As soon as its mouth is clear, it starts
putting out a thick red smoke.

\N[2]:
Don't worry, I'm pretty sure it's supposed to
do that.

You barely feel a sweet scent in the air. It's
so faint you might just be imagining it. But as
you try to see through the smoke, you do feel
a warmth in your muscles.

ATK +2!
DEF +2!

You feel a warmth in your chest as some other
things swell with vigor too.\!
Oops.

The smoke clears.

I've got everything here except a watermelon.
Says it "needs the vigor of the strongest of
fruits."

I'm happy to try later.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Dassi — p1
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Dassi:
Oh great, you're one of those gamer people.

We had people like you here before. All
they do is stomp through the plants and spook
the animals.

I don't care what the park management says,
I'm not letting you do anything until I hear 
you're not going to mess up the park.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Especially after that last guy.

Just kept muttering "could be bigger".

Creep.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Dassi — p2
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Saw farm boss cutscene
8: Fought farm boss
9: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
10: Opened forest by talking to guard

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey.

I heard you helped clean up the maze.

Thanks.

I guess you're not what I was worried about.

Sorry bout that, I'm just worried for the park.
Someone trashed the maze, and all the
animals have been real listless lately.

But I guess that ain't your fault.

Listen, I think this is the point where I'm 
supposed to send you to do a buncha
nonsense.

Those Terra Games people suggested I send
you to kill some rats. Said it was "traditional".

But really, I can't be bothered.

They said they've got a quest lined up for you
in the cow pen. If I let you in, do ya think you
can manage it without getting yourself killed?

Head Volunteer Dassi:
I'll get someone to unlock the gates for you.
Don't let the cows out.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
I gotta admire your self-awareness. Come 
back if you change your mind.

Dassi gives you a stare.

Rats may be vermin. But if you harm a single
animal on my farm, I hope you realize you're
going to find yourself at the bottom of that
well over there.

Don't try me, missy.

Don't try me, gamer-boy.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Dassi — p3
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Still scared of the cows?

Not that I'm complaining. It's a healthy
attitude to have.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
I'll get someone to unlock the gates for you.
Don't let the cows out.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Fair enough. Come back if you change your
mind.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Dassi — p4
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Got a chance to play with the cows yet?

I see you don't have any hoofprints on your
face. I recommend staying that way.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Dassi — p5
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Looks like the cows have started giving milk
again. \.
I couldn't be happier.

I'm gonna make all the volunteers milkshakes
to celebrate once we get enough.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Dassi — p7
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Thanks again for your help earlier.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Oh. It's you.

Thanks for the help, I guess. It only took two
tries.

Welcome to the farm.\!
Let me know if there's anything you need 
explained with simple words.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
*She buries her face in her hands.*
Oh. It's you.

I can't ban you from the farm, but please,
don't try to do anything complicated.

Like look at the animals too hard.\!
Maybe just don't touch anything?

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cow 1
passages.content:
An employee badge dangles from the cow's 
ear.

passages.name: Farm ARG
passages.content:
An employee badge dangles from the cow's 
ear.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Volunteer Kitty — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Kitty:
Gotta make sure everything stays stocked.

Farm Volunteer Kitty:
It takes so many trips to keep these filled.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Volunteer Kitty — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Kitty:
This is great!

I can carry so much more this way!

And maybe people will finally stop making
jokes about my name!



Farm Volunteer Kitty:
Though I should probably find a shirt that fits.

I don't think this one survived the change.

passages.name: Farm ARG — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Welcome to the farm!

Here you can get a taste of what it's like 
living in the country!

Farm Volunteer:
The last guy with those glasses said we were
"A bit quaint, but an excellent backing for the
weaving of a fantastical endeavor."

Which I'm pretty sure is good?

Farm volunteer:
Guatemalan insanity peppers?\!
I'm not sure...

When the animals got sick, all the plants
started wilting too.\!
Even if we had some planted they don't have
any peppers grown.

If only the farm was back in good condition!

passages.name: Farm ARG — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Wow, suddenly I'm finding a lot of new things
in the fields!

At least, I didn't think we planted Guatemalan
insanity peppers...

Farm Volunteer:
Oh, you need one?\!
Sure, that shouldn't be a problem!

Just be careful with it, okay? That's one of the
spiciest peppers known!

Gained one super-spicy pepper!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Dassi's a good person, she's just really
protective of the farm.

I can't blame her, after what happened to the
hedge maze.

Anyway, want to buy something? Everything's
produced here on the farm!

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I'd have more, but the orchard's closed and
the cows haven't been giving milk recently...

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Good news! The orchard's opened up and
we can sell fruit again!

Though something's still odd with the cows.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p3
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I'm so glad the cows are producing again. \.
Daisy makes the best milkshakes.

We don't have enough to sell yet, but we will
soon.

Want to buy some produce while you wait?

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p4
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Mind doing me a favor?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
I've been making milkshakes for everyone to
celebrate how much better the farm's doing.

I want to get Amelia's to her before it gets
warm, but I have to hold down the store.
Could you take it to her?

Thanks!
She's down in the orchard, shouldn't be hard
to find.

Received milkshake! Daisy's speciality.
It looks delicious.

She seems a bit taken aback.

You refuse this what? \.

Doesn't matter I guess, just come back if you
change your mind.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p5
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

You give Amelia her milkshake yet?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
You *what*?

How do you lose a milkshake?!

*Sighs*
No, I get it, you probably just drank the thing.
My fault for making them so delicious.

*She gives you a suspicious look*
But now you're full, right?
I can give you another one and it'll make it
to Amelia, right?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
I have to admit, I really don't want to leave the
store alone.

I'll give you one more chance.

\{Don't \}lose this one.

Gained another one of Daisy's milkshakes!
This one looks just as delicious as the last one.

Did you manage to get Amelia her milkshake
*this* time?

She flings up her hands.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Fine! I'll do it myself!

I guess you can't be trusted to do one simple
task!

She puts together another milkshake and
stomps angrily off to the south.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p6
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Thanks again! Amelia's gonna love this!

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Please don't lose this new milkshake. Let me
keep some of my flagging faith in humanity.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p7
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Thanks again for your help earlier.

Looking to buy anything?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Oh. It's you.

Thanks for the help, I guess. It only took two
tries.

Are you looking to buy something?
Let me know if there's anything you need 
explained with simple words.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
*She buries her face in her hands.*
Oh. It's you.

Please, just buy whatever you're looking for
and leave.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p8
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
The cows are finally making enough milk to
sell!

And we're getting fruit from the orchard again!

Everything's going so much better than
before.\!
Go ahead, take a look at our stock!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cat volunteer — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Don't tell Dassi, but I really just come here to
play with the cats.

Farm Volunteer:
Who's a good kitty. Good little kitty.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cat volunteer — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
The cats seem much more friendly now.

She pets the cat in front of her.

They- \. \^

Ow! \|
That-

Farm volunteer:
*Blinking*
That felt odd...

Oh well, this cat isn't going to pet herself!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cat volunteer — p3
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Aww, who's a good kitty.

You're a good kitty!

She stops petting the cat for a moment and
tentatively reaches up. \.
She carefully gives herself a few scratches 
around her cat ears.

Farm Volunteer:
You're such a good kitty!

Oh!\.
That's why cats like it so much!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shopkeeper Amelia — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Dassi's a good person, she's just really
protective of the farm.

I can't blame her, after what happened to the
hedge maze.

Anyway, want to buy something? Everything's
produced here on the farm!

passages.name: Farm ARG
passages.content:
AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY

\}And cows

passages.name: Farm ARG
passages.content:
AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY

See Dassi to volunteer if you want to explore
the mysteries of the storage shed.

But really, it's not that interesting.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cow disciple — p1
passages.content:
Park Visitor:
I come here to relax sometimes.

It's so calming to just sit and watch the cows
eat their clover.

Park Visitor:
Look at them, not a care in the world...

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cow disciple — p2
passages.content:
Park Visitor:
Recently...\.\.
I feel like I'm connecting with the cows so
much more.

That with just a little more contemplation,
I may understand the true Way of the Cow.

Would you like to meditate with me?

Park Visitor:
\^Focus on the cows...\|

\^Let the sight of them wash through you...\|

\^Fill your mind with thoughts of grass...\|

Park Visitor:
Return when you are ready for enlightenment.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cow disciple — p3
passages.content:
Park Visitor:
My eyes have been opened to the bovine
mysteries!

The black on white...\.\.
Or the white on black...\.\.
It symbolizes so much...

passages.name: Farm ARG — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Hay ho, hay ho, it's off to work we go.

Farm Volunteer:
Though none of the animals have been eating
much recently...

passages.name: Farm ARG — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Hay ho, hay ho, it's off to work we go.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Player Brad — p2
passages.content:
Brad is searching through the haystack with
a magnet.

Player Brad:
That's three needles. I just need two more.

Then I can get my "blessing".

Player Brad:
Who thought this was a good quest?

passages.name: Farm ARG — Horse sheep girl — p1
passages.content:
Park Visitor:
Horsehorsehorse! Here horsie! Come here
horsie!

Err, I mean, isn't it fascinating to watch the
animals?

Park Visitor:
\}Horsehorsehorse\{

If only I had some carrots...

passages.name: Farm ARG — Horse sheep girl — p2
passages.content:
Park Visitor:
You know, I've decided sheep are pretty cool
too.

Park Visitor:
Here sheepsheep, here sheepsheep.

passages.name: Farm ARG
passages.content:
Well.  Well well well.

You decide you'd better leave well enough 
alone.

passages.name: Farm ARG
passages.content:
Well.  Well well well.

You decide you'd better leave well enough 
alone.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Haystack — p1
passages.content:
It's a haystack. Known for being hard to
find things in.

You don't see anything interesting.

Your hands blur as you sort through the
haystack. \!
Hey look, a needle!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Haystack — p2
passages.content:
It's a haystack. Known for being hard to
find things in.

You don't- 

Hey, there's a needle here!
Needle +1!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Minotaur — p1
passages.content:
\N[2] bends over the body of the 
demon.

\N[2]:
This should be what the priestess needs.

She reaches down and pulls out... something.
It's just a blurry mass of censored pixels.

It's dripping.

Demon... something acquired!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p1
passages.content:
Priestess:
Thank the Goddess you're here! A terrible 
monster has awoken on the farm!

It's terrorizing the animals. And the guardian 
spirits that protect the farm have fled for their
lives.

You must find your way into the pen here and
defeat it!

And you can shut up! You're just fodder for
the hero!

You heard me.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p2
passages.content:
Priestess:
Please, destroy this evil. It's terrorizing the
animals of the farm.

Priestess:
Also, it's just a massive jerk.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p3
passages.content:
Priestess:
You defeated the monster! You should let the
head priestess know.

This will help the farm recover.

But it frightened away the animal spirits that
protect the farm.  Things won't truly be back
to normal until the four of them are found.

Please keep an eye out for them while you 
explore! They must be somewhere else in
the park.

They are:
The Cow Mother
The Great Mare
The Star Ewe

And Bubbles the Perfectly Adequate Cat.

The Cow Mother finds the sound of moving 
water very soothing. She's probably near
something that makes water move.

I have the feeling she's ready to be caught
now!

She's a very good hider though. You may
need to let some time pass for her to be
reachable.

The Great Mare should be a goat. Somehow
she keeps getting into high places.\!
We don't know how either.

She may need something to help her trust
you. She's very into food.

The Star Ewe is always getting lost. Maybe if
you found a place where it was easy to get
lost you'd be able to find her there?

And Bubbles...\!
I hope Bubbles is okay.\!
Sometimes mean fairies come by and try to
bully her!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p4
passages.content:
Priestess:
There are four animal spirits that guard this 
farm.

They are:
The Cow Mother
The Great Mare
The Star Ewe

And Bubbles the Perfectly Adequate Cat.

The Cow Mother has returned to bless us with
her bounty once again.

The cows' udders still run dry for want of the
Cow Mother.

She finds the sound of moving water very 
soothing. She's probably near something that 
makes water move.

I have the feeling she's ready to be caught
now!

She's a very good hider though. You may
need to let some time pass for her to be
reachable.

The Great Mare runs freely through the fields
again.

The horses still cry out for the Great Mare.

She's practically a goat. Somehow she keeps 
getting into high places.\!
We don't know how either.

She may need something to help her trust
you. She's very into food.

The Star Ewe leads the sheep once more.

The sheep still wander alone without the light
of the Star Ewe.

The Star Ewe is always getting lost. Maybe if
you found a place where it was easy to get
lost you'd be able to find her there?

And Bubbles is back and just the cutest. Who's
a cute little kitty face? You are!

And Bubbles is still lost. What a silly kitty!

I hope she's okay.\!
Sometimes mean fairies come by and try to
bully her!

Priestess:
You've found all the animal spirits!
Thank you \N[10]!

I can feel their power flowing through the farm
again!

Everything will be much better now. Thank
you again!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p5
passages.content:
Priestess:
The farm is running so much better now that
you've fixed all our problems!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Paddock gate — p1
passages.content: Locked.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Paddock gate — p2
passages.content: You open the gate.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Paddock gate — p3
passages.content: You close the gate.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Paddock gate — p1
passages.content: Locked.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Paddock gate — p2
passages.content: You open the gate.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Paddock gate — p3
passages.content: You close the gate.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Bubbles — p2
passages.content:
This is the most adequate cat you've ever
seen. \.

It's staggering.

Shrine Maiden:
Awwww, you're such an okay kitty!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p2
passages.content:
You enter the farm to find the animal control
head sprawled on the ground, covered in hoof
marks.

Animal Control Boss:
Ugh...\!
No fair!

Something happened again? Does that mean-

Ah.\. Yes it does.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oh nyo! \n[10]!\!
These brave warriors, wounded again!

Sometimes the pursuit of lovely justice
requires so much pain.\!
But not while we're here, nya!

She turns to you.

Pursuant to our early agreement, I'm enlisting
your help to heal these brave warriors!

\n[4]:
Hmm...

She pulls out a thick sheaf of notes and looks
through them.

\n[4]:
Okay, I'll allow it.\!
No further payments in either direction, though.

Lovely Warrior of Love and Justice:
Great!\!
Now, remember the dance!

She leads you through it again, jiggling and
shaking.\!
Though she's slowed down a lot by the end.

Thankfully the animal control boss is too 
distracted to notice, though Daisy is giving
you some weird looks.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Magical Lovely *pant* Love Power!

She throws out her hands, then sits down
breathing heavily.

You follow.\!
A wave of power washes out of you.

...And then sputters and dies.\!
At least it got far enough to touch the animal
control boss.



Her wounds once more fade away in front of
your eyes.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oh,\. uh,\. *pant* this is embarrassing, nya.

She takes a moment to try to catch her breath.

\}I knew I should have practiced more...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I *pant* can't do another one of those for a
while, but these warriors still need our help...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I knyow!\!
\n[10]!

I see you already possess the power of
healing!\!
If I just...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Nyo, not quite...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Just a little more...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
There!

Potion skill upgraded!

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Nyow you just need to use that on the poor
warriors!

I can sense four of them across the farm,

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p4
passages.content:
Great Mare leapt out of your inventory and
galloped out into the farm!

You see a wave of light wash over the farm
as the Great Mare's power returns.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p5
passages.content:
The Star Ewe ambles out of your inventory.

The farm sparkles for a moment as its power
returns.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p6
passages.content:
The Cow Mother walks out of your inventory.

She pauses for a moment in front of you, as
if in thanks.

The farm sparkles for a moment as its power
returns.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p7
passages.content:
Bubbles jumps down from your inventory.

Then settles down for a nice nap.

Shrine Maiden:
\{Bubbles!

You hear the shrine maiden's voice fade off 
into the distance.

Shrine Maiden:
Who's a good \}kitty? You're a good kitty! Such
a \}good kitty!

The farm sparkles for a moment as Bubble's 
power returns.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Meditation — p2
passages.content:
As your mind calms, it begins to fill with
visions of grass.

Days spent in silent contemplation of your
next bite.

Nights spent pondering the deep mysteries
of milk and field.

You feel that your connection to the great
spirit of the cow has deepened.

While you meditate on your insights, a light
begins to wash over your mentor.

Park Visitor:
Yes!\.\. I feel it!\.\.\.
I feel the cowsmos!

Park Visitor:
I can see your mind is not yet clear enough
to focus on enlightenment.

Please return when you are ready to give it
another try.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Carol — p1
passages.content:
Carol:
-But there aren't enough beezzz around to 
pollenate an entire orchard, when all the
treezzz are blooming at once.

So there are apiarizztzz who truck hivezz and
hivezz full of beezz across the country, from
blooming zzeazzon to blooming zzeazzon, to 
help grow all the fruitzz and everyzzzing.

She pauses.

Carol:
Uh, thizzz izzn't, um, boring you or 
zzomething, right?

Honey smiles and slips her hand into Carol's.

Honey:
No!\.\.
This is great!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Carol — p2
passages.content:
Carol:
One of the bee truckzz crashed once.\.\.
The beezz did *not* like zzat.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Honey — p1
passages.content:
Carol:
-But there aren't enough beezzz around to 
pollenate an entire orchard, when all the
treezzz are blooming at once.

So there are apiarizztzz who truck hivezz and
hivezz full of beezz across the country, from
blooming zzeazzon to blooming zzeazzon, to 
help grow all the fruitzz and everyzzzing.

She pauses.

Carol:
Uh, I'm not, um, boring you or anything,
right?

Honey smiles and slips her hand into Carol's.

Honey:
No!\.\.
This is great!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Honey — p2
passages.content:
Honey:
Wow!\!
She knows so much!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Catnip catgirl
passages.content:
She's too busy rubbing her face against the
plants to talk.

...\!
You get the feeling the plant she's rolling 
around in is probably catnip.

Catnip acquired!

She's too busy rubbing her face against the
catnip to talk.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Catnip catgirl
passages.content:
She's completely passed out in the middle of
the plants.\!
Every so often she moves a bit to rub her
face against them.

...\!
You get the feeling the plant she's sleeping 
in is probably catnip.

Catnip acquired!

She's completely passed out in the middle of
the catnip field.\!
Every so often she moves a bit to rub her
face against the plants.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Catnip catgirl
passages.content:
Catgirl:
Hey...\!
Hey...

Catgirl:
...How is life so great?

...\!
You get the feeling the plant she's rolling 
around in is probably catnip.

Catnip acquired!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
The animal control person is lying sprawled
out on the catnip.

Animal Control:
.\..\..\.Ugh.\!
What a day.\!
Makes me want to just take a nap.

He sniffs the catnip.

Animal Control:
Smells nice here, at least.

A soft glow appears around him, and he
almost melts into it.

Animal Control:
Mmmm\..\..\..
Warm\..\..\..

Small sparks of light drift up from the catnip,
floating through the aura and into him.

He shifts around as he shrinks, moving into
a more comfortable position for his smaller
body.

His pants flop off, having grown much too 
large to be comfortable.\!
His dress shirt flops off a slim shoulder, even
as it pulls tight against new cleavage.

She gives an especially huge yawn, stretching
so hard that cat ears pop out of her head and
a tail from her back.

Animal Control:
Yeah, I think I'll just take a nap here.\!
It just smells so nice...

She settles back down to the ground.

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the 
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Yeah?

She yawns.

Actually, can it wait?

She nestles back down into the catnip without
waiting for an answer.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cow 1
passages.content:
An employee badge dangles from the cow's 
ear.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Lovely Spirit — p1
passages.content:
Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oof.\!
That really takes it out of me, nya.

You've got \v[23] more warriors to heal, nya!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Lovely Spirit — p2
passages.content:
Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I hope they don't need much more healing.\!
Even justice can get a little tired...

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
A cow is repeatedly nudging a bruise on
this man's side.

Animal Control:
Ow.

Animal Control:
Ow.

Animal Control:
Ow.

Animal Control:
Stop.

Animal Control:
That.

A soft glow envelops him. His scratches and 
bruises slowly start to fade.

And then the cow nudges him again.\!
You see something flash into the aura, sinking
into it like paper dropped into water.

Another nudge, and you can see his form 
softening and rounding.

Hair bursts out around a pair of swelling horns,
falling long and flowing to his thighs.

His uniform shrinks as his chest swells,
pushing out into two soft breasts.

Then grows again.

And again.

Only a few strips of cloth remain, struggling
to contain their massive chest and a plush 
and rounded ass.

The last of her injuries vanish, leaving soft
and unbroken skin, as a pair of bovine ears
flop out of her scalp.

The cow gives her a lick, contented.

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the 
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
The animal control officer is trying to ward
off an overly affectionate cow.\!
She keeps pushing it back as it tries to give
her big enthusiastic licks.

Animal Control:
Back, back!\!
I think I preferred the headbutts!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Ugh...\!
I'm covered in horse spit...

He tries to wring some water out of his shirt.

A soft pink glow covers him, scratches and
bruises begining to visibly fade.

Then suddenly the glow turns brown, wicking
up the color from the trough he's sitting in.

His ears twitch, then begin to slowly elongate,
turning brown and pointed.

He puts a hand up to his head in surprise as
his hair suddenly drops into freefall, dragging
longer and longer tresses behind it as it plunges
to float on the surface of the trough.

Another hand goes to his chest as his uniform
simply crumbles away. A bit of dust lingers on
his fingertips, before swirling away on the
breeze.

And then that hand starts to move as soft
bumps swell underneath it.\!
Then grow.\!
And grow.

Until his- her arm is supporting mounds twice
the side of her head or larger, as a
blush spreads across her face.

Animal Control:
-What?

And then she stands up.\!
The trough was hiding a lot, as her lower
body appears like a submarine surfacing.

Animal Control:
...I don't suppose you saw where my shirt
went?

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the 
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control:
This is fine.\!
Everything is fine.

It's rare for us to deal with horses, but we
covered it in training.

I just hope the boss doesn't consider this
fraternizing with the enemy.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Doggirl farmer
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Man, ever since I had some of that cinnamon
tea at the new shelter cafe I've really been
wanting to get out in the fields.

Her tail wags eagerly.

I hope there's a lot of digging to do!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
The animal control officer has carved a furrow
when landing, leaving them completely
covered in shredded lettuce.

Animal Control:
Ugh, what is this rabbit food?

A soft yellow glow springs up around the 
animal control officer, as their wounds begin
to heal.

Green suddenly spreads out of the lettuce, 
swiftly dying the whole aura.

Two long floppy ears spring out of the man's 
head.

And the rest of his body shifts as well.

She fingers one of her new ears.

Animal Control:
Ugh, I knew I hated lettuce for a good reason.

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the 
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control:
I'd better still be able to eat a goddamn steak.

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal Control Boss — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control Boss:
They've vanished, but we'll run them to 
ground soon enough.

No feral animal can escape me and my men!

passages.name: Farm ARG — Catnip 4
passages.content:
Catgirl:
Whoa.\..\..\..\..

She stares at you dazedly, *incredibly* high.

Catgirl:
You've got, like...\!
A face...

She continues staring at you.

A hat?

You... You can call me Honey...

\C[20]Honey:
Do... Do you think I could try some of your

Lily and Rose trade glances.  And smiles.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:

\C[30]But I think the answer is going to be
yes.

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3 — Orchard guard — p1
passages.content:
Sorry, the orchard is currently closed.

We're- \^

He pauses and looks around.

Do you smell that?

His eyes widen, then widen further, 
growing larger and larger in his face.

His irises shift to a bright gold, then
begin to grow as well, flooding his larger 
eyes with a uniform color.

He gives a quick shake to his head. When
he raises it again, his moustache has 
completely vanished. A second time, and
his hair has grown shoulder length.

A third, and you see the roots grow pale
green and then flood out to color the rest of 
his hair.

He winces, and with an almost audible
*pop* you see two long thin antenna 
leap out of his forehead.

Whoa… \C[6]suddenly fee\C[17]ling dizzy…

He puts out a hand for support to the
nearby tree, not noticing it slim down as
he reaches. He also doesn’t notice it turn
pale orange, or the thin layer of chitin.

Another moment, and he reaches out
another hand for more support. One of
the pair that’s just sprouted from his
shoulders.

He rubs his eyes with the top arm on the
other side. It looks like something is 
bugging him but he can’t put any of his
new abundance of fingers on it.

\C[17]Something \C[14]feels \C[21]strange…

He doesn’t seem to notice his voice
shifting pitch to a more feminine
register.

You can tell something is going on with
his body, but it’s hidden beneath his 
clothes.

Until his clothes suddenly start shrinking
down into a tiny top and some tight 
black shorts, revealing his new slim
feminine body.

Slim, but with a nice pair of breasts.
Though next to the priestesses they look
like nothing.

\C[21]Something really \C[20]itches…

The newly-formed woman reaches over
 her head with her top pair of arms and
 starts scratching frantically at her back. 

With surprising speed, butterfly wings
burst from her back, growing until
each one is nearly as large as her body.

She gives them an experimental flap,
actually lifting her a few inches off the 
ground for a moment.

\C[20]I’m… feeling better?

She does another l

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Junior Priestess — p1
passages.content:
Brad and the junior priestess are talking.

Junior Priestess:
You have proven yourself to the Goddess,
Hero. \.\.
Step forward and gain her blessing.

It is weak for now, but every great deed you
do will make it grow. \.\.\.
In time it will be everything you desire and 
more.

He steps forward, eyes fixed firmly on her 
massive cleavage. \.
She raises her hands and rests them just
above his shoulders.

Junior Priestess:
Oh Goddess Florauna, please bless this worthy
hero.

Her hands begin to glow the soft green of 
spring leaves.\.\.
The glow spreads to cover Brad's body.

As you watch, Brad's body almost seems to 
deflate. It's odd to watch. \.
He's shrinking in all directions, but not
evenly. 

His hips, for example, are staying almost the
same. But his waist is rapidly shrinking, while
his chest is deflating more slowly. It's leaving
him with a much curvier figure than before.

This is happening all over his body. His face is
rounding inwards while his eyes and lips stay
the same, looking much bigger proportionally.

His chest is shrinking too, but his nipples are
staying in the same place, dragging two small
mounds out behind them as the rest of his
chest recedes.

It's an odd sight. It's like Brad was a balloon
blown up into the shape of a man, but hiding
a figurine of a woman inside.

Now the air is leaking out, letting the balloon
deflate to take the shape of the feminine 
structure underneath.

His clothes would be much too big for him, as
he loses inches and pounds. But they're
shrinking as well.

They lose a lot of fabric, baring a lot of the
new woman's body and clinging to her figure.

As Brad is growing smaller almost
everywhere, the priestess is growing. \.
It's almost like the mass Brad is losing is
moving to her.

But unlike Brad, she's only growing in one
place. \.\.
Her chest.

You can see the two sides of her robe start to
spread farther and farther apart as her breasts
grow too larger for even its generous size to
contain.

Finally they slip fully

Head Priestess:
A monster is growing in the west, one fierce

Once the goddess is freed, I should finally

Head Priestess:
Before you go, let me heal your wounds.

 starts scratching frantically at her back. 

With surprising speed, butterfly wings
burst from her back, growing until
each one is nearly as large as her body.

She gives them an experimental flap,
actually lifting her a few inches off the 
ground for a moment.

\C[20]I’m… feeling better?

She does anoth

passages.content:
Orchard Guard(?):
\C[20]Hey, do you smell that?

\C[20]Something smells *amazing*.

\C[20]I think it's coming from over there...

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Exit 1
passages.content:
You see the bus just pulling up.

Where would you like to go?

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Exit 1
passages.content:
You see the bus just pulling up.

Where would you like to go?

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Player Brad quest turn-in — p1
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Time to get a blessing, if you know what I
mean.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Player Brad quest turn-in — p2
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Did you see that? I got to stare at her tits the
whole time!

And she's barely even covering them now!

You both spend a moment staring. \.
The priestess smiles at you when she notices.

She glances down at her chest.

Player Brad:
With these tiny things? I *barely* count as
female.

She goes back to staring at the priestess.

Player Brad:
Now, *she's* a real woman.

She glances over at your chest.

Player Brad:
I see you're making a start on that yourself.
Nice.

passages.content:
Huh. This outhouse is surprisingly
well-equipped.

You finish up and wash your hands.

Choose between the paper towels, hand
dryer, and actual towel.

Check out the vending machines.

Lounge on the couches and watch a little TV.

And finally, check yourself out in the full-
length mirror.

passages.content:
Welcome to Garden Park!

Today is Volunteer Day. Help keep the park
running!

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Witness — p1
passages.content:
Park visitor:
It's a lovely day to be in the park.

Park visitor:
Only thing that could make it better would be
a picnic.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Witness — p2
passages.content:
Park visitor:
I think I just saw a cosplayer run past into
the woods.

Park visitor:
Really good costume, too.

I didn't know there was an event going on.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Elf scene — p2
passages.content:
You hear faint moans coming from inside the
grove of trees. Take a look inside?

You peer past a tree trunk and see one of the
other players sitting against a tree. The same
player you recently saw change in the hedge
maze.

They seem... distracted.

Player Gregory:
Yes... Ah! Such... versimmMMMmmilitude!

I can't believe- mmMMMMmmm! 
The sensations....

Ten out offffFFFFFFff ten!
Game of the yeeEEEEEEEAAAaaaar!

\}So good...

You back away.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Elina wondering
passages.content:
\N[2]:
It's amazing how much these plants are
regrowing.

\N[2]:
Florauna is just as powerful as I've heard.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Butterfly — p2
passages.content:
You see the butterfly girl hovering nervously
in front of Rose and Lily.

\C[20]Orchard Guard(?):
You... you smell amazing...

She blushes.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Aww, thank you.
\C[5]You're pretty cute yourself!

\C[30]I'm Rose.
\C[5]And I'm Lily!
\C[30]What's your name?
\C[5]I don't think we've seen you around.

\C[20]Honey:
You... You can call me Honey...

Honey is casting shy glances at the pool of 
nectar the two flower girls are standing in.

\C[20]Honey:
Do... Do you think I could try some of your
nectar?

\C[20]It just smells so wonderful. You smell 
so wonderful.

Lily and Rose trade glances.  And smiles.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]I think we'd love to share it with you.
\C[5]We have some people to check with 
first!

\C[30]But I think the answer is going to be
yes.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Orchard exit — p1
passages.content:
Sorry, the orchard is currently closed.

We're- \^

He pauses and looks around.

Do you smell that?

His eyes widen, then widen further, 
growing larger and larger in his face.

His irises shift to a bright gold, then
begin to grow as well, flooding his larger 
eyes with a uniform color.

He gives a quick shake to his head. When
he raises it again, his moustache has 
completely vanished. A second time, and
his hair has grown shoulder length.

A third, and you see the roots grow pale
green and then flood out to color the rest of 
his hair.

He winces, and with an almost audible
*pop* you see two long thin antenna 
leap out of his forehead.

Whoa… \C[6]suddenly fee\C[17]ling dizzy…

He puts out a hand for support to the
nearby tree, not noticing it slim down as
he reaches. He also doesn’t notice it turn
pale orange, or the thin layer of chitin.

Another moment, and he reaches out
another hand for more support. One of
the pair that’s just sprouted from his
shoulders.

He rubs his eyes with the top arm on the
other side. It looks like something is 
bugging him but he can’t put any of his
new abundance of fingers on it.

\C[17]Something \C[14]feels \C[21]strange…

He doesn’t seem to notice his voice
shifting pitch to a more feminine
register.

You can tell something is going on with
his body, but it’s hidden beneath his 
clothes.

Until his clothes suddenly start shrinking
down into a tiny top and some tight 
black shorts, revealing his new slim
feminine body.

Slim, but with a nice pair of breasts.
Though next to the priestesses they look
like nothing.

\C[21]Something really \C[20]itches…

The newly-formed woman reaches over
 her head with her top pair of arms and
 starts scratching frantically at her back. 

With surprising speed, butterfly wings
burst from her back, growing until
each one is nearly as large as her body.

She gives them an experimental flap,
actually lifting her a few inches off the 
ground for a moment.

\C[20]I’m… feeling better?

She does another l

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Orchard exit — p2
passages.content:
Orchard Guard(?):
\C[20]Hey, do you smell that?

\C[20]Something smells *amazing*.

\C[20]I think it's coming from over there...

passages.name: Orchards real — Beehive — p1
passages.content:
An agitated beehive. An orb made of buzz
and rage.

It does not want to be your friend.

passages.name: Orchards real — Beehive — p2
passages.content:
The hive is surrounded by a swarm of angry
bees, wildly whirling around as it looks for
something to attack.

You carefully creep closer.

An increase in the buzzing suggests that bees
aren't really something you can sneak up on.

Look, bee brains are tiny. Who knows better
whether you're sneaking, you or some bug
that spends its life having sex with flowers?

Secure in your intellectual superiority, you
creep closer to the hive.

The enormous horde of bees flying straight
for your face suggests that you miscalculated.

You run for your life.

Hmph. They probably just got lucky.

Oh crap! Ohcrapohcrapohcrap!

You dive forward and throw the Bee Blanket
over the hive.  Then huddle on the ground
hiding your face with your arms. 

The sound of the swarm increases to a roar.

You can feel the wind from a million tiny wings
as it prepares to swoop upon you.

Then slowly
\.slowly...
\|ever so slowly...

It quiets.

You feel gentle impacts all over your body as
the bees slide from the air.  But no stings.

A soft sound of gentle buzzy snoring whispers
from a million insects.

A few bees have even slid into your pockets
as they fell asleep.

Bees acquired?!

Yeah! You're pretty sure there was a movie
about that!

You think it also said that... bees can open
doors.  So you'd better keep that in mind.

Apparently the bees have not watched the
same movie.

You break and run screaming as the swarm
charges straight at you.

passages.name: Orchards real — Beehive — p3
passages.content:
The bees are still sleeping peacefully.

You decide waking them up would be a 
*really* bad idea.

passages.name: Orchards real — Starting cutscene — p1
passages.content:
Park Volunteer TJ:
You're not supposed to be here.

I should call the police on you, but I'll be nice.

I'm supposed to be collecting all the possibly-
infected fruit. But the orchard's full of bugs.

There's no way I'm going in there, so you have
the chance to do me a favor. Bring me fruit
and I won't call the police on you.

Let's say four apples to start. If you can't find
them on the ground, you can always shake
the trees to knock some down.

Go on, get in there.

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard guard — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer TJ:
Do you have four apples for me yet?

He takes the apples.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Good job. If you'll just do a little more for me
I'll let you out.

This time, bring me four grapefruit.
Remember you can shake the trees to collect
them.

And there better not be bugs on them.

Park Volunteer TJ:
I said *four* apples! This isn't enough!

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

He takes the apples.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Good job. If you'll just do a little more for me
I'll let you out.

This time, bring me four grapefruit.
Remember you can shake the trees to collect
them.

And there better not be bugs on them.

Park Volunteer TJ:
I said *four* apples! This isn't enough!

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Do you have four grapefruit for me yet?

He takes the fruit.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Good job. If you'll just do a little more for me
I'll let you out.

This time, bring me four apples.
Remember you can shake the trees to collect
them.

Park Volunteer TJ:
I said *four* grapefruit! This isn't enough!

You pull out a big handful of drowsy bees and
drop them into his hands.

The movement seems to wake them up.

Judging from the buzzing, they don't like what
they see.

Park Volunteer TJ:
These are bees!

Why do you have bees? \.
*How* do you have bees?!

Park Volunteer TJ:
\{AAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!

You hear yells and screams coming from 
farther in the orchard as the cloud of angry
bees and TJ vanish inside.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

He takes the fruit.

Park Volunteer TJ:

And there better not be bugs on them.

I said *four* grapefruit! This isn't enough!

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

passages.name: Orchards real — Dying tree — p1
passages.content:
This tree isn't doing well.  The leaves are
brown and slowly dying.

You pour one out for the tree. \!

A potion, that is.

Green starts spreading through the dying
leaves, while new buds begin to sprout from
the branches.

A shining gem falls from the newly revived
branches into your inventory.

Raw mana +1!

passages.name: Orchards real — Dying tree — p2
passages.content: The tree is looking much better now.

passages.name: Orchards real — Dying tree — p1

passages.name: Orchards real — Dying tree — p2
passages.content: The tree is looking much better now.

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard person 2 — p1
passages.content:
I've brought that guy a ton of fruit and he's
still not letting me out.

I don't know if he's ever going to.

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard person 2 — p2
passages.content:
Hah, that jerk got what he deserved!

You should have seen him run past.

Two of those bees got me too, but it was
worth it!

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard person 2 — p3
passages.content:
The slim man looks frightened.

Park Volunteer:
I thought I was okay when those bees stung
me, but now I think I'm having a reaction!

People die from bee stings!\. I don't want to die!

I think I'm swelling up. Does it feel like I'm 
swelling up?

He grabs your hands and places them flat 
against the front of his chest.

You can definitely feel something. \.\.

Feels like\| two little nubs, one on each side?\.
He gives a little gasp at the feel of your hands.

Oh, they're sensitive!\.

That's bad,that's probably bad.

You can feel the tiny nubs swelling larger and
larger under your hands.\|
Two little peaks of flesh. What else could those
be?

Soon they're big enough they'd be clearly
visible through his shirt, if you weren't covering
them.

They're still swelling! And tender! That can't
be good!

Yet he doesn't pull himself away. Almost the
opposite.\.\.
He keeps pushing into your hands, dragging 
those two bumps across your palms.

You notice him giving a little gasp every time
he does.

And now I'm starting to feel warm all over!\.
Is this the end?!

He does look very flushed. And...\.\.
Is he shrinking?\|
He is shrinking!

Just a little, but you can see him getting 
more petite as he continues to thrust himself
against your hands.

His waist is slimming too, while his hips seem
to be widening. And his face is definitely
starting to soften.

Oh!

He gasps, biting thickening lips.

I'm feeling so\. *pant*\. warm! I'm \.*gasp*\.
burning up!

His breath is coming in faster and faster
gasps, hovering on the edge of moans. \.
And rising in pitch with each one.

\C[5]Oh *gasp* no! \. I'm starting to *moan* have
trouble breathing!

At this point you can't really call him a "him"
anymore. 

Her face has softened into complete
femininity, her body has shifted into a slight
hourglass, and her hair is starting to curl down 
around her face.

\C[5]*Mmmm!*\| Call an *moan*\.\.\. ambulance!\.
The *oh!*\| swelling isn't *ah!*\| stopping!

You can feel her chest starting to sof

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard person 2 — p4
passages.content:
She looks up at you, one hand still buried in
her pants and the other gently squeezing her
breast.

\C[5]Thank you\.\. thank you for the help.\|

I don't think I'll need that ambulance.

passages.name: Orchards real — Bystander 1 — p1
passages.content: No really, I'm supposed to be here!

passages.name: Orchards real — Bystander 1 — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer:
Ow, one of those bees stung me!

Park Volunteer:
At least I should finally be able to do my job
with that jerk gone.

passages.name: Orchards real — Bystander 1 — p3
passages.content:
Park Volunteer:
It looks like the orchard is finally getting back
to normal!

It looks like we might be able to start picking
fruit again soon. Check the farm stand to buy
it!

She rubs her side.

Park Volunteer:
If only this bee sting would stop hurting.

passages.name: Orchards real — Shadow the cat — p1
passages.content:
There's a cat lying here.

Its collar says "Shadow".

You hear a shout from the entrance.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Tell that cat to stop slacking and start working!

passages.name: Orchards real — Shadow the cat — p2
passages.content:
There's a cat lying here.

Its collar says "Shadow".

It's sleeping peacefully.

passages.name: Orchards real — Bees 2 — p1
passages.content:
So many bees!  Why?!

Before you can react, they fly straight at your
face.

It...\. doesn't actually hurt very much?\|

But your face feels weird and swollen.

passages.name: Orchards real — Bees 3 — p1
passages.content:
Bees! Angry bees! Angry bees everywhere!

You shield your face and hope for the best.

They fly in and sting you on the chest.

It...\. doesn't actually hurt very much?\|

Though your chest feels warm and swollen.

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p1
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Speaking as a professional beeologist,
something's gotten the bees up there real
angry.

Fortunately, I have this specially prepared bee
wrap. It's full of all sorts of calming bee 
pheremones.

All we need is someone to run up and wrap
the hive in this, and it should put the bees
right to sleep.

Park Volunteer Carol:
Great! Let me know how it goes!

Uh, unless you're going to come back chased
by a giant swarm of bees.

Not that that's going to happen. Perfectly safe!
\|
But still, no need to come back.

Acquired Bee Blanket! \.

It smells like honey and slumber.

Park Volunteer Carol:
Well what else are you going to do? Get more
fruit for that idiot at the entrance?

At least this is different.

\}And surely even he wouldn't keep us from
calling an ambulance...

\N[2]:
That weird person at the entrance does seem
to dislike bugs...

Maybe this is an opportunity to acquire some?

And I want to see how the bee blanket
works...

Park Volunteer Carol:
I'll have you know I'm the park's leading
beetician.

Beeicist.

Bee-science-person.

Look, this is almost certainly probably going
to work.  How about it?

\N[2]:
That weird man at the entrance does seem to
dislike bugs...

I don't think we're going to get a better chance
to get some than a plan made by a certified 
beeologist.

Park Volunteer Carol:
Remember, you can either try to keep
pleasing that idiot at the front, or you can go
for plan Bee.

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Good luck! 

Not that you need it.

I'm sure bee stings are just psychosomatic.

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p3
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Holy crap, you're still alive?!\.
And the bees are calm?!

I mean, uh, just as expected!

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p4
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Hah! Not a single sting from that swarm!
Beestrology wins again!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Though I have to admit that I'm not a fully
trained Beeologist yet.

That takes a PhD and all I've got is a BeeA.

passages.name: Orchards real — Bees 1 — p1
passages.content:
Aaaah! Bees!

You try to run, but they follow and sting you
all over your butt.

It quickly stops hurting, but it feels swollen.

passages.name: Orchards real — Goggles tree — p1
passages.content:
You look up at the tree. 

Something is gleaming up in the top branches.

You could probably knock it down by shaking
the tree, but the branches also hold a ton of
fruit. And the fruit looks angry.

Shake the tree?

Fruit rains down on your head!

A pair of goggles plummets out of the tree in
front of you.  They look big enough to fit over
your glasses.

Better to leave it alone.

passages.name: Orchards real — Goggles tree — p2
passages.content: The tree is empty now.

passages.name: Orchards real — Goggles tree — p1
passages.content:
You look up at the tree. 

Something is gleaming up in the top branches.

You could probably knock it down by shaking
the tree, but the branches also hold a ton of
fruit. And the fruit looks angry.

Shake the tree?

Fruit rains down on your head!

A pair of goggles plummets out of the tree in
front of you.  They look big enough to fit over
your glasses.

Better to leave it alone.

passages.name: Orchards real — Goggles tree — p2
passages.content: The tree is empty now.

passages.content:

Thizzz izzz all your fault.

She pouts.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Where am I even supposed to find clothezz?
No one makes shirtzz for four armzz and thizz
zztinger thing!

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard guard version bee — p3
passages.content:

Pleazze tell thizz idiot to shut up.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Or I'm going to figure out how to uzze thizz
zztinger.

How izzz she enjoying thizzz?!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Beecause itzzz amazzzzzzzing!

Hey hey, I'm going to do a dance! Try to

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist interviewing — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
What are you- go away!

Park Volunteer Carol:
But I've never met a bee I could interview 
before!

You have to answer my questions! It's for
science!

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
I zzzaid no!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Come on, just a few questions.

\^What dances do you know?\.
Can you talk to normal bees?\.
On a scale of 1-10, how much do you want to
have sex with flowers?\.

\^Are you fertile?
Do you have a queen?
Do you want a queen?
Where does your honey come out of?\.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
*Glares*
I am going to zzzting you zzzooo hard.

1: saw intro conversation
2: Beeologist has transformed

I'm not anzzering quezzztions!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Come on, it's for science! Bee science!

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
*Glares*
I am going to zzzting you zzzooo hard.

This is amazzzing!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Hey hey, want to go shove our faces in zzome

It'll bee amazzzing!

How did thizzz make you even worse?!

Carol:
Now thezzze are quality flowerzz!

passages.name: Orchards real — Honey and Carol intro — p2
passages.content:
Honey:
I never knew flowers could be this amazing!

You hear a voice off in the distance.

DID ZZZOMEONE MENTION FLOWERZZZ?!

Carol:
Who izz it?! Who'zzz zzhe flower lover?!

Honey:
...Me?

Carol:
I love flowerzzz! They're zzzo pretty and they
smell zzzo great and-
Want to zzzee my favorite flower?

Honey:
Yeah!

Carol:
They're zzzo good! You'll love them!
They're over here!

Carol:
Thozze flowerzzz are nice, \}but not the bezzt. 
A bit insipid...

passages.name: Orchards real — D2 Honey after — p2
passages.content:
Honey buries her face in the flowers and takes
a deep breath.

Her face is mostly hidden by the flowers, but
you think you see her unusually long tongue 
lick up some nectar.

Honey:
These really are the best!

passages.name: Orchards real — Shopkeeper Amelia — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I heard the orchard was having problems,
but it looks like it completely recovered!

There's no problem with selling fruit now!

She doesn't seem to have noticed the
milkshake you're holding.

Give it to her?

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Is that one of Daisy's milkshakes?

Thank you!
She said she was going to send me one, but
I wasn't sure when I would get it.

She takes a deep drink and licks off the 
milkshake moustache.

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Mmm, no one makes milkshakes like Daisy.

She takes another drink, and another. \.\.
You watch as she works her way through the
whole shake. \|
Nothing happens?

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I always tell myself I'm not going to drink
it that quickly, but it's just too good to stop.

Though-- *She hiccups*

Oh no, this always-\.\^

She hiccups again. With an almost audible 
*pop*, a pair of black-and-white spotted ears
spring out of the sides of her head.

This *hic*\. is *hic*\. why *hic*\. I should
*hic*\. go slower!

A horn pops out of the left side of her head
with the first hiccup, then the right horn follows
on the second.

After the third the tip of a tail sticks out of the
back of her pants. With the fourth, it flops out
to swing freely behind her.

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I... \|
I always forget that?\|
They stopped!

She gives a contented sigh and licks the last
bit of milkshake off her lips.

Still, it's so worth it.

You keep the milkshake for now.

passages.name: Orchards real — Shopkeeper Amelia — p3
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Thanks again for delivering my milkshake!

I can't wait until the next time Daisy makes
them.

passages.name: Orchards real — Shopkeeper Amelia — p4
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Daisy makes the best milkshakes!\.\.
Though I'm surprised she left the stand to
deliver it.

passages.name: Orchards real — Darren — p1
passages.content:
The man on the left is staring worriedly into
his drink.

Man:
I'm just worried that it'll all turn out wrong.

The other man reaches out and grabs his hand
reassuringly.

Other man:
Kyle. Kyle. It'll be fine.

We've both talked to them about joining our
relationships before. It'll all work out.

Kyle:
But Lily has never been up for it before.

Other Man:
And so we gave them space. But now Rose 
and Lily have both said they want to discuss
it.

Kyle:
Darren, that's why everything has to go right!
If this is a chance for us all to join together,
it needs to go perfectly.

And that's not happening with the store
closed.

Darren:
Look, you know that Rose and Lily care for
each other, right?

Kyle:
Yes...

Darren:
And they both care about both of us?

Kyle:
Yes...

Darren:
That's what's needed. That's the important
part.

We'll be able to work out the rest somehow,
if we're all trying.  Whatever form that takes.

Look, it's just a power outage. Soon the
store's going to open back up.

And then we're going to go back in there and
get them something that shows just how
valuable they are to us.

It'll be fine.

Kyle stares into his drink again. But he does
seem less worried.

passages.name: Orchards real — Quadruple scene — p1
passages.content:
You see Kyle and Darren behind the barn.

Kyle is sitting on a stump while Darren is
crouched down, examining her leg.

Darren:
Look at the articulation on this!

He bends her leg up and down, staring at her
knee.

Darren:
It's so lifelike!

And this material!

He runs his hands up her thighs, completely
oblivious to her slowly flushing face.

Darren:
Smooth...\!
Protective...\!
Durable...

Yet somehow still soft and warm!

He gently rubs her inner thigh, completely
missing her soft intake of breath.

Darren:
It's like the perfect blend of plastic and skin!

He shuffles forward a little, pulling her leg
aside and leaning in to examine where her 
leg joins her torso.

He doesn't seem to notice his face is right up
against her crotch.\!
She definitely does.

Darren:
And this joint! It-

His robot girlfriend can no long bite back a 
soft moan as he rubs his hands along it.

Kyle:
MODESTY COVERS RETRACTED.

Hidden ports iris open on her breasts, 
deploying already-stiff blue nipples.

You catch another hint of blue behind 
Darren's head, but he's hiding it from view.

A faint smell fills the air, a strange but 
surprisingly alluring mix of feminine arousal 
and clear mineral oil.

Darren jerks back in surprise.

Darren:
I-

Kyle catches his head before he can move 
far.\!
She gently starts to press him closer.

Kyle:
Please...\!
Don't stop...

She starts to moan, as he brings his mouth
down to her slit.

You back off before they can see you 
watching.

passages.name: Orchards real — Quadruple scene — p2
passages.content:
You can still hear soft moaning and cries from
behind the barn.\!
You decide not to interrupt.

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Beehive — p1
passages.content:
An agitated beehive. An orb made of buzz
and rage.

It does not want to be your friend.

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Beehive — p2
passages.content:
The hive is surrounded by a swarm of angry
bees, wildly whirling around as it looks for
something to attack.

You carefully creep closer.

An increase in the buzzing suggests that bees
aren't really something you can sneak up on.

Look, bee brains are tiny. Who knows better
whether you're sneaking, you or some bug
that spends its life having sex with flowers?

Secure in your intellectual superiority, you
creep closer to the hive.

The enormous horde of bees flying straight
for your face suggests that you miscalculated.

You run for your life.

Hmph. They probably just got lucky.

Oh crap! Ohcrapohcrapohcrap!

You dive forward and throw the Bee Blanket
over the hive.  Then huddle on the ground
hiding your face with your arms. 

The sound of the swarm increases to a roar.

You can feel the wind from a million tiny wings
as it prepares to swoop upon you.

Then slowly
\.slowly...
\|ever so slowly...

It quiets.

You feel gentle impacts all over your body as
the bees slide from the air.  But no stings.

A soft sound of gentle buzzy snoring whispers
from a million insects.

A few bees have even slid into your pockets
as they fell asleep.

Bees acquired?!

Yeah! You're pretty sure there was a movie
about that!

You think it also said that...\. bees can open
doors.  So you'd better keep that in mind.

Apparently the bees have not watched the
same movie.

You break and run screaming as the swarm
charges straight at you.

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Beehive — p3
passages.content:
The bees are still sleeping peacefully.

You decide waking them up would be a 
*really* bad idea.

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Starting cutscene — p1
passages.content:
Park Volunteer TJ:
You're not supposed to be here.

I should call the police on you, but I'll be nice.

I'm supposed to be collecting all the possibly-
infected fruit. But the orchard's full of bugs.

There's no way I'm going in there, so you have
the chance to do me a favor. Bring me fruit
and I won't call the police on you.

Let's say four apples to start. If you can't find
them on the ground, you can always shake
the trees to knock some down.

Go on, get in there.

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Orchard guard — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer TJ:
Do you have four apples for me yet?

He takes the apples.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Good job. If you'll just do a little more for me
I'll let you out.

This time, bring me four grapefruit.
Remember you can shake the trees to collect
them.

And there better not be bugs on them.

Park Volunteer TJ:
I said *four* apples! This isn't enough!

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

He takes the apples.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Good job. If you'll just do a little more for me
I'll let you out.

This time, bring me four grapefruit.
Remember you can shake the trees to collect
them.

And there better not be bugs on them.

Park Volunteer TJ:
I said *four* apples! This isn't enough!

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Do you have four grapefruit for me yet?

He takes the fruit.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Good job. If you'll just do a little more for me
I'll let you out.

This time, bring me four apples.
Remember you can shake the trees to collect
them.

Park Volunteer TJ:
I said *four* grapefruit! This isn't enough!

You pull out a big handful of drowsy bees and
drop them into his hands.

The movement seems to wake them up.

Judging from the buzzing, they don't like what
they see.

Park Volunteer TJ:
These are bees!

Why do you have bees? \.
*How* do you have bees?!

Park Volunteer TJ:
\{AAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!

You hear yells and screams coming from 
farther in the orchard as the cloud of angry
bees and TJ vanish inside.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

He takes the fruit.

Park Volunteer TJ:
Good job. If you'll just do a little more for me
I'll let you out.

This time, bring me four apples.
Remember you can shake the trees to collect
them.

And there better not be bugs on them.

Park Volunteer TJ:
I said *four* grapefruit! This isn't enough!

Park Volunteer TJ:
Come back when you have enough.

brown and slowly dying.

leaves, while new buds begin to sprout from
the branches.

Raw mana +1!

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Orchard person 2 — p1
passages.content:
I've brought that guy a ton of fruit and he's
still not letting me out.

I don't know if he's ever going to.

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Orchard person 2 — p2
passages.content:
Hah, that jerk got what he deserved!

You should have seen him run past.

Two of those bees got me too, but it was
worth it!

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Orchard person 2 — p3
passages.content:
The slim man looks frightened.

Park Volunteer:
I thought I was okay when those bees stung
me, but now I think I'm having a reaction!

People die from bee stings!\. I don't want to die!

I think I'm swelling up. Does it feel like I'm 
swelling up?

He grabs your hands and places them flat 
against the front of his chest.

You can definitely feel something. \.\.

Feels like\| two little nubs, one on each side?\.
He gives a little gasp at the feel of your hands.

Oh, they're sensitive!\.

That's bad,that's probably bad.

You can feel the tiny nubs swelling larger and
larger under your hands.\|
Two little peaks of flesh. What else could those
be?

Soon they're big enough they'd be clearly
visible through his shirt, if you weren't covering
them.

They're still swelling! And tender! That can't
be good!

Yet he doesn't pull himself away. Almost the
opposite.\.\.
He keeps pushing into your hands, dragging 
those two bumps across your palms.

You notice him giving a little gasp every time
he does.

And now I'm starting to feel warm all over!\.
Is this the end?!

He does look very flushed. And...\.\.
Is he shrinking?\|
He is shrinking!

Just a little, but you can see him getting 
more petite as he continues to thrust himself
against your hands.

His waist is slimming too, while his hips seem
to be widening. And his face is definitely
starting to soften.

Oh!

He gasps, biting thickening lips.

I'm feeling so\. *pant*\. warm! I'm \.*gasp*\.
burning up!

His breath is coming in faster and faster
gasps, hovering on the edge of moans. \.
And rising in pitch with each one.

\C[5]Oh *gasp* no! \. I'm starting to *moan* have
trouble breathing!

At this point you can't really call him a "him"
anymore. 

Her face has softened into complete
femininity, her body has shifted into a slight
hourglass, and her hair is starting to curl down 
around her face.

\C[5]*Mmmm!*\| Call an *moan*\.\.\. ambulance!\.
The *oh!*\| swelling isn't *ah!*\| stopping!

You can feel her chest starting to sof

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Orchard person 2 — p4
passages.content:
She looks up at you, one hand still buried in
her pants and the other gently squeezing her
breast.

Park Volunteer:
\C[5]Thank you\.\. thank you for the help.\|

I don't think I'll need that ambulance.

Park Volunteer:
\C[5]I guess bees aren't that bad after all.
