The knight sighs.

Still no.

She stomps a clawed foot, leaving gouges in

I've talked with Princess Manager and she

The knight rolls her eyes.

Day-Shift Knight:
Then get her to come out here and say that

Assistant Dragon:
...I can't.

She refuses to come out of that cell she built.\!
Says "a princess could not possibly rescue

What are you two even doing back there?\!
No, nevermind, I don't want to know.

Just...\!
Just go back to whatever you're supposed to
be doing and let me do my job.

You're holding up the customers.

She turns back to you as the dragon sulks

Day Shift Knight:
I'm sorry, was there anything I could help

You step up to the counter just in time to see

Dragons are not supposed to rescue

Much less in such a, such an *undignified*

The dragongirl plops her down next to the
desk.

Assistant Dragon:
I just need you to tell Kacie to do her job!\!
Make her fight me!

The princess sniffs and takes some time to

Vice Princess:
I guess I might as well.  My domain has
already been invaded, I should not waste the
trip.

She pulls a book out from somewhere in her
skirts and places it on the table.

Vice Princess:
Now, pay close attention.

The new employee handbook clearly states
that knights have several important job 
responsibilities, chief among them to fight
dragons and rescue princesses.

I know you're still getting used to your new
position, but this is a major portion of your
job duties that you are neglecting!

And that has consequences! Why, if you keep
this up, possible punishments include...        

She opens the book and starts leafing through
it.

Vice Princess:
Include...

She starts flipping pages faster.

Vice Princess:
Uh...

She pauses and reads something closely.\!
Then blushes.

Vice Princess:
Oh my.

Day-Shift Knight:
Huh?

The knight flips the book over to her side of 
the counter and takes a look at it.

Day-Shift Knight:
What *is* this??

She looks at the cover.

Day-Shift Knight:
"Flames of Desire: A story of a knight with one
mission - to *lay* the dragon."

"Three-time winner of the Monsterfuckers
Choice Awards"??

Assistant Dragon:
Oh! Uh...

She laughs nervously.

Assistant Dragon:
So that's where it went...

Assistant Dragon:
\}If you don't want to fight, there's other things
we could try too...

She laughs nervously again.

Assistant Dragon:
Maybe I'll just get headed back...

She grabs the book and turns to head back.\!
Then pauses.

Assistant Dragon:
\}Just, think about it.\!
There's al

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Intro event trigger — p5
passages.content:
You see the dragon and princess approach
from the back room just as you reach the 
counter.

Assistant Dragon:
Rar!\.\. I am a horrible dragon, here to steal
all your maidens!

She breathes a stream of fire into the air.

Vice Princess:
Oh no, a horrible dragon, here to steal all us
maidens!

They both glance at the knight.

Assistant Dragon:
I am so glad that no one will stop my horrible
deeds!

She breathes another stream of fire into 
the air.

Vice Princess:
If only someone would stop her horrible 
deeds!

Day Shift Knight:
You know, you're going to set off the 
sprinklers if you keep doing that.

Assistant Dragon:
Come on!

She stomps her foot furiously.\.\.
The resulting boobquake nearly pops her out
of her skimpy white top.

The princess manager leans forward as the
dragon tucks herself back in to her clothing.

Vice Princess:
Kacie, I just don't understand.\!
Look at what you're missing out on!\.\. This is
a foe any knight would love to fight!

She's strong!

The dragon flexes.

Fiery!

The dragon checks for sprinklers overhead,
then blows out a much more subdued tongue
of flame.

And has a simply *massive* asset portfolio!

The dragon leans forward, giving a view of
her massive, head-burying cleavage.

Vice Princess:
I'm disappointed to see an employee with as
much potential as you not jumping on this
opportunity!

Day Shift Knight:
How did this get even weirder.

She turns to the dragon.

Day Shift Knight:
Look, Liz, I get where you're coming from.

There comes a time in a woman's life where 
her body starts to change, to blossom, and 
it becomes really easy to get swept up in all
the feelings that come with that.

It's natural!

She turns to the princess.

And there comes a time in every manager's
life when\..\..\..
Actually, I have *no* idea what your deal is.

And I don't want to!

She turns back to the dragon.

Day Shift Knight:
Liz, I understand where you're coming from,
and I'm honored, really.\!
To ask me to be the first knight you fight!

I respect

And all of the dogs!

Shelter Head Doug:

Look at how much fun they're having playing

As you watch, you notice a faint glow starting

More and more light pours off them, until

Then the light concentrates itself into two
figures.

Shelter Head Doug:
I heard the rumors...\!
But I never thought...

Shelter Head Doug:
The Goodest Boy...

Shelter Head Felix:
Look at those perfect ears...\!
That perfect tail...

Shelter Head Felix:
How can such a wonderful kitty exist...

They each reach out a trembling hand.

The animals lean into their hands, allowing 
themselves to be pet for a few wonderful
seconds.

Then they both look up to the shelter heads,

Shelter Head Doug:
Aww, do whatever you need. I can't say no

Shelter Head Felix:
Go ahead kitty, I'm ready.

They leap.

\..\..\..\..\..What?!?!

You don't deserve to be a kitty!

Shelter Head Doug:
Deserve?!\!
You're not nearly good enough to be a dog!\!
I'm the good one!

They continue tugging and slapping at each

It's honestly one of the most ineffectual fights

Finally, exhausted, they pull apart.

Both:
\{\{HMPH!

They stalk away from each other.

several years...

passages.name: Bank 2 ARG — Dragon fight — p3

You walk in to see the employees lounging on

Day-Shift Knight:
It's okay Liz, I'm sure there are plenty of 
knights out there who would love to fight a
powerful, attractive dragon like you.

Easy for you to say.\!
Where do I even start looking?

The knight thinks for a moment.

Day-Shift Knight:
Have you considered online dating?/!
Or maybe a ren faire?

Assistant Dragon:
Huh.

She pulls out her phone and starts doing some
searches.

While she searches, the knight is shifting 
uncomfortably on her pile of gold.

Day-Shift Knight:
How are you so comfortable, anyway?\!
I think this gold pile is one of the worst things
I've ever sat on!

She shifts again.\!
The pile collapses, sending her sliding to the
floor in a wave of coins.

Day-Shift Knight:
Ugh.

Assistant Dragon:
Hmm, how to explain it...

She shifts around on her pile of gold, somehow
not dislodging a single coin.

Assistant Dragon:
Here, let's try this.

She picks up a single coin and hands it to
the knight.

Here, hold this in your hands and close your
eyes.

Now, focus on the coin.\!
Feel how it slowly warms in your hands?

As it warms, feel how it feels less and less

She reaches out and runs her hands through

Then turns to you.

Assistant Dragon:

All the power, all the strength of being a

Now, I have this feeling that I'm supposed to
take this slowly. Give you a bit at a time, as

But screw that.\!
I'm a dragon! Rules are for other people!

The thing I want is *money*.\!
Pay me and I'll grant your wishes.\!
I could always use a bigger hoard.

I'll ease you into it. $1000 for the first step.

Pay 1000 BE Bucks to the dragon?

She takes a deep breath, then breathes a 
stream of fire over you.

You feel your connection to dragonhood

TF.

As she takes the money, it vanishes.

The room fills with a bright glow as gold rains
down from above.

As the glow fades, you see the hoard isn't the

Assistant Dragon:
Yes!\!
We give to the hoard, and the hoard gives

Give me a hug!

Hugging Gold (For Hugging) acquired!\!
So huggable!

I guess being amazing isn't for everyone.\!
Come back if you change your mind!

Unfortunately, you don't have enough money.

Do you listen?

You feel your form change as you embrace

The growing blaze inside you makes you feel

Assistant Dragon:
\}Just, think about it.\!
There's al

I respect

Jogger:
I feel so much faster today!

passages.name: Field — Runner 1 — p1
passages.content:
Jogger:
This... is the first step to completing a
marathon!

And this... is the second!

The third!

passages.name: Field — Runner 1 — p2
passages.content:
Jogger:
These new exercise clothes I got are really
helping!

I don't know why, but I have so much more
of a bounce in my step!

She looks down at herself.

And, uh, in other places.

passages.name: Field — Runner 1
passages.content:
He's humming to himself.

Jogger:
And I would walk ten thousand miles...\!
And then I'd stop and take a break...

passages.name: Field — Runner 1
passages.content:
Jogger:
Oh god I hate jogging so much.

Why does it have to be so stupidly healthy?

passages.name: Field — Tennis Coach — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Coach:
They're good boys, all of them.  Good boys.

Couldn't ask for a better set of men. Loyal,
determined, energetic, everything you'd
want in a team.

Course, none of them can play tennis worth a
damn. But you can't have everything.\!

\}Still, would be nice to win some games one of these days.

passages.name: Field — Tennis Coach — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Coach:
I can't quite believe it. We actually won a game
last night!

It's like Lance has been a different man since 
they finally found that new sports drink.\!
Even more different than being a woman now,
I mean.

Who knows? Maybe we'll even win a second
match!

passages.name: Field — Tennis Coach — p3
passages.content:
Tennis Coach:
I'd never believe it if I hadn't seen it with my
own eyes.

We swept the singles competitions last night!\!
I can't believe what that new sports drink has
done for getting these boys into form.

I guess it is true what they all say: all you
need to excel in sports is grit, determination,
and a *massive* pile of questionably legal
supplements.

Good on them!

passages.name: Field — Tennis Coach — p4
passages.content:
Tennis Coach:
I can't believe it.

We won every single match last night.\!
Doubles, singles, didn't matter. The other
teams didn't stand a chance.

I've done my best, but I never thought this
would happen.

He looks at you.

Tennis Coach:
And hey, I heard you helped start this whole
thing.

Here, take this.

Deluxe Racket acquired!

It's a bit better than most you'll find. Just bring
it along if you ever want to give tennis a try!

As he finishes speaking, one of the players 
walks up.  She's dragging the cooler full of 
potion with her.

Tennis Player:
Hey Coach!\!
You know, we had a massive victory last night.

And there's a tradition for what happens when
a team wins.

She hefts the cooler suggestively.

The coach looks her up and down thoughtfully.

Tennis Coach:
You know what? You girls do make it look fun.

He looks at himself.

And I wouldn't mind knocking a few decades
off.

A few of the players grab the cooler and lift
it over his head.\!
Then dump the whole thing on him.

The gushing liquid obscures him completely
for a moment.

Then reveals a changed form.



The new woman licks a few drops of potion off
her lips.

Coach:
Mmm, that is good stuff. I see why you like it.

She looks down at herself.

Coach:
Though it looks like I got quite a bit more than
you boys.

She stretches extravagantly, massive breasts
threatening to rip apart her struggling shirt.

Coach:
Oh, that didn't hurt at all!

Why, this might take a bit of getting used to,
but I think I could get back on the court!

And then I could *really* show you youngins
a trick or two.

passages.name: Field — Tennis Coach — p5
passages.content:
Coach:
Not gonna lie, I never thought I'd have a pair
of ballasts like this to swing around.

She pats her enormous tits fondly, sending 
them jiggling.

But it sure beats being old and decrepit!

passages.name: Field — Thirsty Player — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
I'm just having a hard time getting into 
practice, you know?

I'm feeling tired. Drained. All the things you'd
hear at the start of a commercial for sports 
drinks.

But none of the drinks on the market do
anything for me.\!
I need something fresh! Something new!

...Which is why I'm saying this to everyone 
who walks by, apparently.\!
Sorry about that.

Tennis Player:
Getting hit by lightning is novel, I'll give you
that.

But it doesn't hydrate! It's not giving me the
electrolytes I need!

You hand him a potion.

Tennis Player:
Hmmm?\!
What's this? 

He opens it and takes a sniff.

Tennis Player:
Huh.\!
That smells pretty great.

He takes a cautious sip.

Yeah, that is good!

He starts taking long drinks, not noticing the 
changes that ripple across his form.



Tennis Player:
Thanks! I feel so much better now!

I bet I'm going to win my match tonight!

passages.name: Field — Thirsty Player — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
This drink you gave me is just what I needed!

passages.name: Field — Thirsty Player — p3
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Even my workouts feel better like this! I can 
push so much faster!

passages.name: Field — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
-So you're saying this new sports drink of 
yours is how you won your match last night?

Thirsty Tennis Player:
Yeah! It refreshes, it quenches, and it does a
body good!

The other two look her up and down.

Tennis Player:
...I can see it really does a body good.

She smiles and winks.

Other Tennis Player:
I don't know. I'm a lone wolf! A loose cannon!\!
I forge my own path and take no help from
anyone!

Other Tennis Player:
\}But it would be nice to actually win a match.

Tennis Player:
Sure, we'll give it a try.

Thirsty Tennis Player:
Great!

She fills up their water bottles from the potion
you gave her.\!
It doesn't look like the level in her bottle is
going down at all.

Thirsty Tennis Player:
We're gonna be the best team in the league
at this rate!

You can see their bodies already starting to
shift as they walk back to the court.

passages.name: Field — Doubles 1 — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Come on, take it easy on me this time!

Other Player:
Haha, fool! We are on the tennis court! Where
love means nothing!

Player:
...\!
Okay, you're going down.

passages.name: Field — Doubles 1 — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
This time we're going to win!

passages.name: Field — Doubles 2 — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
We've been practicing a *ton* recently.

But it'll be worth it if we can win the next
tournament.

\}Or any games at all, really.

passages.name: Field — Doubles 2 — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
I've never felt so connected to my partner!\!
Tonight is going to be the best matches of 
couples' tennis I've ever played!

Partner:
It's "doubles' tennis," honey.

Tennis Player:
...\!
Are you sure?

passages.name: Field — Doubles 3 — p1
passages.content:
This player is muttering to themselves.

Tennis Player:
\}Remember, the ball goes over the net, not
under.\!
Ball goes under the net, not over.

passages.name: Field — Doubles 3 — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
I don't know what's up.

I feel more energetic, but I just can't catch
my balance!

passages.name: Field — Doubles 3 — p3
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
I've figured it out!

You have to work with the boobs!\!
Use the jiggling to pull you around, to put
power in your swing!

passages.name: Field — Doubles 4 — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Ready for my serve?\!
You sure?

HERE GOES!

He spikes the ball straight into the net.

passages.name: Field — Doubles 4 — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Are you ready for a POWER SERVE?!

passages.name: Field — Lone Wolf tennis player — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Let the other guys work together.

I play singles.\!
I'm a lone wolf!\!
No one to hold me down or hold me back!

Too much of a tennis player for anyone to 
match!

\}...No one wants to be my partner...

passages.name: Field — Lone Wolf tennis player — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Haha! Yes!\!
Fear me! The lone wolf of the tennis court!\!
Awooo~!

passages.name: Field — Lone Wolf tennis player — p3
passages.content:
Tennis Coach:
Haha, come at me!\!
I'll take you both on!

passages.name: Field — Battle tennis player — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
I'd be fine with being his partner, but I like 
playing against him more.

Competition is how you truly advance.\!
Iron sharpening iron.\!
The true battle of body versus body and 
heart versus heart!

He takes a swing and hits the ball into his
opponent's chest.

Tennis Player:
Hah! That's another point for me!

passages.name: Field — Battle tennis player — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Sit!\!
Stay!\!
Backhand topspin lob!

Good girl! Now prepare to face my ultimate
serve!

passages.name: Field — Battle tennis player — p3
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Awww!\!
Who's a good doubles partner?\!
You're a good doubles partner!

She gives her partner a few scritches behind
her dog ears.\!
Her partner tries to hide how obviously 
pleased she is with the praise.

passages.name: Field — Tennis Player — p1
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Look, I hate to say it, but these other guys 
are trash. Just, total crap at tennis.

Which is why I have a plan. You gotta think
outside the box.

Can't play tennis? Why not teach a swarm of 
rats to instead!\!
Can't hit the ball with a racket? Use a gun!
There ain't no rule that says you can't!

Tennis Player:
Anyway, Coach says that there actually are
rules.\!
And that Air Bud wasn't a documentary.

And that I'm stuck in the timeout corner for
approximately forever.

\}Why does tennis even have a timeout 
corner...

passages.name: Field — Tennis Player — p2
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Okay, I've got a new plan. Thinking outside
the box again.

Where the box is the timeout corner, and the
thinking outside of it is leaving it.

I snagged myself some of this sports drink
everyone is enjoying so much.

He takes a big drink.\!
And moans in surprise.

Tennis Player:
Oh.\!
Oh wow.\!
This is *amazing*.

Another drink.

Tennis Player:
Mmmmmmm.\!
Ohhhhhhh.\!
I can see why everyone is so in to this.

One hand starts to grope at his swelling chest,
as he continues to drink with the other.

Tennis Player:
Ohhhhh.\.\.
This is so good.\.\. So good.\.\.
MmmmMMMMmmm!

He tilts up the cup, licking the last few drops
out eagerly.\!
It drops to the ground as both his hands start
to roam his swiftly feminizing body.

Tennis Player:
I-\.\. mmMMMmmm\.\. think I'm happy to-\.\.
oooOOOOooo\.\.
stay in time out for a bit.

passages.name: Field — Tennis Player — p3
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
You know what?\!
Mmm-\.\.
I don't mind being in time out.

\}ah\.\.\^

Maybe I should-\.\. \}ooo\{\.\. break the rules
more often.

passages.name: Field
passages.content:
Tennis Fan:
Go!\!
Win!\!

You can do it!

passages.name: Field — p1
passages.content:
You come across the tennis team having a 
meeting.



Thirsty Player:
And that's why I think this new sports drink is
so great!

She's pouring what appears to be an endless
stream of beverage into a big cooler from the
potion bottle you gave her.

Thirsty Player:
Helps build you up *and* is delicious!

But don't just take my word for it!

She turns to the other singles players.

Singles Player 1:
It's pretty great, I guess.\!
I am playing a lot better.\!
Can stand on my own, now.

Singles Player 2:
My serve has never been this great!\!
And my return!\!
And every other part of my game!

Doubles Player:
You make a good argument...

Coach:
Are you certain you're all okay with this?

I'll be the first to admit that it massively
improved your game, but look at what else it
does to you!

He gestures at the changed singles players.

Doubles Player 1:
Eh, I don't really care either way.

Doubles Player 2:
I'll do anything if it means I get to start winning
matches!

Doubles Player 3:
It looks like it could be fun?

Doubles Player 4:
\}Turning into a woman is a bonus, actually...

Coach:
Okay, just wanted to check that you all knew
what you were getting into.

Can't say I'd mind winning some matches for once.

They all gather around the drinks cooler.

All:
Cheers!

You can see their forms start to shift as they
each down a cup.

Hair lengthening, chests pushing out, 
backsides swelling...

And then back to practice.

passages.name: Field — Return to entrance
passages.content: Return to entrance?

passages.name: Field
passages.content:
Exercising Person:
It's always nice to do your stretching outdoors
before you start working out.

passages.name: Field — Loud Batter
passages.content:
Batter:
\{OKAY!
YOU CAN THROW THE BALL NOW!

Pitcher:
I... I can hear you fine!\!
Please put away the megaphone!

The batter fiddles with a knob.

Batter:
\{\{\{NO.

passages.name: Field — Pitcher
passages.content:
Pitcher:
I'm pretty sure her plan is to give me a
headache so the pitch is easier to hit.

Pitcher:
Ain't no rule?\!
Really?!

Whoever came up with Air Bud should be shot.

passages.name: Field — Baseball equipment — p1
passages.content:
One of those treasure-chest-shaped duffel
bags.\!
You'd heard they were getting popular.

It looks like no one is paying attention to it.
See if there's anything useful inside?

You find a spare metal bat that no one seems 
to be using.\!
Metal Bat Wand acquired!

You leave the bag alone.

passages.name: Field
passages.content:
Soccer Player:
Okay, I'm going for another 300 juggles!

passages.name: Field
passages.content:
Soccer Player:
Can we stop doing tricks and play already?

passages.name: Field
passages.content:
The soccer player is trying to juggle the ball.

Soccer Player:
5, 6, 7-

He misses the kick.

Soccer Player:
At *some* point I'm going to get ten!

passages.name: Field
passages.content:
She's staring at a particularly lush patch of
clover.

Cowgirl:
It looks so tasty...\!
Why does it look so tasty?

I shouldn't be eating grass, right?\!
Even if it looks delicious?\!
And smells delicious?

She reaches out a hand hesitantly and plucks
a few pieces.

And tastes delicious?

passages.name: Field
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
Cooperating?!\!
This goes against all my wolfly instincts!

Her partner steps over and starts scratching
her behind the ears.\!
She melts into her hand, tail wagging furiously.

Tennis Player:
I mean it!\.\. *pant*\!
I'm a wolf!\! 
You'd better watch out around me!

She dissolves into happy pants and wiggles
as the scritches continue.

passages.name: Field — Tennis Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
Ready for our tennis match?

Miku:
Yeah!

passages.name: Field — Tennis Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
Ready for our tennis match?

Miku:
Yeah!

passages.name: Field — Doggirl
passages.content:
Doggirl:
Oh yeah!

I'm gonna chase the *hell* outta this ball.

She wags her tail eagerly.

passages.name: Entrance real
passages.content: FIELD AND SPORTS COURTS

passages.name: Entrance real
passages.content: EXERCISE EQUIPMENT AND WEIGHT ROOMS

passages.name: Entrance real
passages.content: CLASSROOMS

passages.name: Entrance real
passages.content: SWIMMING POOL

passages.name: Entrance real — Entrance Sign — p1
passages.content:
Welcome to the community center!\!
Please help us all stay safe and ready to serve 
the community by following a few simple rules.

No running in the pool area\!
Clean up after yourself\!
Please wipe off exercise equipment after using\!
No plotting world domination in the classrooms

passages.name: Entrance real — Entrance Sign — p2
passages.content:
Welcome to the community center!\!
Please help us all stay safe and ready to serve 
the community by following a few simple rules.

No running in the pool area\!
Clean up after yourself\!
Please wipe off exercise equipment after using\!
No plotting world domination in the classrooms

A new rule has been added in angry marker.

\{NO BOULDERS

passages.name: Entrance real — Entrance clerk — p1
passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Welcome to the community center!\!
We've got all sorts of workout machines, game
courts, and a pool!

We also have regular classes, so feel free to
check out the schedule in the back to see if 
there's anything you're interested in.

passages.name: Entrance real — Entrance clerk — p2
passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Hi!\!
I'm afraid we're closed at the moment, as we
do some cleaning up.

In apology, we're offering complimentary boulders!

passages.name: Entrance real — Entrance clerk — p3
passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Hi!\!
Feel free to use any of the facilities that 
aren't covered in giant rocks.

We're cleaning up as fast as we can.

Check back later to see if we've opened up
any new rooms.

As compensation, feel free to take as many
boulders as you'd like!\!
*Please*.

passages.name: Entrance real — Counter conversation — p1
passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Welcome to the community center!\!
We've got all sorts of workout machines, game
courts, and a pool!

We also have regular classes, so feel free to
check out the schedule in the back to see if 
there's anything you're interested in.

passages.name: Entrance real — Counter conversation — p2
passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Hi!\!
I'm afraid we're closed at the moment, as we
do some cleaning up.

In apology, we're offering complimentary boulders!

passages.name: Entrance real — Counter conversation — p3
passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Hi!\!
Feel free to use any of the facilities that 
aren't covered in giant rocks.

We're cleaning up as fast as we can.

As compensation, feel free to take as many
boulders as you'd like!\!
*Please*.

passages.name: Entrance real — Autorun trigger — p1
passages.content: Your glasses suddenly switch on.

passages.name: Entrance real — Oni — p1
passages.content:
She puts a hand on your shoulder and stares
deep into your eyes.

Guardian Hana:
I believe in you man.\!
You can move!\. That!\. Heavy!\. Thing!

passages.name: Entrance real — Oni — p2
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
You can do it dude! Don't let your puny 
muscles get you down!

passages.name: Entrance real — Oni — p3
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
So dude, what's your plan?\!
You ready to give up this whole quest thing
and GET\.\. SWOLE?

passages.name: Entrance real — Oni — p4
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Dude, what are you waiting for?\!
Go get changed so we can get started!

Guardian Hana:
Don't worry dude, I got you covered.\!
This is a full service trial! No outside items
needed!

Guardian Hana:
Dude?\!
Dude. Dude!

passages.name: Entrance real — Oni — p5
passages.content:
She puts a hand on your shoulder and stares
deep into your eyes.

Guardian Hana:
I believe in you man.\!
You can move!\. That!\. Heavy!\. Thing!

passages.name: Entrance real — Boulder — p1
passages.content:
You give the boulder a good push.\!
...\!
...\!
...

Nothing happens.

That's,\. uh,\. it's surprisingly heavy.

Guardian Hana:
Come on dude, you can do it!\!
Just tighten your core!

Gritting your teeth, you put your shoulder to
it and *shove*.

...It slides maybe an inch.

But you dig in your heels and slowly,
a\.g\.o\.n\.i\.z\.i\.n\.g\.l\.y, it\. begins\. to\. move.

Guardian Hana:
Dude, if you're having this much trouble
already, I'm not sure you're up for the trials.

Like, I know this is important to you, but I
just don't think you can manage it.

Look, I know exactly what I can do for you.\!
Fittina isn't just for the already swole!\!
She helps those who want to bring their inner
swoleness out, too.

So let's just give up on talking to her while 
she's doing her reps, and we'll sit down and
figure out an exercise plan for you.

She looks you up and down.

Guardian Hana:
I know *exactly* how to build you up.\!
And I've got just the most awesome recipe
for protein shakes dude.

I swear, in six months, nine months *tops*,
you'll be flinging these boulders around like
they were nothing.

And that should impress Fittina enough that
you won't even need to pass some dumb old
trials.

Kaede takes a step forward.

Kaede:
Hana, I know thou dost love to help others 
bulge thy thews, but might I suggest-

Guardian Hana:
Now Kaede dude, you know getting swole is
all sacred and junk to Fittina. Let them make
their own decision.

Just, give them a sec to think about it.

Kaede sighes and steps back.

Guardian Hana:
Just talk to me when you've chosen.

passages.name: Entrance real — Boulder — p2
passages.content:
You push against the boulder.\!
It refuses to move.

You're just a little worn out, okay?

passages.name: Entrance real — Exit — p2
passages.content:
Kaede:
Hero, thou shouldst not leave whilst there is 
still a chance of seeing the goddess!

passages.content:
He is very slowly pushing a boulder to the
exit while muttering to himself.

Man:
It's free!\!
Free is always worth it!

Just keep at it!

passages.name: Entrance real
passages.content:
She's looking at a list of exercise classes.

Irritated Lamia:
Cycling...\!
Leg Day...

How Much Squats Would A Squatter Squat If 
A Squatter Could Squat Squats?!

They have *nothing* I can take!

Is... Is this bullying?

passages.name: Entrance real — Boulder doggirl
passages.content:
Excited Doggirl:
I've got this great idea!

There are all of these boulders around, right?

And boulders are like really big balls!

This is going to be amazing!

She gnaws on the boulder in excitement.

passages.name: Locker room — Autorun event old — p1
passages.content:
You stumble as you step into the locker room.\!
For a second your legs feel too short.

\N[4]:
That's a new look.

Guess that brute didn't want you to have to
push an extra set of boulders around.

Guess that brute didn't want you to have to
push an extra set of boulders around.

Guess you looked too flabby to that brute.

Like this you might even have a chance of
doing whatever stupid thing they come up 
with.

Kaede:
Hold thy tongue, knave!\!
The hero shalt overcome any task put before
them!

Or wast thine defeat not sign enough of their
valor?

\N[4] rolls her eyes.

\N[4]:
Defeating me showed that maybe the hero
has a *bit* of a brain.

But this is stupid dumb force. And an idiot like
that guardian is never going to be satisfied.

\N[4]:
Oh please.\!
Even an idiot can get in the way of a genius
plan like mine through sheer dumb luck.

But luck isn't going to help you push boulders
for a brute like that.

Kaede:
Thou varlet!

They start arguing loudly.

\N[2]:
\}I don't think this is what changing room is
supposed to mean...\{\!
You might want to go check in the mirror.

passages.name: Locker room — Autorun event old — p3
passages.content:
You stare at yourself in the mirror.

You look different.\!
Again.



At this point more changes just feel normal.

It's jarring to look in the mirror and see yet
another new face looking back at you.

On the bright side, you do seem to be wearing
workout clothes now.\!
And a workout body, for that matter.

Is this what sporty feels like?\.\.
Are you sporty now?

You do a quick exploration of your new body.\!
Yep, this all seems to be real.

In the mirror, you see \N[2] walk up.

Huh, your glasses are missing but somehow
you can still see her.

\N[2]:
How are you? I know you've been enjoying 
yourself, but this is still a pretty sudden
change.

\N[2]:
How are you? \.\. This is a pretty sudden
change.

But Fittina should be able to fix it.

\N[2]:
Just know that we're all doing everything we
can to help you get back to normal.

She pauses for a moment.

Just know that Kaede and I are...

She trails off again.

Well, I'm here for you.

....Let's go find that goddess?

Actually, this seems pretty interesting.\!
You've never had a chance to be ambiguously
sporty before!

\N[2] gives you a smile.

\N[2]:
I'm glad to hear it.

You shrug off the offered sympathy.\!
You don't need it from a part of the game that
did this to you.

\N[2] looks sad, but backs off.

You choose to keep whatever thoughts you
have on this most recent change to yourself.

After a moment's wait \N[2] sighs and 
backs away.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit Old — p1
passages.content:
You don't want to leave before checking a 
mirror.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit Old — p2
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
That's more like it!\!
Come on dude, the test awaits!

passages.name: Locker room — Exit Old — p3
passages.content:
Your mouth really is feeling kind of dry. Maybe
go grab some water from the sink?

passages.name: Locker room — Exit Old — p4
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Hey dude, ready for your next test?

Guardian Hana:
Let's go!

She leads you outside, to a long running track.

Okay, just give a shout when you are!

passages.name: Locker room — Kaede — p2
passages.content:
Kaede and \N[4] are still arguing.

Kaede:
Thou whoreson zed! \!
Thou unnecessary letter! 

A rascal! An eater of broken meats!

passages.name: Locker room — Kaede — p4
passages.content:
Kaede is looking thoughtful.

Kaede:
Truly, it hath been a dog's age since I saw
another of my kind.

Perhaps Hana has the right idea.

passages.name: Locker room — Pride — p2
passages.content:
\N[4]:
You're only proving me right you know.\!
If I were in charge this sort of insolence would
simply not be tolerated.

passages.name: Locker room — p1
passages.content:
The gym member takes a long satisfied 
drink, then notices you.

Gym Member:
Remember to always hydrate before your
workout!

She raises her bottle to you.

passages.name: Locker room — p2
passages.content:
The gym member takes a long satisfied 
drink, then notices you.

Gym Member:
Remember, it's important to always hydrate
during your workout!

She raises her bottle to you.

passages.name: Locker room — p3
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ah, nothing like a good drink after a workout.

She takes a drink with a satisfied smile.

Gym Member:
Always remember to hydrate after exercising!

passages.name: Locker room — p4
passages.content:
The gym member smiles at you.

Gym Member:
Remember to hydrate after showering!

Gym Member:
Now if you'll excuse me, I need to go pee
forever.

passages.name: Locker room — p1
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Oh hi, haven't seen you around before!\!
Let me know if you want any advice on the
machines or anything!

It's always great to see someone new trying
out the gym.

passages.name: Locker room — p1
passages.content:
She's humming happily to herself while 
showering.

passages.name: Locker room — p2
passages.content:
The showering woman is muttering to herself.

\}Stupid social norms...\!
What if I don't want to shower after working
out...\!
What if I'm fine with just being smelly...

passages.name: Locker room — p4
passages.content:
Gym Member:
I think it's better not to ask.

passages.name: Locker room
passages.content:
// Should show up at end of trials

Gym Member:
Great workout today!\!
Do it again Tuesday?

Sweating Gym Member:
Yeah..\!
Sure..

She pants for a moment.

\}How are you still so energetic...

passages.content:
She's wincing as she changes clothes.

Sore Gym Member:
I hate Leg Day, but it does feel good when it's
over.

She winces again.

Sore Gym Member:
Though I really, *really* hate Leg Day.

passages.name: Locker room — p2
passages.content:
She makes an attempt to stand, then sits
back down heavily.\!
She winces.

Sore Gym Member:
Okay, this is why I hate Leg Day.

She rubs painfully at her thigh.

Sore Gym Member:
Maybe just a little longer rest.

passages.name: Locker room — p4
passages.content:
She makes an attempt to stand, then sits
back down heavily.\!
She winces.

Sore Gym Member:
Wow, I had a *weird* experience at the 
department store the other day.

She gestures down at her lower body.

On the bright side, no leg day ever again!

She rubs painfully at her thigh.

Sore Gym Member:
Maybe just a little longer rest.

passages.name: Locker room — Glutes other — p1
passages.content:
Black-Haired Gym Member:
Ready for yoga? I heard we're focusing on
goddess pose today!

Redhead:
Sure!

passages.name: Locker room — Glutes other — p2
passages.content:
Black-Haired Gym Member:
Okay, yoga was a good warmup. Now on to
the exercises!

I'm thinking squats, maybe some lunges,
some knee thrusts...

Redhead:
Do you ever want to do some, you know,
arm exercises maybe?

Her friend turns to look her straight in the
eye and replies in an incredibly serious voice.

Black-Haired Gym Member:
No.\!
I am here to get the ass yoga has always 
promised me.

passages.name: Locker room — Glutes other — p3
passages.content:
One of the women is chanting softly to 
herself.

Black-Haired Gym Member:
Glutes glutes glutes, glutes glutes glutes!

Redhead:
Don't you think we've done enough for the
day?

Black-Haired Gym Member:
Nah, I'm really feeling in the groove today!\!
Just a few more exercises.

passages.name: Locker room — Glutes other — p4
passages.content:
Black-Haired Gym Member:
Ah, that was such a good workout!

Her friend gives her a concerned look.

Redhead:
I think you may have overdone it a bit...

The black-haired woman slaps her own ass
with a huge smile.

Black-Haired Gym Member:
No way, this is the butt I've always dreamed 
of!

passages.name: Locker room — Glutes other — p5
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ah, another day, another yoga class.

Her friend gives her a concerned look.

Other Gym Member:
Still?\!
Still?!

The black-haired woman slaps her own ass
with a huge smile.

Gym Member:
I gotta make sure to keep my figure!

passages.content:

passages.content:
Gym Member:
So do you think she ever actually exercises,
or does she just...

passages.name: Locker room
passages.content:
You'd prefer to change somewhere a little less,
uh, poopy.

passages.name: Locker room
passages.content:
You'd prefer to change somewhere a little less,
uh, poopy.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p1
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Go on, get changed. There should be some
stalls in the back you can use.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p2
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Ready for your first test?

K dude, just let me know when!

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p3
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Hey dude, no need to rush things.\!
Go get a drink and get changed and then
we'll head to the next trial.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p4
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Hey dude, ready for the endurance test?

No problem dude, take your time!

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p5
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
You're doing great dude!\!
Go get changed and we'll continue.

One more trial left to go, and you'll be good.

And it's the, you know, brain muscles trial.\!
I mean, those are important, but they're not
IMPORTANT important, if you know what I
mean.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p6
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Oh hey dude, nice look!

She turns to Kaede.

Guardian Hana:
You've always been great with the, you know,
whole thinking thing, so I thought why not?

Kaede:
Truly, my heart doth warm at thy consideration
Hana.\!
She ist so cute!

The guardian turns back to you.

Guardian Hana:
So dude, ready to really flex those brainmeats?\!
Crunch that grey matter?\!
Push \}philosophically\{ heavy things?!

Guardian Hana:
Awesome dude, let's go!

Guardian Hana:
Okay dude, just say when.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p7
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Congratulations dude!\!
You have proven yourself worthy to see the
Swolest of Swole herself!

Just need to get changed back first.

passages.name: Locker room — Exit — p8
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Are you prepared?

She leans forward, her voice turning serious.

Are you ready to meet the Matriarch of 
Muscles?\!
The Goddess of Glutes?\!
The Sultan of Swole!

She Who Builds Our Bulk And Legs Our Days!!

Are you prepared?

She tries to give you a high-five.

Guardian Hana:
Awesome dude!\!
Then let's get going!

Of course dude, meeting a goddess isn't 
something to just rush into.\!
Let me know when you're ready!

passages.name: Locker room — Autorun event  — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
What was thy thinking?!\!
Declaring the fault to be with a spirit when 
thou made merely the barest shred of effort.

Hast thou not the brains the Goddess gave
a carrot?

\N[4]:
Oh, I don't want to hear that from you, you 
moldering old buffoon.

Who's the one who taught \N[2] useless
gibberish?!

Kaede:
At least I know what knowledge I imparted
to her wouldst work on at least one spirit.

Dare you claim that you would respond with
aught but scorn to being commanded in the
manner you tried?

\N[4] scoffs.

\N[4]:
I don't do what would work on me, I do what
*should* work on everyone.

The world would be a better place if everyone
just did what I said. The sooner everyone
realizes this the better things will be.

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p1
passages.content:
As you step into the changing room, the 
workout clothes in your inventory vanish in
a burst of sparkles, swirling around you.

You feel...\.\.\. different.

Checking yourself out in the mirror, you see
you have indeed changed.



On the bright side, you do seem to be wearing
workout clothes now.\!
And a workout body, for that matter.

Is this what sporty feels like?\.\.
Are you sporty now?

You do a quick exploration of your new body.\!
Yep, this all seems to be real.

\N[4]:
That's a new look.

Guess that brute didn't want you to have to
push an extra set of boulders around.

Guess that brute didn't want you to have to
push an extra set of boulders around.

Guess you looked too flabby to that brute.

Like this you might even have a chance of
doing whatever stupid thing they come up 
with.

Kaede:
Hold thy tongue, knave!\!
The hero shalt overcome any task put before
them!

Or wast thine defeat not sign enough of their
valor?

\N[4] rolls her eyes.

\N[4]:
Defeating me showed that maybe the hero
has a *bit* of a brain.

But this is stupid dumb force. And an idiot like
that guardian is never going to be satisfied.

\N[4]:
Oh please.\!
Even an idiot can get in the way of a genius
plan like mine through sheer dumb luck.

But luck isn't going to help you push boulders
for a brute like that.

Kaede:
Thou varlet!

They start arguing loudly.

Huh, your glasses are missing but somehow
you can still see and hear them.\!
Must be something to do with this form.

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p2
passages.content:
You go in the changing booth but nothing
happens. You probably need to complete the
trials first.

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p3
passages.content:
You know, a drink would be nice.\!
You grab a cup of water and head into the
changing room.

You feel things shift as another cloud of 
sparkles whirl around you.

Huh, guess you might be doing some running
in the next trial?

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p4
passages.content:
You head into the changing room and wait.\!
Nothing happens.

Looks like you're already changed.

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p5
passages.content:
As you enter, another cloud of sparkles 
swirls around you.\!
This one feels a little odder though.

Your ears twitch as you try to figure out why.

.\..\..\.You back that thought up and take a 
closer look at it.

You're definitely sporting a few new additions.

Kaede:
By the goddess!

Why, that is a most fetching form indeed.

She looks you up and down.

I shall have to compliment Hana on her artistry.\!
If I didst not know better I might thinkest thou
were a child of my own, freshly out in the 
world.

Go forth!\!
Like this, thou should not fear any trial before
thee.

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p6
passages.content:
You head into the changing room and wait.\!
Nothing happens.

Kaede:
Twould be a shame to see thy form vanish so
soon.\!
Stay, enjoy it while it lasts!

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p7
passages.content:
For one last time, a cloud of sparkles spins
around you. \!
They peel away, swirling into a tighter and 
tighter ball in the center of the room.

There's a sudden flash, and a set of exercise
clothes appears in their place.

The clothing falls to the floor and slowly fades
into nothing.

It looks like you are back to yourself.

That's one change removed, but still so many
more to go.

passages.name: Locker room — Changing room — p8
passages.content:
No thanks.\!
Now that you're done with the trials, you're 
not going to risk seeing what going in there 
might do to you.

You head into the changing room and wait.\!
Nothing happens.

passages.name: Tile puzzle — Guardian Hana
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
How's it going dude?\!
You haven't collapsed weeping in a corner at
my magnificence, so you're doing pretty great!

Did you need a hand with anything?

Guardian Hana:
Dude, you just had to ask!

Guardian Hana:
Sorry dude, that's all the help I can give you.\!
You gotta look within yourself to find the
answer!

And if you find the missing tile inside yourself,
dude, give that back!

Hana makes fingerguns at you.

Guardian Hana:
You got this dude! I believe in you!

You've passed all the other trials, this one
should be nothing!

Good luck dude!

passages.name: Tile puzzle
passages.content:
You check what the solved puzzle should look 
like.



Majestic.

Stunning.

Staggering.

Transcendental.

Just, really nice muscles dude.

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1
passages.content:
Locked.

Devil:
Oh, you are not prepared to see the inner 
secrets yet.\!
Don't wanna blow your mind too hard!

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Priest cosplay — p1
passages.content:
Preacher:
Hah, yes, want to hear my new material?

I figure, all the generic sermons I was giving
have gotten old. I should take it in a new
direction, do some worldbuilding, build up a
consistent mythos.

Now, you know, there always seems to be
generically good gods, so why not mix it up
a bit?

Seems like it would be fun to preach like I was
following a dark goddess instead.\!
Not like murderous or anything, but a little
dark, a little edgy.

He pulls a pair of fake horns out of his bag
and puts them on, then strikes a pose.

Yes, a goddess cruelly maligned by those who
know not the important work she does!\!
I am here to spread the name of-

Hmmm, what *is* a good name?\!
Darkness, darkness\..\..\..\..\..
Eh, let's just go with something easy. 
Noctis?

He nods to himself, as his horns grow out a
little, curling around his face.\!
You notice that the strap between them seems
to have disappeared.

Of course, I'm a true cleric of Noctis.\!
And how better to show that than with some
religious clothing?

He pulls out a nun's headdress and puts it on,
not noticing the long black locks that 
immediately spill out from underneath.

Note to self: keep looking for something more
appropriate.

He pulls out a holy symbol and clasps it
between her new breasts.\!
She continues in a deep sultry voice.

And I am so excited to spread the goddess's
word to a new group of believers!

She looks up at you with joy as a tail snakes 
its way out of the back of her new habit.

Won't you stay and listen to the good word?

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Priest cosplay — p2
passages.content:
Preacher:
Remember, Noctis loves you, like she loves
everyone!\!
So make sure to treat each other with respect!

Otherwise she'll rise from her long slumber to
devour your soul!

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Angel — p1
passages.content:
Angel:
Ugh.\!
I can't believe I have to listen to whatever
drivel my colleague has come up with.

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Angel — p2
passages.content:
Angel:
Well.\!
She may be following the wrong path, but I
cannot fault her enthusiasm.

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1
passages.content:
Listener:
I know this isn't a real church.\!
And he's not a priest, he's just really into
cosplay.

But it's so relaxing to just sit here and listen
to him talk.

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Sleeper — p1
passages.content:
She's taking a nap on one of the benches.

Sleepy Person:
Augh!

I'm sorry God! I'm sorry!\!
I won't sleep in church again!

She looks down at herself.

Sleepy Devil:
Oh no! Were my clothes sleeping too?\!
Why did they have to die?

She takes another look.\!
She hefts her expanded breasts.
Her tiny wings flutter thoughtfully.

Sleepy Devil:
Though I guess it isn't all bad.\!
I'm getting very mixed messages here God!

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Sleeper — p2
passages.content:
Sleepy Devil:
I got zapped and my clothes destroyed but
also some sweet boobs.

Was I sleeping too much?\!
Too little?\!
Does God want me to be naked?

If I go to sleep again can I get even bigger
boobs?

Sunday school never prepared me for this
kind of theological question!

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Devil — p1
passages.content:
Devil:
Are you ready to hear the new sermons,
mortal?

The twisted words that will spread darkness
throughout the land?

passages.name: Church ARG Dark 1 — Devil — p2
passages.content:
Devil:
Okay, yes, respect and kindness is good and
all, but remember to talk about sex too!

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1
passages.content:
Locked.

Angel:
Mortal, trepass not upon the inner sanctum!

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Devil — p1
passages.content:
Devil:
I still can't believe you chose Miss Prudish
McGee over this beautiful cleavage.

Watch, I bet he's not going to even mention
sex *once* in his speech!

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Devil — p2
passages.content:
Devil:
Ugh, light goddesses.\!
So sickly sweet they make my teeth hurt.

And not in that fun "I'm about to bite someone"
way either.

Though I may bite someone anyway.

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Priest cosplay — p1
passages.content:
Preacher:
Hah, yes, want to hear my new material?

I figure, all the generic sermons I was giving
have gotten old. I should take it in a new
direction, do some worldbuilding, build up a
consistent mythos.

He pulls a blue bishop's hat out of his bag and
puts it on, not noticing his hair start to 
lengthen.

I figure to start off, let's say that I'm following,
oh, your generic fantasy goddess of light.

He thinks for a minute, as his growing hair 
slowly shades towards pink.

What's a good generic name?\!
Light, light\..\..\..\..
Let's go with Lumina.

And I-

He picks up a flimsy looking plastic staff from
where it was leaning against the altar.

-Am her bishop!

He waves it around, not noticing as it starts to
shift to real wood and metal.\!
The hand holding it begins to slim down as
well.

I still need to put together more of the
costume-

His voice is rising in pitch as he speaks, as
his face begins to soften.

-But I've got a good start!

He pulls a blue shawl out of his bag and throws
it around his shoulders.

It settles inward much more than it seems it
should, molding itself around a slimmer body
and breasts that weren't there a moment ago.

She doesn't seem to notice as a short skirt
drops out of the bottom, swinging around
significantly slimmer legs.

Yes, I think this will do well!

She waves her staff and strikes a pose.

Preacher:
Dearest Lumina, grant us your light!

Preacher:
No, that one's a bit too generic...

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Priest cosplay — p2
passages.content:
Preacher:
Dearest Lumina, grant us your light!

Preacher:
No, that one's a bit too generic...

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1
passages.content:
Listener:
I know this isn't a real church.\!
And he's not a priest, he's just really into
cosplay.

But it's so relaxing to just sit here and listen
to him talk.

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Sleeper — p1
passages.content:
She's taking a nap on one of the benches.

Sleepy Person:
Augh!

I'm sorry God! I'm sorry!\!
I won't sleep in church again!

She looks down at herself.



Sleepy Angel:
Though, uh\..\..\..\..
Now I've got nice tits and wings?

Am I *supposed* to be sleeping in church?

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Sleeper — p2
passages.content:
Sleepy Angel:
So I've been given a divine mission to tell
people to sleep in church?
I guess?

So, uh, yeah. Sleep through boring sermons.
God commands it.

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Angel — p1
passages.content:
Angel:
Are you ready, mortal?\!
Ready to see the light of truth and beauty
once more shine upon the world?

passages.name: Church ARG Light 1 — Angel — p2
passages.content:
Angel:
Generic?!\!
You would be blessed to be granted a touch
of divine light!

passages.content:
Employee:
Where did all these boulders come from?

passages.name: Sauna Real — Fire — p1
passages.content:
You pour a potion on the fire.

A wave of pink smoke gushes out, obscuring
the room for a moment.

Gym Member:
What was that?

I don't know what you did, but I feel amazing!

passages.name: Sauna Real — Fire — p2
passages.content:
You pour another potion on the fire, but it
doesn't seem to do much.

passages.name: Sauna Real — Gym member — p1
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Nothing like a nice sauna after a workout.

She adds a ladle of water to the heater at the
center of the room, sighing happily as more
steam gushes out.

Ah, so nice.

passages.name: Sauna Real — Gym member — p2
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Nothing like a nice sauna after a workout.

She adds a ladle of water to the heater at the
center of the room, sighing happily as more
steam gushes out.

It feels even better now!

passages.name: Sauna Real
passages.content: Water to pour on the heater and make steam.

passages.name: Sauna Real
passages.content:
Cowgirl:
Mooooh.

She blinks dazedly.

Cowgirl:
I like the sauna after a day at the farm, but I
wish she would stop adding so much steam.

I'm not sure I can take much mooore.

passages.name: Sauna Real — Bowsette
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ahhh, the heat feels so good.

She breathes a contented puff of fire.

passages.content:
Lava Elemental:
Yes...\!
Yes...

Pour more water on me!\!
Tell me I've been a bad girl!\!
Make me hurt!

The elemental looks eagerly at your potion
as you approach.

Lava Elemental:
Yes! \.Yes!\!
Pour it on me!

She gives a throaty groan of pure pleasure
as release your load onto her.

A wave of pink smoke gushes out, obscuring
the room for a moment.

Gym Member:
What was that?

I don't know what you did, but I feel amazing!

Make me hurt!

Ooooooo\..\..\..\..\..
So good\..\..\..\..

Nothing like a nice sauna after a workout.

She adds a ladle of water to the heater at the

I deserve it!
I've been so bad~!

Gym Member:

passages.content: Such majesty...

passages.name: Weight room - former tile puzzle — Car person
passages.content:
She's running on a treadmill.

Driver:
This isn't as fun as the open road, but it's a
lot more convenient.

passages.name: Goddess room ARG
passages.content:
There's a poster on the wall with a bunch of
different workout plans.\!
One is circled.

DAILY WORKOUT:\!
100 SITUPS\!
100 PUSHUPS\!
RUN 1 MILE

Except someone has crossed out all the 
numbers and replaced them with "INFINITY".

passages.name: Goddess room ARG — Goddess — p1
passages.content:
A woman is sitting here doing situps.

Two hundred and forty seven million seven
hundred eighty eight thousand and ONE!\!
Two hundred and forty seven million seven
hundred eighty eight thousand and TWO!

passages.name: Goddess room ARG — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
You see a figure doing crunches in the middle
of the room.

Goddess Fittina:
Two hundred and forty seven million seven
hundred eighty eight thousand and ONE!

Two hundred and forty seven million seven
hundred eighty eight thousand and TWO!

Guardian Hana:
Aw man dude, looks like she's still going.\!
I really hate to interrupt her.

Let's come back later bros, I'm sure she'll be
done by then.

Kaede:
Hana, we hath told you that our mission is of
the utmost importance!\!
A new dark goddess hath arisen!

Guardian Hana:
I know dude, I know. You're my bro and all,
but I just really hate breaking my Goddess's
flow!

She's been at this so long, I'm sure she'll be
done soon.\!
Another century or two, tops.

Kaede:
Time is of the essence!

Come now Hana, you have built thy thews 
to such bulging perfection.\!
Art thou telling me that thou hast trained thy
muscles but not thy spine?

Guardian Hana:
You're right dude.\!
You're right!

Gotta give it a try.

Guardian Hana:
Oh great goddess, She Who Puts The Bulk In
Our Lats And The Mass In Our Delts, I have 
brought you a supplicant.

Goddess Fittina:
Oh hey Hana!\.\.
\}Two hundred and forty seven million seven
hundred eighty eight thousand and EIGHT!

Always good to see you!\.\.
\}Two hundred and forty seven million seven
hundred eighty eight thousand and NINE!

But I'm in the middle of my reps, could you get 
them to come back later?\.\.
\}Two hundred and forty seven million seven
hundred eighty eight thousand and TEN!

Guardian Hana:
And there you have it dudes.\!
Come on, I'm sure it won't be more than
another decade or two.

\N[2]:
Isn't there at least some way to tell how long
it will be?\!
How many times is she doing that?

Guardian Hana:
Oh right!\!
We can check-

She pauses dramatically.

The Sacred Workout Plan!

She leads you over to the other side of the
room.

Guardian Hana:
Here it is dude!\!
Bask in its glory!

You take a look.\!
It's got a lot of different routines, but one is
circled.

Today's Workout:
100 Situp

passages.name: Goddess room ARG — p1
passages.content:
You hear a loud commotion as you step out
into the hallway.

Voice 1:
-But where did all these boulders *come* 
from?!?

Voice 2:
The running track is covered in them!

Voice 3:
We've had another injury! Someone tripped 
over another boulder!

Voice 4:
Two more!

Voice 1:
THAT'S IT!\!
We are shutting down the center until we can
get these boulders out of the way!

EVERYONE OUT!

You try not to look guilty as you head home.

Exercising Man:
Okay, I've done fifty situps. How many more?

The other man checks the poster on the wall.

Spotter:
Uh, let's see...

He starts counting on his fingers.

Spotter:
\}Infinity minus fifty...\!
Carry the one...\!
\{Infinity!

Maybe you shouldn't have left that poster up.

Sealed by a mysterious force.

A lock.

You can hear movement inside.\!
Sounds like something is still being set up.

Science has no words to describe how
locked this door is.

INSERT KEYCARD.

You've lost track of whether that's mysterious

passages.name: Goddess Hallway ARG 4 — Gregory — p2
passages.content:
Player SocraticMachine:
Ah, the final tester arrives!\!
I just completed my checkout, and Brad is
still upstairs.

Words cannot express how amazing this 
experience has been.\!
These few days have been simply 
transcendant.

For once I will be awarding a game a ten out
of ten!

I can only imagine your experience was as
amazing?

Your eye twitches.\!
You're not sure what's showing on your face,
but it makes Gregory rapidly backpedal.

Player SocraticMachine:
Or not!\!
That's fine too!

You let them know that no, you have not been
having the best time.

Player SocraticMachine:
That's too bad.\!
I'd tell you to keep playing and it would get
better, but sadly the beta is over.

You let them know that you've had a pretty 
good time, though you wouldn't call it amazing
or anything.\!
A solid seven out of ten.

Player SocraticMachine:
It seems all of our experiences were different.\!
It's incredible how much they customized the
play experience for each of us!

You respond with just as much enthusiasm.\!
A few minutes pass while you happily discuss
your favorite parts of the game.

Player SocraticMachine:
I'm amazed that almost none of our
experiences overlapped!\!

I wonder how they'll maintain that level of 
customization in the full release.

passages.name: Goddess Hallway ARG 4 — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Fittina:
So this is the path to that dark goddess?

She taps on the elevator.

Guardian Hana:
Yeah bro, the other goddesses said it's
unbreakable.

The goddess cracks her knuckles.

Goddess Fittina:
We'll see about that.

Goddess Fittina:
Hmm.

Goddess Fittina:
How about...

Goddess Fittina:
That is sturdy.

She shakes out her fist.

Goddess Fittina:
I don't think I can get through this, dude.

You know what that means!

They high-five.

Together:
Time to get more swole!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Entrance clerk — p1
passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Welcome to the community center!\!
We've got all sorts of workout machines, game
courts, and a pool!

We also have regular classes, so feel free to
check out the schedule in the back to see if 
there's anything you're interested in.

passages.content:
Entrance Clerk:
Hi!\!
I'm afraid we're closed at the moment, as we
do some cleaning up.

In apology, we're offering complimentary boulders!

Hi!\!
Feel free to use any of the facilities that 
aren't covered in giant rocks.

We're cleaning up as fast as we can.

As compensation, feel free to take as many

*Please*.

courts, and a pool!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Autorun event — p1
passages.content:
A voice suddenly bellows from above.

\{Guardian:
HALT, MORTAL!

Well, this seems familiar.

\{NONE SHALL PASS!

\N[2]:
Here, let me! Kaede's been teaching me how
to talk to spirits.

\N[2]:
Hail, noble spirit! We dost desire entrance
for tasks of world-shattering importance!

\N[2]:
Dost thy havest some task which thou 
mightest setest us, to display ourst valor and
worth?

Guardian:
Uh, dude, I'm not quite sure what you're
saying?

But Fittina, Swolest of the Swole, Mightiest of
the Mighty, She Whose Flexes Make The World
Tremble And Abs Make Angels Cry, is currently
doing her reps.

Normally I'd say she'd be done soon dude,
but these have been going on for a while.\!
I guess she's really feeling the burn.

And it's not cool to interrupt.\!
She's got to focus to get those sick gains!

\N[2]:
Forgivest our intrusion, but we mustest 
discourse with her!

Guardian:
Seriously, does one of you dudes speak
English or anything?

I'm not quite vibing with this whole "est" 
speak.

\N[4] shoves \N[2] out of the way.

\N[4]:
Let someone with *actual* experience 
commanding spirits handle this.

She turns to the guardian.

\N[4]:
You there!\.\. Let us through.

Guardian:
Uh, no?\!
Dude, I just explained how Fittina, Muscular
Be Her Name, is not to be disturbed.

\N[4]:
I *said*, let us through.

Guardian:
Dude, no!

\N[4]:
Well, there's your problem.\!
This spirit's defective.

She flops down on a chair.

Kaede:
Well, it seems that such a sorry situation calls
for mine guidance.

Guardian:
Dude?\!
Dude!!

Guardian:
Dude, Kaede, is that you?\!
I should have recognized all that ancient 
garbage must have come from you!

She turns to \N[2].

Guardian:
You really don't need all those fancy words to
talk to spirits.\!
Just a handshake and a willingness to be bros!

She turns back to Kaede.

Guardian:
Dude, it's been centuries!\!
How have you been?\!
It's me, Hana!

Kaede:
Hana?! Does thou jest? When last I saw you-

Guardian:
I was a puny weakling?\!
Yeah!

Since then I've gotten

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Oni — p1
passages.content:
She puts a hand on your shoulder and stares
deep into your eyes.

Guardian Hana:
I believe in you man.\!
You can move!\. That!\. Heavy!\. Thing!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Oni — p2
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
You can do it dude! Don't let your puny 
muscles get you down!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Oni — p3
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
So dude, what's your plan?\!
You ready to give up this whole quest thing
and GET\.\. SWOLE?

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Oni — p4
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Dude, what are you waiting for?\!
Go get changed so we can get started!

Guardian Hana:
Don't worry dude, I got you covered.\!
This is a full service trial! No outside items
needed!

Guardian Hana:
Dude?\!
Dude. Dude!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Oni — p5
passages.content:
She puts a hand on your shoulder and stares
deep into your eyes.

Guardian Hana:
I believe in you man.\!
You can move!\. That!\. Heavy!\. Thing!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Boulder — p1
passages.content:
You give the boulder a good push.\!
...\!
...\!
...

Nothing happens.

That's,\. uh,\. it's surprisingly heavy.

Guardian Hana:
Come on dude, you can do it!\!
Just tighten your core!

Gritting your teeth, you put your shoulder to
it and *shove*.

...It slides maybe an inch.

But you dig in your heels and slowly,
a\.g\.o\.n\.i\.z\.i\.n\.g\.l\.y, it\. begins\. to\. move.

Guardian Hana:
Dude, if you're having this much trouble
already, I'm not sure you're up for the trials.

Like, I know this is important to you, but I
just don't think you can manage it.

Look, I know exactly what I can do for you.\!
Fittina isn't just for the already swole!\!
She helps those who want to bring their inner
swoleness out, too.

So let's just give up on talking to her while 
she's doing her reps, and we'll sit down and
figure out an exercise plan for you.

She looks you up and down.

Guardian Hana:
I know *exactly* how to build you up.\!
And I've got just the most awesome recipe
for protein shakes dude.

I swear, in six months, nine months *tops*,
you'll be flinging these boulders around like
they were nothing.

And that should impress Fittina enough that
you won't even need to pass some dumb old
trials.

Kaede takes a step forward.

Kaede:
Hana, I know thou dost love to help others 
bulge thy thews, but might I suggest-

Guardian Hana:
Now Kaede dude, you know getting swole is
all sacred and junk to Fittina. Let them make
their own decision.

Just, give them a sec to think about it.

Kaede sighes and steps back.

Guardian Hana:
Just talk to me when you've chosen.

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Boulder — p2
passages.content:
You push against the boulder.\!
It refuses to move.

You're just a little worn out, okay?

passages.name: Entrance ARG — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Hero, thou shouldst not leave whilst there is 
still a chance of seeing the goddess!

Hero, thou shouldst not leave whilst there is

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Kaede 2 — p2
passages.content:
Kaede:
Verily, thou must seize this chance!\!
The goddesses have proclaimed Fittina's help
to be vital!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Kaede 2 — p3
passages.content:
Kaede:
If only Fittina was not doing her sacred 
exercises!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Elina 2 — p2
passages.content:
\N[2]:
There are legends of heroes performing great
feats of strength. I'm sure you can match
them!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Elina 2 — p3
passages.content:
\N[2]:
You should do what you think best hero, but
I don't think we have months to address 
Arcadia?

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Oni 2 — p2
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
You can do it dude! Don't let your puny 
muscles get you down!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Oni 2 — p3
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
So dude, what's your plan?\!
You ready to give up this whole quest thing
and GET SWOLE?

You know what?\.\.\. Screw this stupid game.\|
Time for something real.

You throw yourself into training.

Hana turns out to be an amazing trainer, always
pushing you just enough past your limits to
grow.

She knows everything else about building up,
too.\!
Protein shakes, smoothies, all the fuel you 
need.

And she helps you center yourself.\!
Ignore all distractions.\!
Really focus on the important things.

All those meaningless worries that other
people have? Like wealth, or status, or how a 
dark goddess took over town hall and 
declared the city a sexocracy?

You leave those all behind in pursuing what
*really* matters.

And you get fit.

Ripped.

\{SWOLE.

// Resistant branch

Until one day you have reached your peak.

You concentrate.

You flex.

And your muscles bulge so hard they rip apart
every unwanted spell on you.\!
(As well as perhaps a few other things.)

And then you go back to exercising.\.\.
Gotta get those reps in, man!

                     Ending 19
                 Muscles > Magic

// Accepting branch

Until one day you're ready.

You stride back into Terra Games.

The seal on the elevator shatters with a single
punch from your perfectly sculpted biceps.\!
The elevator shatters too, but that's okay. A
single hop takes you up to the next floor.

You march onward.\!
Doors and magical barriers shred around your
gleaming muscled form like tissue paper.

Until you finally reach the inner sanctum and
stand before Arcadia once more.

Dark Goddess Arcadia:
What are you-\.\. where have you been?!\!
You've missed so much content!

She looks you up and down.

Your perfect muscles gleam in the eldritch
glow coming off the computers.

Dark Goddess Arcadia:
And what *happened* to you?!\.\.
When did you get so,\.\. so-

You smile.\!
And \{FLEX.

A rumbling sound fills the air, as your muscles
pull on each other hard enough to shatter 
mountains.

Arcadia s

passages.content:

If I were in charge I would simply have not 
allowed the spirit to disobey me.

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Pride 2 — p3
passages.content:
\N[4]:
Congratulations.\!
You moved a rock.\!
You must be very proud.

passages.name: Entrance ARG
passages.content:
He is very slowly pushing a boulder to the
exit while muttering to himself.

Man:
It's free!\!
Free is always worth it!

Just keep at it!

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Boulder
passages.content: The boulder is too heavy to pick up.

passages.name: Entrance ARG
passages.content:
She's looking at a list of exercise classes.

Irritated Lamia:
Cycling...\!
Leg Day...

How Much Squats Would A Squatter Squat If 
A Squatter Could Squat Squats?!

They have *nothing* I can take!

Is... Is this bullying?

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Boulder
passages.content:
The boulder is too heavy to pick up.\!
And also covered in spit, ugh.

passages.name: Entrance ARG — Boulder doggirl
passages.content:
Excited Doggirl:
I've got this great idea!

There are all of these boulders around, right?

And boulders are like really big balls!

This is going to be amazing!

She gnaws on the boulder in excitement.

passages.name: Entrance ARG
passages.content: Weight Room

passages.name: Entrance ARG
passages.content: EXERCISE CLASSES

passages.name: Entrance ARG
passages.content: MAJESTY

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Autorun event old — p1
passages.content:
You stumble as you step into the locker room.\!
For a second your legs feel too short.

\N[4]:
That's a new look.

Guess that brute didn't want you to have to
push an extra set of boulders around.

Guess that brute didn't want you to have to
push an extra set of boulders around.

Guess you looked too flabby to that brute.

Like this you might even have a chance of
doing whatever stupid thing they come up 
with.

Kaede:
Hold thy tongue, knave!\!
The hero shalt overcome any task put before
them!

Or wast thine defeat not sign enough of their
valor?

\N[4] rolls her eyes.

\N[4]:
Defeating me showed that maybe the hero
has a *bit* of a brain.

But this is stupid dumb force. And an idiot like
that guardian is never going to be satisfied.

\N[4]:
Oh please.\!
Even an idiot can get in the way of a genius
plan like mine through sheer dumb luck.

But luck isn't going to help you push boulders
for a brute like that.

Kaede:
Thou varlet!

They start arguing loudly.

\N[2]:
\}I don't think this is what changing room is
supposed to mean...\{\!
You might want to go check in the mirror.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Autorun event old — p3
passages.content:
You stare at yourself in the mirror.

You look different.\!
Again.



At this point more changes just feel normal.

It's jarring to look in the mirror and see yet
another new face looking back at you.

On the bright side, you do seem to be wearing
workout clothes now.\!
And a workout body, for that matter.

Is this what sporty feels like?\.\.
Are you sporty now?

You do a quick exploration of your new body.\!
Yep, this all seems to be real.

In the mirror, you see \N[2] walk up.

Huh, your glasses are missing but somehow
you can still see her.

\N[2]:
How are you? I know you've been enjoying 
yourself, but this is still a pretty sudden
change.

\N[2]:
How are you? \.\. This is a pretty sudden
change.

But Fittina should be able to fix it.

\N[2]:
Just know that we're all doing everything we
can to help you get back to normal.

She pauses for a moment.

Just know that Kaede and I are...

She trails off again.

Well, I'm here for you.

....Let's go find that goddess?

Actually, this seems pretty interesting.\!
You've never had a chance to be ambiguously
sporty before!

\N[2] gives you a smile.

\N[2]:
I'm glad to hear it.

You shrug off the offered sympathy.\!
You don't need it from a part of the game that
did this to you.

\N[2] looks sad, but backs off.

You choose to keep whatever thoughts you
have on this most recent change to yourself.

After a moment's wait \N[2] sighs and 
backs away.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Exit Old — p1
passages.content:
You don't want to leave before checking a 
mirror.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Exit Old — p2
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
That's more like it!\!
Come on dude, the test awaits!

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Exit Old — p3
passages.content:
Your mouth really is feeling kind of dry. Maybe
go grab some water from the sink?

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Exit Old — p4
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Hey dude, ready for your next test?

Guardian Hana:
Let's go!

She leads you outside, to a long running track.

Okay, just give a shout when you are!

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Kaede — p2
passages.content:
Kaede and \N[4] are still arguing.

Kaede:
Thou whoreson zed! \!
Thou unnecessary letter! 

A rascal! An eater of broken meats!

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Kaede — p4
passages.content:
Kaede is looking thoughtful.

Kaede:
Truly, it hath been a dog's age since I saw
another of my kind.

Perhaps Hana has the right idea.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Pride — p2
passages.content:
\N[4]:
You're only proving me right you know.\!
If I were in charge this sort of insolence would
simply not be tolerated.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p1
passages.content:
The gym member takes a long satisfied 
drink, then notices you.

Gym Member:
Remember to always hydrate before your
workout!

She raises her bottle to you.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p2
passages.content:
The gym member takes a long satisfied 
drink, then notices you.

Gym Member:
Remember, it's important to always hydrate
during your workout!

She raises her bottle to you.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p3
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ah, nothing like a good drink after a workout.

She takes a drink with a satisfied smile.

Gym Member:
Always remember to hydrate after exercising!

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p4
passages.content:
The gym member smiles at you.

Gym Member:
Remember to hydrate after showering!

Gym Member:
Now if you'll excuse me, I need to go pee
forever.

passages.name: Locker room ARG
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Oh hi, haven't seen you around before!\!
Let me know if you want any advice on the
machines or anything!

It's always great to see someone new trying
out the gym.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p1
passages.content:
She's humming happily to herself while 
showering.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p2
passages.content:
The showering woman is muttering to herself.

\}Stupid social norms...\!
What if I don't want to shower after working
out...\!
What if I'm fine with just being smelly...

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p4
passages.content:
Gym Member:
I think it's better not to ask.

passages.name: Locker room ARG
passages.content:
// Should show up at end of trials

Gym Member:
Great workout today!\!
Do it again Tuesday?

Sweating Gym Member:
Yeah..\!
Sure..

She pants for a moment.

\}How are you still so energetic...

passages.name: Locker room ARG
passages.content:
// Should show up at end of trials

Gym Member:
Great workout today!\!
Do it again Tuesday?

Sweating Gym Member:
Yeah..\!
Sure..

She pants for a moment.

\}How are you still so energetic...

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p1
passages.content:
She's wincing as she changes clothes.

Sore Gym Member:
I hate Leg Day, but it does feel good when it's
over.

She winces again.

Sore Gym Member:
Though I really, *really* hate Leg Day.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — p2
passages.content:
She makes an attempt to stand, then sits
back down heavily.\!
She winces.

Sore Gym Member:
Okay, this is why I hate Leg Day.

She rubs painfully at her thigh.

Sore Gym Member:
Maybe just a little longer rest.

passages.content: You stare at yourself in the mirror.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Mirror — p3
passages.content: You check yourself out in the mirror.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Mirror — p4
passages.content: You look at yourself in the mirror.

passages.name: Locker room ARG
passages.content:
Showering Gym Member:
Ah, nothing like a nice long shower.

passages.content: You stare at yourself in the mirror.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Mirror — p3
passages.content: You check yourself out in the mirror.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes other — p1
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ready for yoga? I heard we're focusing on
goddess pose today!

Other Gym Member:
Sure, I guess?

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes other — p2
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Okay, yoga was a good warmup. Now on to
the exercises!

I'm thinking squats, maybe some lunges,
some knee thrusts...

Other Gym Member:
Do you ever want to do some, you know,
arm exercises maybe?

Her friend turns to look her straight in the
eye and replies in an incredibly serious voice.

Gym Member:
I am here to get the ass yoga has always 
promised me.\!
That's the goal.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes other — p3
passages.content:
One of the women is chanting softly to 
herself.

Gym Member:
Glutes glutes glutes, glutes glutes glutes!

Other Gym Member:
Don't you think we've done enough for the
day?

Gym Member:
Nah, I'm really feeling in the groove today!\!
Just a few more exercises.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes other — p4
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ah, that was such a good workout!

Her friend gives her a concerned look.

Other Gym Member:
I think you may have overdone it a bit with
your glutes...

The black-haired woman slaps her own ass
with a huge smile.

Gym Member:
No way, this is the butt I've always dreamed 
of!

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes other — p5
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ah, another day, another yoga class.

Her friend gives her a concerned look.

Other Gym Member:
Still?\!
Still?!

The black-haired woman slaps her own ass
with a huge smile.

Gym Member:
I gotta make sure to keep my figure!

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes — p1
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ready for yoga? I heard we're focusing on
goddess pose today!

Other Gym Member:
Sure, I guess?

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes — p2
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Okay, yoga was a good warmup. Now on to
the exercises!

I'm thinking squats, maybe some lunges,
some knee thrusts...

Other Gym Member:
Do you ever want to do some, you know,
arm exercises maybe?

Her friend turns to look her straight in the
eye and replies in an incredibly serious voice.

Gym Member:
I am here to get the ass yoga has always 
promised me.\!
That's the goal.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes — p3
passages.content:
One of the women is chanting softly to 
herself.

Gym Member:
Glutes glutes glutes, glutes glutes glutes!

Other Gym Member:
Don't you think we've done enough for the
day?

Gym Member:
Nah, I'm really feeling in the groove today!\!
Just a few more exercises.

passages.name: Locker room ARG — Glutes — p4
passages.content:
Gym Member:
Ah, that was such a good workout!

Her friend gives her a concerned look.

Other Gym Member:
I think you may have overdone it a bit with
your glutes...

The black-haired woman slaps her own ass
with a huge smile.

Gym Member:
No way, this is the butt I've always dreamed 
of!
