I can see you're uncertain. Maybe you're 
afraid.

But you must kn

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Bed — p3
passages.content:
You're not tired yet. There's a whole day of 
game playing ahead of you!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Bed — p4
passages.content: Go to sleep for the night?

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Bed — p5
passages.content:
You're not tired yet. There's a whole day of 
game playing ahead of you!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Bed — p6
passages.content:
Go to sleep for the night?

// Run cutscenes, if any need to be run. Remember to change this in 
both ARG and real if adding additional cutscenes.

// If the player has read Arcadia announcing herself on the forum, the 
next night Arcadia will create minions to go out and change things.

// Boolean to make sure only one cutscene is played per morning, 
even if the requirements for multiple are met.

Goddess Arcadia:
Hero!\!
My minions have reported that you spent all
today getting your rocks off!

I knew you'd start to enjoy yourself 
eventually!

You hear muffled whispers, and one or two
cries of "Burn!"

Goddess Arcadia:
\}What...\. What do you mean that's not what
they did? You said-\.\.
Wait, really?

She nervously clears her throat.

Goddess Arcadia:
Well, this still counts as my victory!\!
\}No I will not be taking any questions.

The feeling of her presence fades.

// Boolean to make sure only one cutscene is played per morning, 
even if the requirements for multiple are met.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina initial — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
...And when I woke up I had this!

She holds out...\.\. probably a microphone.\!
That's what it looks like underneath, but its
covered in so much sparkles and glitter and
ribbons that it's hard to make out.

\n[2]:
And it lets me do this!

She holds it up.

A swirl of colored lights surrounds her and
obscures her form.

\n[2]:
Magical Idol Power activate~!

Magical Idol Wand acquired!

Magical Idol class unlocked!

\n[2]:
Did you wake up with anything?

\n[4]:
Nothing but my usual seething hatred for 
the world.

\n[2]:
What about this?

She holds out a much plainer looking 
microphone.

\n[4]:
...Where did you find that.

\n[2]:
Oh, it was just under the couch.

\n[4]:
And?

\n[2]:
Inside a sealed box?

\n[4]:
Keep going.

\n[2]:
Inside another box, chained shut.

\n[4] just raises an eyebrow.

\n[2]:
Locked with three different padlocks.\!
With a sign on it saying "Do not open! Rabid
tiger inside!"

\n[4] sighs.

\n[2]:
Look, you can't have something like that and
expect me to *not* want to look inside!

She hands over the microphone.

\n[4] glares at her through the entire 
transformation sequence that follows.

Boring Normal Microphone reluctantly 
acquired!

Boring Normal Idol class even more 
reluctantly unlocked!

\n[4] stomps off.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride initial — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
...And when I woke up I had this!

She holds out...\.\. probably a microphone.\!
That's what it looks like underneath, but its
covered in so much sparkles and glitter and
ribbons that it's hard to make out.

\n[2]:
And it lets me do this!

She holds it up.

A swirl of colored lights surrounds her and
obscures her form.

\n[2]:
Magical Idol Power activate~!

Magical Idol Wand acquired!

Magical Idol class unlocked!

\n[2]:
Did you wake up with anything?

\n[4]:
Nothing but my usual seething hatred for 
everything here.

\n[2]:
What about this?

She holds out a much plainer looking 
microphone.

\n[4]:
...Where did you find that.

\n[2]:
Oh, it was just under the couch.

\n[4]:
And?

\n[2]:
Inside a sealed box?

\n[4]:
Keep going.

\n[2]:
Inside another box, chained shut.

\n[4] just raises an eyebrow.

\n[2]:
Locked with three different padlocks.\!
With a sign on it saying "Do not open! Rabid
tiger inside!"

\n[4] sighs.

\n[2]:
Look, you can't have something like that and
expect me to *not* want to look inside!

She hands over the microphone.

\n[4] glares at her through the entire 
transformation sequence that follows.

Boring Normal Microphone reluctantly 
acquired!

Boring Normal Idol class even more 
reluctantly unlocked!

/n[4] stomps off.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Escaped cat — p1
passages.content:
There's a cat sleeping in your kitchen.

How did she even get here?

You give Felix a call, and he shows up to
collect the cat.

Shelter Head Felix:
Oh hello Rip Van Winkle.\!
Did you have a good nap?

He coaxs her into a carrier, where she
immediately goes back to sleep.

Thank you!\!
That's \v[143] out of 3 cats rescued!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Iterate day — p2
passages.content:
You wake up slightly during the night when
something soft and warm slips into your bed.\!
Purring, it lulls you back to sleep.

// Morning cutscenes. Each cutscene should be wrapped in its own 
chack for switch 160, so that only one can trigger.

You are brushing your teeth when you hear a
noise.

Kaede:
Hero \n[10]! 'Tis done!

You gargle a question through your 
toothbrush.

You gargle a question through your 
toothbrush.

Kaede:
Thy domicile now hast what any true home
requires: a bath!

And as I am a gracious host, I desire to share
it with all.\!
Cease thy nightly ablutions, the time has come
for water and carousing!

You follow her in.

Your glasses briefly fog up as you enter the 
steamy room.

\n[4]:
I didn't think it was possible, but fuzzbrain's
actually made a pretty nice bath.

You have to agree. Somehow, she's managed
to transplant a small forest clearing to your
apartment.

Steaming water bubbles up from the ground, 
collecting in a small pool before flowing off to 
the north.  

Warm mist gently wafts between the soft grass,
more comfortable than any carpet.

You all stare for a moment in wonder.

Kaede:
Come all, 'tis not an experience to be taken
with thine eyes alone!\!
To the bath!

She leaps into the spring, shedding her clothes
as she does.

Kaede:
Come, all that we needst for a most joyous
time ist here!

The water, to sooth aches and pains of body
and mind both!\!
The forest, to calm the mind and lull the 
spirit!

She raises a bottle.

Kaede:
And no carouse wouldst be complete without 
the libations!

Let us toast ourselves, our heroics, and the 
goddesses themselves!

\n[4]:
Yeah, sure, why not.

She walks to the other side of the pool, 
collecting a bottle from Kaede as she goes.

\n[4]:
It's no magma pool, but I gotta admit this is
pretty refreshing.

\n[2]:
That is nice!

Kaede:
Come fine Hero \n[10], 'tis
plenty of room!

The hot water is looking pretty incredible.\!
Your apartment doesn't even have a tub; it's
been forever since you've

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Underwear — p1
passages.content:
You quickly gather up your clothes and stuff 
them in your laundry basket.

Kaede:
Hey!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Smaller clothes pile — p1
passages.content:
You quickly gather up your clothes and stuff 
them in your laundry basket.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride bath — p1
passages.content:
\n[4] is staring into her bottle.

\n[4]:
I'm fine.\!
Go away.

She takes a big drink.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride bath — p2
passages.content:
\n[4] is staring into her bottle.

\n[4]:
They're all fools.\!
Foolish fools.\!
The most foolish.

The spirits...\!
The goddesses...

She hiccups drunkenly.

What's even the point?!

She chugs a bunch of her bottle.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride bath — p3
passages.content:
\n[4] is ranting drunkenly.

\n[4]:
You don't get it!

She grabs at \n[2].

\n[4]:
It's all so-\. *hic*\. pointless!\!
Me, you, everything!\!
All for nothing!

She finishes her bottle and tosses it to the 
side.

\n[2] pats her gently on the back.

\n[2]:
There, there.\!
Sometimes things go wrong.\!
Something can still be salvaged.

I don't think the alcohol is doing you any good
right now though.\!
Maybe you've had enough to drink?

\n[4]:
You've had enough to drink!

She grabs \n[2]'s bottle and chugs it.

\n[2]:
That's not...\!
Look, everything will look better if you get 
some sleep and sober up.

Let's get you to bed, okay?

\n[4] squints at her.

\n[4]:
\n[2], yer always so nice...\!
You should stop that.\!
Never got anyone anywhere.

She giggles drunkenly.

\n[4]:
It's foolish, but yer such a good friend.\!
Kind of friend.\!
Friendquaintance.

She slumps against \n[2].

\n[4]:
And what does friendship even mean, when 
it's all been written for you?!

Nothing.\!
Nothing earned.\!
Pointless.

She makes a grab for another bottle, but 
\n[2] pulls it out of her reach.

\n[4]:
No!\!
Booze!\!
Booze is my only friend!

She flails uselessly for a moment, too drunk
to think of standing up.

Finally she slumps down, defeated.\!
\n[2] gently rubs her back.

\n[2]:
Look, let's get you to bed.\!
Everything will look better tomorrow.

She starts to help the stumbling \n[4]
out of the room.\!
As she passes, she glances at you.

\n[2]:
You might want to finish up soon too.\!
Try... try not to follow her example?

She continues on.\!
You can still hear their voices as they leave.

\n[4]:
Time to sleep on the floor again.\!
Like a loser.\!
Just what I deserve.

\n[2]:
It's okay, you can have the couch tonight.

\n[4]'s voice brightens.

\n[4]:
Decadent luxury!

Then falls.

\n[4]:
That I never earned.\!
So much for pride...

Their voices fade into the distance.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Boulder
passages.content: Huh, so that's where the boulder went.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
I guess Kaede did say she was going to make
a bath...

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina after bath — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
A hot springs of our own!\!
This is so exciting, I've never gotten to witness
the results of a sacred ritual like this before.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina after bath — p2
passages.content:
\n[2]:
I've rethought all of the things I was planning
to investigate!\!
...And I still want to try most of them.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina bath — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
This is amazing!\!
A hot spring of our very own!

She takes a small sip of her bottle.

\n[2]:
I think we're all going to enjoy this in the 
future!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Kaede bath — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Ah, 'tis not truly a home until one may taketh
a bath within.

Come hero \n[10], sit and relax 
a nonce!

Take a break and relax for a bit?

You sit back and bask in the delicious warmth
for a bit longer.\!
Kaede tosses you another bottle every so
often.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Kaede bath — p2
passages.content:
Kaede:
Ah, \n[10], \n[2] and I wert just 
discoursing upon the spring and the glories 
of mine goddess.

Wilst thou sit back and enjoy with us for a 
nonce?

Take a break and relax for a bit?

You lean back and relax as the two of them
continue to chat.\!
Time passes.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Kaede bath — p3
passages.content:
Kaede:
Ah, bounteous \n[10], return once thou
hast spoken with the others.

Methinks that shalt be a better time for
conversing.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Kaede bath — p4
passages.content:
Kaede:
So.\!
Hero.

Kaede:
It seems we art alone now.

Her voice is much deeper, huskier than she
usually talks.

Kaede:
There ist a reward often given to those who
have most well served the goddess.

Her face is a little flushed, but she shows no
other signs of the drinks she's gone through.

Kaede:
The holy joining of two bodies.\!
The pleasure that one might grow and blossom
within another.

The art and joy and wonder of coupling.

Oh most valorous \n[10], mightest I grant you 
Great Florauna's most sacred union?

She gives you a deep and sultry smile, playing
with the ties of her top.

Do you accept her offer?

Kaede licks her lips.

Kaede:
Ah, thou shalt not regret this \n[10].\!
I hast desired this since I first laid eyes upon 
thee.

And thy ever more comely form hast been
but a spice upon it.

Now lay back and let a master work.

You lean back against the wall of the pool,
massive breasts floating in the water in front
of you, and tentatively spread your legs.

You lean back against the wall of the pool
and tentatively spread your legs.

Kaede kisses you, the faintest ghost brush of 
softness on your lips and the phantom of a 
seeking tongue, before diving down.

The first gentle touches are hard to tell from 
the motion of the water.

Unfamiliar anatomy reacts in unfamiliar ways,
and you're not used to what it feels like when
you fully open yourself up.

But the gentle brushes, the featherlight
pressure and the soft friction, soon become 
noticeable.\!
And only builds from there.

It's not long before you're squirming, unable
to stay still as each touch comes at just the
right time to build on the one before.

But the hands and lips of your new lover stay
with you no matter how much you move, each
touch faint but somehow perfectly placed.

Pleasure surges through you, unfamiliar
anatomy played like a harp and you are the
string.

You moan and twist and strain for more,
carried up to the very peak of pleasure and
held there for an unmeasurable, excruciating,

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride — p1
passages.content:
\N[4]:
...Still worth it.\!
Did you see the look on fuzzbrain's face?!

You did.\!
But anyway, \n[4] seemed really bitter during 
the dream, is she okay?

\N[4]:
Am I doing okay?\!
Am I doing okay?!

Everything I ever planned for has been 
snatched from my grasp!

I've been tied eternally to a gaggle of fools,
dragged around to be just another pawn in
the game of the goddesses!

Of *course* I'm not okay!

You wince.

You let her know that honestly, it was never 
your intention for her to get forced into your 
party.\!
You're sorry it's been so bad for her.

Though you have no idea how you could
even begin to release her.

\..\..\..\..\..And you're a little worried she'd just
go straight back to trying to overthrow the 
goddesses if you did.

You still need their help.

\N[4]:
Yeah.

She gives a bitter laugh.

\n[4]:
Yes, joining your party was never my intention
either.

Though you probably prefer it to being my 
humiliated stepping stools to ascension, as I 
was planning.

\}Literal stepping stools, it would have been
so sweet.

And I would be vastly better than the gold-
addled idiot currently running the underworld.

She shakes her head, then pulls herself
together a little.

\n[4]:
Still...\!
I guess...

There exist possible worlds where things could
have been at least infinitesimally worse.\!
Like if I was bound to fuzzbrain instead.

\n[4]:
Though I guess you're not the *worst* I could
have been tied to.

You're actually-\! 
surprisingly-\! 
*very* surprisingly-

not completely horrible.

I could be bound to much worse situations.

You're actually kind of a decent person?

She sighs.

\n[4]:
And honestly, it’s not like it’s really your fault.\! 
If you weren’t the hero, some other chump 
would be doing it.  

The goddesses needed a tool to play their 
games.

Speaking of games...

Does she know she's in one?

She's got to know, right?

No, she probably doesn't.\!
How would she?

You should tell her.\!
You really should tell her.

Oh god, this is going to be so

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride — p2
passages.content:
\n[4] is looking frazzled.

\N[4]:
Ugh, when I'm in power all existential crises
are going to be banned.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride — p4
passages.content:
\n[4] is sitting groggily on the floor.

\n[4]:
Ugh...\!
My head...

\N[4]:
No!\!
Even the couch is kind of crappy to sleep on.

Can't you get us rooms or something?\!
There's a furniture place in the department
store, try there.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Boulder — p1
passages.content:
No!\!
There is a boulder in the way!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Blocker
passages.content:
The stream stretches off into the forest, 
swiftly vanishing into the mist that rises from
the steaming water.

Wandering blindly into that strikes you as the
sort of thing every fairy tale has ever warned
you about.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Kaede after Miku — p1
passages.content:
This seems oddly familiar.

Kaede:
Ugh\..\..\..\..\..\..
I had the most horrible dream\..\..\..

Kaede:
And you were there...

And you were there...

And you were there...

\n[4]:
Not a dream, furbrain!\!
How does it feel to be the most worthless 
member of the team!

\n[2]:
Now, surely she-

\n[4]:
I'll sum it up for you and the idiot!\!
Now, how long would you say you were
holding off the dark goddess?

\n[2]:
It couldn't have been more than a few hours.

...Honestly, it's very sad how she kept falling
for "hey look, a happy human!"...

\n[4]:
Right!\!
So you: Foiled an evil goddess's plans for
hours.

Me: set up a whole encampment, gathered
and organized all the people and resources
to get inside, and was well on my way to
joining you.

And tails-for-brains here: come on, tell us
what you did.

Kaede sniffs.

Kaede:
I most doughtily led the hero to join the fight,
and then cunningly solved the dire riddle
which had vexed thee far past thy-

\n[4]:
Right! Fuzzbrain somehow took hours to find
the GIANT MAGICAL CASTLE in the MIDDLE 
OF THE CITY, then read a sign!

Wait...\!
They were all in the dream with you.

Do they sleep?\!
Where do they sleep?

\n[4]:
The darkness of night cloaks my schemes
from the eyes of fools.

I would have to have brains made of fuzz to
waste that time sleeping!

Kaede:
Sleep is a mortal weakness. Mine body is 
sustained by the Great Goddess's grace, and
needs naught else!

\n[4]:
...Perfectly fine, happy schemes.\!
That you don't have to worry about.

\n[2]:
We play rock-paper-scissors to see who gets
the couch.\!
Losers sleep on the floor.

Kaede:
Truly, dost thou have no comprehension of
preserving a sense of mystique? Of allure?!

\n[4]:
Hah!\!
Those are the words of a loser who's never
gotten the couch!

Kaede:
Hold thy tongue, knave!\!
As if thou hast done much better!

\n[4]:
The night I slept on the couch was the best
sleep I ever had.\!
Gazing down at you struggling on the floor.

\n[2] whispers to you.

\n[2]:
(They are both so,

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Bottle 2
passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Blocker — p1
passages.content:
You don't want to leave the hotspring while
the party is still going on!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG
passages.content:
Kaede is proudly looking at the hotsprings.

Kaede:
Ah, 'tis a joyous thing indeed to gaze upon the
work of thine own hands and find it good.

And speaking of the word of mine own hands,
simply say the word if thou wishes another 
tumble, dearest \n[10].

She winks.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Bottle 2
passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina bath — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
How did you make this, you have to tell
me!

Was it an arcane working?\!
Did you call on the vigor of the earth to raise
the trees, and conjure forth water from the
air itself?

Or did you summon a workforce of bound
spirits?\!
Mystical creatures which could use their secret
arts to craft an entire forest inside?

Kaede:
Twas notthing so fancy.\!
It required but an ounce of hard work and the 
ever flowing blessings of the goddess.

\n[2] makes a note.

\n[2]:
Sacred\..\..\.. ritual.\!
Got it!

Kaede waves her bottle around at the spring.

Kaede:
Truly, thou shouldst have known that such a 
pleasant grove descended from the great
lady of blossoming.

Look! Tis her blessings laid out for all to see!

The water as everflowing as her kindness.\!
The spring as warm as her love.\!
And the grass as soft and welcoming as her
bountiful chest!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina bath — p2
passages.content:
\n[2] is still taking notes.

\n[2]:
Bountiful\..\..\.. chest.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Bottle 2
passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina bath — p1
passages.content:
\n[4] is ranting drunkenly.

\n[4]:
You don't get it!

She grabs at \n[2].

\n[4]:
It's all so-\. *hic*\. pointless!\!
Me, you, everything!\!
All for nothing!

She finishes her bottle and tosses it to the 
side.

\n[2] pats her gently on the back.

\n[2]:
There, there.\!
Sometimes things go wrong.\!
Something can still be salvaged.

I don't think the alcohol is doing you any good
right now though.\!
Maybe you've had enough to drink?

\n[4]:
You've had enough to drink!

She grabs \n[2]'s bottle and chugs it.

\n[2]:
That's not...\!
Look, everything will look better if you get 
some sleep and sober up.

Let's get you to bed, okay?

\n[4] squints at her.

\n[4]:
\n[2], yer always so nice...\!
You should stop that.\!
Never got anyone anywhere.

She giggles drunkenly.

\n[4]:
It's foolish, but yer such a good friend.\!
Kind of friend.\!
Friendquaintance.

She slumps against \n[2].

\n[4]:
And what does friendship even mean, when 
it's all been written for you?!

Nothing.\!
Nothing earned.\!
Pointless.

She makes a grab for another bottle, but 
\n[2] pulls it out of her reach.

\n[4]:
No!\!
Booze!\!
Booze is my only friend!

She flails uselessly for a moment, too drunk
to think of standing up.

Finally she slumps down, defeated.\!
\n[2] gently rubs her back.

\n[2]:
Look, let's get you to bed.\!
Everything will look better tomorrow.

She starts to help the stumbling \n[4]
out of the room.\!
As she passes, she glances at you.

\n[2]:
You might want to finish up soon too.\!
Try... try not to follow her example?

She continues on.\!
You can still hear their voices as they leave.

\n[4]:
Time to sleep on the floor again.\!
Like a loser.\!
Just what I deserve.

\n[2]:
It's okay, you can have the couch tonight.

\n[4]'s voice brightens.

\n[4]:
Decadent luxury!

Then falls.

\n[4]:
That I never earned.\!
So much for pride...

Their voices fade into the distance.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Autorun — p1
passages.content:
The moment you step inside your apartment
there is a loud noise from your inventory.


                   \{\{POOF!

And your apartment is bigger!

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Old hotspring scene
passages.content:
Hehe...\!
Hehe...\!
This is so nice...

Just sitting in the hotspring...\!
Staring into space...

Kaede gestures grandly with her latest bottle,
spilling a little more into the water.

Kaede:
Thou speakest such truth!\!
Hot springs art one of the greatest gifts of
civilization!

She hiccups.

Kaede:
Thy apartment is now so much more a home!\!
So good.\!
So good.

She stares sadly into her bottle, then takes
another swig.

Kaede:
It couldst be more welcoming.\!
Alas, I lack the skill to makest furnishings as
well.

Florauna hast power over the wild!\!
Over springs, and growth, and blossoming,
and...

She takes another drink.

Kaede:
And fucking!\!
Yes, all the fucking.

Be it ever so short, or long and tender, or 
soft and sweet, or...

She trails off, then takes another drink to
collect her thoughts.

Kaede:
But why canst the goddess not have dominion
over beds as well?!

I mightest give mine third tail for a bed.\!
Thou canst not know the ache in mine 
nethers from sleeping on the cruel ground.

She pulls one of her tails in front of her and
gives it a pat.

Touch fluffy tail...\!
'Tis comfy indeed, 'tis true, but 'tis not a bed!

\n[2] takes a small sip from the bottle
she's been nursing.

\n[2]:
'Tis- wasn't there a furniture floor in the
department store?\!
Would they have something?

You motion for Kaede to toss you another 
bottle as you consider.

Aaah, that's the stuff.

Meanwhile, \n[4] is staring at her empty 
bottle.

\n[4]:
Look at you.

She hiccups drunkenly.

So empty.\!
No drive.\!
No motivation.

Such a foolish fool!\!
Just lying here when you could be out seizing
the world.

She takes a long drink from her second bottle.

It's okay.\!
You'll soon have friends.\!
Maybe together you can accomplish something.

Fools.

Later...

Kaede tosses you another bottle.

Your... second?\!
Third?

You're pretty sure you can't have had *that*
much.

It's nice though.\!
Adds a nice buzz.

And you think you can kind of taste it?\!
A little sweet.\!
A little musky.\!

passages.name: Door performance
passages.content:
Director:
Alright, places everyone!

And\..\..\..\..\.. lights!

Clouds considerately cover the sun.

Director:
Camera!

Miku:
Camera!

Director:
And action!

The director waves a hand, and the band 
marches in.

Clenches a fist, and calls for pyrotechnics.

The door slowly grinds open.

Kaede:
Forward!

Your companions head inside.

You could follow, but...\!
The concert is still going on.\!
Spending a little more time out here couldn't
hurt, right?

You enter the castle.

You would go inside, but they're just starting
another song, and you want to hear more.

And of course there's another song after that.

The singer looks like she's having so much
fun.\!
But what really catches your attention are the
special effects.

Wind!

Fireworks!

Being in space somehow!

And the images stay in your mind.

Even when you grumpily wake up the next
morning to find you're still Miku.\!
Just like everyone else nearby.

It's a little weird living in a city completely
full of Mikus, but you adjust.

Do what you can to distinguish yourself.

Just like everyone else.

Though some go a little too far to stand out.

(There's a brief attempt at nametags, but it
fails when everyone tries to go by "Miku").

In time though, the images still in your mind
lead you to join a band, like many other Mikus
across the city.

In your case, one of the big ones, putting on
huge complicated shows.\!
Not as a performer though.

No, have you seen some of the things they
wear?\!
There is no way anyone is ever getting you
in a skirt like that.

You join the backstage, running the lights and
tech and all.

Your experience fighting malfunctioning
electronics turns out to be really handy!

It's a good life.\!
And your band gets big!

It's one of the ones picked up by the actual 
Miku company, which *loves* having real
idols to show around.

(Though they're in an eternal legal battle with
the Mikus who go into porn.)

And you're always there in the back, running
the show!


Ending 21: Backstage

The singer l

passages.name: Castle inside — Autoplay event
passages.content:
Kaede:
-And 'twas mine guiding of the Hero which
led to our success!

\n[4]:
Did you leave your brains outside? The hero
would have found their way to the GIANT 
MAGIC CASTLE anyway!

Especially with my Mikus out patrolling the 
city!

Kaede:
Hmph, as if thou wouldst have been able to 
breach the walls of this fort without mine help.

Who couldst not solve the simple riddle of the
door?

\n[4]:
Oh, like you could have opened it. Remember,
the camp *I* organized had to perform.
Nothing would have happened without me!

What would you have done, tried to have sex
with the door until it opened just to get away?

Kaede:
Hero, please explain to this poor befuddled 
spirit the gravitas of mine contribution.

\n[4]:
Oh, of course you go whining to \n[10]!

While you're crying for them to kiss your
booboos I'm going to do something useful
and wake that dreamer!

Kaede:
Bestill thyself, varlet!

You sigh and follow.

Shortly afterwards...

Miku:
Coast is clear!\!
Come in everyone!

As you get further into the castle, you begin to
hear voices ahead.

You enter to a scene of Arcadia standing next
to a sleeping Miku.

Miku:
As I was saying, we could have a much more
reasonable conversation about this outside
the dream.

Let's just wake her up and we can discuss 
this calmly.

She pushes on the air in front of her.

Dark Goddess Arcadia:
And I was saying shut up!\!
I'm HELPING this human, and if you'd just 
stop being a whiny crybaby I could finish!

She begins to channel power.

Miku:
Is that a human behind you?\!
With a "we love Arcadia and everything she
does" sign?!

Arcadia breaks off from channeling power.

Dark Goddess Arcadia:
What?!\!
Where?!

Dark Goddess Arcadia:
Stop DOING that!!!

Miku:
If you would just let me-\.\.\.\^

Miku:
Oh thank the goddesses, finally someone else
is here.

Kaede:
You have our thanks, O doughty stranger!\!
'Tis a true sign of thy valor to have held so 
long, but thou mayst now retire!

A true hero hast come to save the day!

She gestures extra

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Bird feeder — p1
passages.content:
Bird Feeder:
I may not have much left to do with my days,
but at least the birds are always happy to see
me.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Bird feeder — p2
passages.content:
Bird Feeder:
The girls at the bank have been so nice
recently!

One of them shared her snacks with me and
I feel twenty years younger!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — p3
passages.content:
The door is locked.\!
They probably need time to calm the animals.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — p6
passages.content:
Locked.\!
You hope everyone is doing okay.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Alley entrance 2
passages.content:
You see a dark alley ahead. Probably not a
good place to go exploring.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Castle door
passages.content:
A slit opens up in the door.

Miku:
What's the passsong?

You give a quick rendition of the song, hoping
it is in fact this Miku's birthday.

Miku:
Wrong!\!
And I hate birthdays!

You give a quick rendition of the song.

Miku:
Wrong!\!
Today's program is brought to you by the 
letter F and the number Off!

Miku:
No entry without the right song!

You give a quick acapella rendition of the
song.\!
It's a little hard replicating the cannon blasts,
but you do your best.

Miku:
Wrong!

And scoring the overture for voices is a 20th
century adaptation which degrades the purity
of the instruments-only original!\!
I hate it!

Miku:
No entry without the right song!

She slams the slit closed.

What's the passsong?

Miku:
Wrong!\!

passages.content:
Cop:
Hey!\!
Open up!\!
This street isn't zoned for castles!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Escaped dog — p1
passages.content:
A dog is here eagerly sniffing at a dumpster.

You give Doug a call and he arrives a few
minutes later.

Shelter Head Doug:
Come on Daisy, good girls don't roll in trash.\!
We are going to have to give you such a bath
when you get back.

\v[144] out of 3 dogs rescued!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Shelter volunteer — p1
passages.content:
The woman is trying to see through the 
shelter door.\!
Your glasses turn on.

She turns as you approach.

Shelter Volunteer:
Thank you for coming! I'm worried that
something may have happened to Doug and 
Felix.

Some of us have been able to get inside to
feed the animals, but we haven't seen either
of them!

Given how they were last time you saw them,
she's probably right to worry.

Shelter Volunteer:
If only we knew where to start looking...

Huh, where could they be?\!
What about...\!
No, maybe...\!
Uh...

Crap, where should you start looking?\!
Normally this would be where some 
ridiculously busty creature shows up and tells 
you what to do!

Oh thank goodness.

????:
I'm here to help, nya!

\n[2]:
Who are you?\!
...\.Nya?

????:
I'm a lovely spirit of love and justice, nya!\!
I could feel the sadness energy from all the
cute puppies and kitties and peoplees!

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
No one should be that sad, nya!

Kaede:
And what dost thine aid require?

\n[2]:
(Are we supposed to nya? Is it polite?)

Kaede:
(Nay, 'tis impolite to nya if one knows not the
dialect.)

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
It's simple, nya!

Just form a contract with me and become a
magical warrior of love and justice and lovely
justice!\!
Gain the power to right these wrongs!

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
Of course, nya!

She takes a deep breath.

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
See, simple, nya!\!
Now all you need to do is swear a blood oath
on your soul and we can-

\n[4]:
Yeah, that's not happening.

\n[4]:
Let's do some contract negotiations, shall we?

She drags the catgirl away.

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
Help, nya!\!
This isn't loving at all!

\n[4]:
But it's sure going to be justice!

Several minutes pass.\!
You can occasionally hear Pride tearing into 
the spirit.

\n[4]:
-Never seen such an unbalanced, extortionate
contract! Do you think we're all simpletons
and fools?!

More minutes pass.

\n[4]:
-Not even specifying the powers? You really
t

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Shelter volunteer — p2
passages.content:
Shelter Volunteer:
Keep an eye out for Doug and Felix please!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Shelter volunteer — p3
passages.content:
Shelter Volunteer:
Doug and Felix just went by.\!
They said they'd be in tomorrow.

Thanks for finding them!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
So cozy.

She yawns.

Maybe I should get some coffee before 
heading home.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — p1
passages.content:
You see a dark alley ahead. Probably not a
good place to go exploring.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — p2
passages.content:
Panicked Employee:
Please don't tell anyone I snuck out.

There's no way I'm staying in there to get
attacked again.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Kyle — p1
passages.content:
Kyle:
Oh no oh no oh no.

He's staring at the box for the model robot he
just bought.

Kyle:
Batteries not included.\!
My gift for Darren needs to be perfect! It can't
be missing anything!

He turns to the department store.

Kyle:
It's okay Kyle. You can just go buy batteries.
It'll be fine.

He turns back.

Kyle:
But I shouldn't *need* to buy batteries!\!
It's fine, this is fine!

I don't need to make everything perfect, no
one will mind. No one.

Kyle:
...But what if he does?

Kyle:
He won't.

Kyle:
Unless...

Kyle:
Come on Kyle, just make a decision!\!
One or the other!

Kyle:
I'm stuck.\!
I-\. I just can't-

I just can't get the strength to move!\!
It'll all go wrong somehow!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Kyle — p2
passages.content:
Kyle:
I-\. I can't.

I just need a nudge.\!
The energy to choose!\!
Augh, why am I like this?!

He takes a deep breath.

Kyle:
No, no, this is fine.\!
I can just give this to Darren.

I wouldn't mind if he gave me this, so he
won't mind if I give him this.\!
He won't hate me forever for a single tiny
mistake.

He takes another deep breath, not noticing
his boxed robot starting to crackle with
electricity.

You have to shield your eyes as it grows 
brighter and brighter.

Kyle:
This will all be fine.\!
This is fine.\!
This is fine.

This is-\!
\{ALL SYSTEMS OPTIMAL

The light fades, revealing a changed Kyle.

Kyle:
I'm going to-

She jerks as she realizes her hands are 
empty.

Kyle:
Oh no.\!
Oh no oh no oh no.

She starts frantically patting herself down, 
searching for the box.

Kyle:
It can't be missing.\!
Oh god, how is it missing.

She checks the former location of her pockets,
her front...

Kyle:
Where?\!
Where?!\!
W- where...?

Her hands find something unexpected on her
chest.

Kyle:
What...?

She squeezes.

Kyle:
Ah!

She finally takes a look at herself.

Kyle:
Oh.\!
Oh!

Kyle:
Oh, I think Darren is going to enjoy this
even more than another model kit!\!
\}(I've seen those pictures on his computer.)

She gives her breasts another squeeze.\!
And smiles.

Kyle:
Ooo, I think I should go give him his present.\!
\}(I'm going to enjoy this more too.)

She happily walks away.

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Driver — p2
passages.content:
The man is staring blankly into the open hood
of the car.

Driver:
Why won't you start?

I gave you gas.\.\. I changed your oil.\!
Do you need a jump? \.\.A new battery?\|
A hug?

Driver:
Ow!\.\.
I don't need a jump, the car does!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Driver — p3
passages.content:
She's carefully rocking back and forth on her
wheels.

Driver:
So that's the brake...\|
That's the gas...

She starts, then blushes.

Driver:
And that must be the stick shift.

Driver:
Hee!\.\.
That tickles!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Dog walker
passages.content:
Dog walker:
Who's a good Poochie? You're a good Poochie!

passages.name: Street Real 2 — Car front — p2
passages.content:
A lightning bolt shoots from your fingers, and
you hear the car engine rumble to life.

But the energy keeps pouring out of you.

And then the stream of electricity arcs.

Driver:
Whaaaaaaaa!!!

The stream of electricity continues to pour
from your fingers, despite anything you do to
try and stop it.

So much energy passes through the car that
it begins to glow and twist. \.\.
Meanwhile the man is nearly floating off the 
ground on a web of electricity.

The hood of the car rises into the air, pulled 
up by strings of lightning.\!
Folds itself much smaller.

Then slams into the man, wrapping around 
him.

Then another piece.\.\. And another.

The whole scene grows so bright that you
have to close your eyes, tears streaming down
your face.

// 0 = event not activated
1 - pulled self away, no TF.
2 - just changed
3 - day after change

Until finally you feel the flow of energy abate.

You open your eyes.

The car has vanished, leaving behind a single
changed figure.

Driver:
Uh...

She looks ill.

Driver:
I...\.\.\. ugh...

She spasms, making a loud clicking noise.\.\.
She clutches her stomach.

She clicks again, looking like she's about
to heave.

And again.

Except this time it's followed by the sound of
an engine starting up.

She gives a massive belch, blasting you with
the smell of exhaust.\!
Then pounds her chest a time or two, 
straightening up and looking relieved.

Driver:
Oh, that feels so much better.

She turns to you.

Driver:
Thanks for the help!

Wheeeeee!\!
This is so much more fun than driving!

And I get double the gas mileage!

Don't fight dears, there's enough seed for

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Bird feeder — p2
passages.content:

The girls at the bank have been so nice
recently!

One of them shared her snacks with me and
I feel twenty years younger!

passages.content:
The door is locked.\!
They probably need time to calm the animals.

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — p6
passages.content:
Locked.\!
You hope everyone is doing okay.

Cop:
Hey!\!
Open up!\!
This street isn't zoned for castles!

passages.content:
It looks like the police officer guarding the
door is distracted.  Slip inside?

    Apologies for the inconvenience!

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Bus stop — p1
passages.content:
You see the bus just pulling up.

Where would you like to go?

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Escaped dog — p1
passages.content:
A dog is here eagerly sniffing at a dumpster.

You give Doug a call and he arrives a few
minutes later.

Shelter Head Doug:
Come on Daisy, good girls don't roll in trash.\!
We are going to have to give you such a bath
when you get back.

\v[144] out of 3 dogs rescued!

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Shelter volunteer — p1
passages.content:
The woman is trying to see through the 
shelter door.

She turns as you approach.

Shelter Volunteer:
Thank you for coming! I'm worried that
something may have happened to Doug and 
Felix.

Some of us have been able to get inside to
feed the animals, but we haven't seen either
of them!

Given how they were last time you saw them,
she's probably right to worry.

Shelter Volunteer:
If only we knew where to start looking...

Huh, where could they be?\!
What about...\!
No, maybe...\!
Uh...

Crap, where should you start looking?\!
Normally this would be where some 
ridiculously busty creature shows up and tells 
you what to do!

Oh thank goodness.

????:
I'm here to help, nya!

\n[2]:
Who are you?\!
...\.Nya?

????:
I'm a lovely spirit of love and justice, nya!\!
I could feel the sadness energy from all the
cute puppies and kitties and peoplees!

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
No one should be that sad, nya!

Kaede:
And what dost thine aid require?

\n[2]:
(Are we supposed to nya? Is it polite?)

Kaede:
(Nay, 'tis impolite to nya when one dost not 
understand the dialect.)

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
It's simple, nya!

Just form a contract with me and become a
magical warrior of love and justice and lovely
justice!\!
Gain the power to right these wrongs!

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
Of course, nya!

She takes a deep breath.

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
See, simple, nya!\!
Now all you need to do is swear a blood oath
on your soul and we can-

\n[4]:
Yeah, that's not happening.

\n[4]:
Let's do some contract negotiations, shall we?

She drags the catgirl away.

Lovely Spirit Of Love And Justice:
Help, nya!\!
This isn't loving at all!

\n[4]:
But it's sure going to be justice!

Several minutes pass.\!
You can occasionally hear Pride tearing into 
the spirit.

\n[4]:
-Never seen such an unbalanced, extortionate
contract! Do you think we're all simpletons
and fools?!

More minutes pass.

\n[4]:
-Not even specifying the powers? You really
thought you

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Shelter volunteer — p2
passages.content:
Shelter Volunteer:
Keep an eye out for Doug and Felix please!

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Shelter volunteer — p3
passages.content:
Shelter Volunteer:
Doug and Felix just went by.\!
They said they'd be in tomorrow.

Thanks for finding them!

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Kyle — p1
passages.content:
Kyle:
Oh no oh no oh no.

He's staring at the box for the model robot he
just bought.

Kyle:
Batteries not included.\!
My gift for Darren needs to be perfect! It can't
be missing anything!

He turns to the department store.

Kyle:
It's okay Kyle. You can just go buy batteries.
It'll be fine.

He turns back.

Kyle:
But I shouldn't *need* to buy batteries!\!
It's fine, this is fine!

I don't need to make everything perfect, no
one will mind. No one.

Kyle:
...But what if he does?

Kyle:
He won't.

Kyle:
Unless...

Kyle:
Come on Kyle, just make a decision!\!
One or the other!

Kyle:
I'm stuck.\!
I-\. I just can't-

I just can't get the strength to move!\!
It'll all go wrong somehow!

passages.name: Street ARG 2 — Kyle — p2
passages.content:
Kyle:
I-\. I can't.

I just need a nudge.\!
The energy to choose!\!
Augh, why am I like this?!

He takes a deep breath.

Kyle:
No, no, this is fine.\!
I can just give this to Darren.

I wouldn't mind if he gave me this, so he
won't mind if I give him this.\!
He won't hate me forever for a single tiny
mistake.

He takes another deep breath, not noticing
his boxed robot starting to crackle with
electricity.

You have to shield your eyes as it grows 
brighter and brighter.

Kyle:
This will all be fine.\!
This is fine.\!
This is fine.

This is-\!
\{ALL SYSTEMS OPTIMAL

The light fades, revealing a changed Kyle.

Kyle:
I'm going to-

She jerks as she realizes her hands are 
empty.

Kyle:
Oh no.\!
Oh no oh no oh no.

She starts frantically patting herself down, 
searching for the box.

Kyle:
It can't be missing.\!
Oh god, how is it missing.

She checks the former location of her pockets,
her front...

Kyle:
Where?\!
Where?!\!
W- where...?

Her hands find something unexpected on her
chest.

Kyle:
What...?

She squeezes.

Kyle:
Ah!

She finally takes a look at herself.

Kyle:
Oh.\!
Oh!

Kyle:
Oh, I think Darren is going to enjoy this
even more than another model kit!\!
\}(I've seen those pictures on his computer.)

She gives her breasts another squeeze.\!
And smiles.

Kyle:
Ooo, I think I should go give him his present.\!
\}(I'm going to enjoy this more too.)

She happily walks away.

Driver:

Driver:

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Goddess
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
A wonderful morning to you, \N[10]!

A walk-in closet, it's so exciting!\!
Virtue really is its own reward!

She holds her hands out to you and 
concentrates.

Goddess Florauna:
I see you have made a connection with the
great and noble cow! I would say its strength
is about \V[80].

Goddess Florauna:
The power of nature itself flows through you!
About \V[76] units of nature, I'd say.

Goddess Florauna:
Darling, you've been hanging out with a
dragon? Spicy!
You've absorbed \V[77] units of it's nature!

Goddess Florauna:
You've made a contract to become a magical
girl, who always have *wonderful* outfits!\!
You've contracted for \V[79] units of power!

Goddess Florauna:
Ah, I see you've made a connection with...\!
Darling, this must be the absolutely most 
suspicious magical sponser I've ever seen!

Are you contracting responsibly?\!
Please tell me you're contracting responsibly.

And don't let them try to get you to recruit
others.\!
Pyramids aren't magic!

These multi-level magic schemes are always 
scams!

But assuming you *haven't* signed your soul
away...

She glances over at Kaede and seems 
reassured when the kitsune gives her a 
nod.

Goddess Florauna:
You've contracted for \V[79] units of power!

Goddess Florauna:
I'm afraid you have not made any connection
with the greater forces of our world, 
\N[1].

It's sad!\!
Tragic!\!
Go out there and explore!

The goddess presses a hand dramatically to 
her forehead.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh!\!
I'm so sorry darling, but you lack the raw 
mana I need for this!

Please, come back with some and I would
*love* to help you out.

You ask Florauna what she means by upgrading
your companions.

Goddess Florauna:
Why darling, I am the Goddess of Growth!
Of Overflowing Bounty!

Helping people grow is my duty! My calling!

Helping them blossom forth, swell into their 
true potential...\!
Why, I'd love to help even if you *hadn't* done
so much for me and my sisters!

Now, their exact upgrade will depend on their
cla

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Head priestess — p1
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
It's so wonderful to have the goddess back 
with us!

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Head priestess — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Thank you again for your help hero!\!
Please return soon!

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Head priestess — p3
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
The great Florauna said she had to consult with
her sisters.\!
I hope everything is okay.

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Head priestess — p4
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Lady Kaede! Welcome back!

The Goddess Florauna, may she spring
bountiful forever more, has revealed to us
some of the lost secrets of crafting your
weapons!

Please, take a look!

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Brad blessing — p1
passages.content:
You see Brad and Florauna talking.

Brad is looking the goddess up and down.

Player ( . )( . )SexGod:
Nice, nice. Could be better, but nice.

He looks back at her face.

Player ( . )( . )SexGod:
So, goddess, lady. I hear you've got a reward
for me?

Goddess Florauna:
Oh yes darling, I've heard of what you did for
my priestesses yesterday!

The goddess looks consideringly at Brad for a
moment. Then smiles.

Goddess Florauna:
Giving you a reward is the least I can do!

Are you ready to be granted one of your 
deepest desires?

Player ( . )( . )SexGod:
Go for it.

The goddess puts out her hands and 
concentrates.

There is a sudden pulse of light, so bright you
have to shield your eyes.

The light fades.

Revealing a completely unchanged Brad.

She looks down at herself in confusion and
gives her chest a poke.

\>She looks down at herself in confusion and
gives her chest a poke.\<

Her breasts suddenly spring forward.

Player ( . )( . )SexGod:
Better.

She starts feeling up her breasts with her
hands, then looks up at the goddess.

Player ( . )( . )SexGod:
Hey, thanks!

She wanders out of the room, hands still busily
squeezing and groping.

Florauna turns to her priestess.

Goddess Florauna:
At least *someone* here is properly grateful
for a blessing.

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2
passages.content: Add some levels?

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2
passages.content: Add some levels?

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2
passages.content: Remove some levels?

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Kaede — p2
passages.content:
Kaede is looking down at her changed figure.

Kaede:
Ah, it dost my heart good to be a small step
back towards my former glory.

She turns to look at her tails.

Kaede:
And I have always liked the way black looks
on me.

Kaede is looking down at her changed figure.

Kaede:
I do not believe that I have ever possessed
so slight a stature.

She bounces on her feet.

Kaede:
Though it dost leave me feeling quite nimble!

Kaede:
It dost mine heart good to be able to bask
in the presence of mine goddess for a nonce.

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2 — Elina reactions — p2
passages.content:
\N[2]:
This is just ridiculous!

She strains uselessly against the ropes.

\N[2] is still practicing her magic.

\N[2]:
Firebolt!

\N[2]:
Ice!

\N[2]:
Shocking grasp!

HP -25!\!
Ow!

\N[2]:
Sorry, I'm still getting the hang of my new
power...

\N[2] is still staring in amazement at
her bat.

\N[2]:
Of course! Why did I never see it before?

passages.name: Florauna room ARG 2
passages.content: Warning: Extreme fashion ahead!

passages.name: Hadea room ARG 2 — Hadea
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Ah, the extra space is so nice.\!
And unlike my sisters, *I'm* taking full 
advantage of it!

We've opened a store! All the equipment 
you've found on your travels, in one 
convenient clearinghouse!

Spend everything you have!

And what else can I do for you \N[10]?

She closes her eyes and listens.

Goddess Hadea:
My spirits report that you have gotten this new
goddess to upgrade areas \V[68] times.

You've baited her into changing \V[67] people.

// I had misc += choice 2 here, and I'm not sure why. Removed and 
hopefully doesn't break things.

Overall, I would say you've weakened her
defenses by \V[23] thaums.\!
Much work remains to be done.

Goddess Hadea:
I can offer you $1000 for each raw mana.\!
How much would you like to sell?

Goddess Hadea:
You don't have that much!\!
Come back to me when you have a real offer!

Goddess Hadea:
Done!\!
Come back if you have any more raw mana 
to get rid of, Hero!

Goddess Hadea:
Our unwelcome neighbor upstairs has sealed
off her domain.\!

If you can make her expend her power on 
the town, it should weaken the seal.

Then you charge up, do your hero thing, and
everything's great!

She's already made some modifications to
the town, but you need to bait her into making
more.  There are a few different methods.

You can bring about individual changes to 
people.

You can also get her to upgrade entire areas,
changing the people and objects within.\!
This is a bigger expenditure of power, probably
about twice as much as changing a person.

You could also try to find more of our trapped
sisters.  That won't drain the dark goddess's
power, but will give us more power to break
the seal.

I've sent my spirits out to scout the town. 
They'll report any changes you accomplish.

passages.name: Hadea room ARG 2 — p1
passages.content:
Spirit:
All bow before the beauty of Hadea!

(Hey, this is better than going back to the
underworld.)\!
(She even shares her snacks with us
sometimes!)

passages.content:
Spirit:
Do you mind?!

Hadea's gone! It's my break time!

passages.content:
Spirit:
All bow before the beauty of Hadea!

passages.content:

Hail, glorious Hadea!\!
Hail the wonderful Queen of the Underworld!\!
Hail!

(Thanks for freeing the goddess.)\!
(Most other spirits are jerks.)

passages.content:

Hail-\.\. Oh, she's not here right now?

Break time!

passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Dude, we've got so much more space now!\!
Time to run laps!

passages.name: Fittina room ARG 2 — Goddess — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Fittina:
Bro, our room has been working out!\!
Look at how much its space muscles grew!

Wanna give it a try?

Train with Fittina?

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but you don't have any flab there.
Good job, but there's nothing to work off!

Guardian Hana:
.\..\..\.Dude, have you considered just getting
a haircut?

Goddess Fittina:
That's what we'll do!\!
The swolest haircut you've ever seen!

She pulls out a massive, ten-foot long sword.\!
It's so heavy her feet visibly sink into the
ground.

Before you can protest, she swings.

And hair flutters to the ground.

Hana applauds.

Guardian Hana:
Dude!\. Goddess!\.
That was sick dude!

They high-five.

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but not even I can bulk you out
there anymore.

All I can do is give you this high five for 
getting so swole!

Goddess Fittina:
Got it dude!

She runs you through a series of exercises.\!
Eyebrow lifts.\!
Jaw flexes.\!
Cheek puffs.

It feels like your face has gotten less delicate.

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but not even I can bulk you out
there anymore.

All I can do is give you this high five for 
getting so swole!

Goddess Fittina:
Let's go!

She runs you through about a million pushups.\!
It leaves your arms and hands looking a lot 
bulkier.

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but you don't have any flab there.
Good job, but there's nothing to work off!

Goddess Fittina:
Got it dude!

She runs you through like a million bar
presses.\!
It really does seem to have burned some of
the jiggle off your chest!

Goddess Fittina:

All I can do is give you this high five for

passages.content:
An unedited copy of the sacred exercises
is hanging on the wall.

Someone has added a message in huge
letters at the bottom.

Message:
\{INFINITY = 100

Hana notices you looking at it.

Guardian Hana:
Like it dude?
We totally crushed math!

passages.content:
An elaborate, high-tech smoothie machine.\!
There's no obvious way to operate it.

passages.name: Old Farmer's market — Market welcome
passages.content:
Volunteer:
Welcome to the regular Garden Park market!\!
Glad to be back after our hiatus!

Take a look around! We're getting more and 
more vendors all the time!

passages.name: Old Farmer's market — Merchandise vendor
passages.content:
Park Volunteer:
Interested in supporting the park?\!
We have new merchandise!

passages.name: Old Farmer's market
passages.content:
Store Volunteer:
How about some coffee to perk you up?
All proceeds go to the park!

passages.name: Old Farmer's market — Dead flower — p1
passages.content:
One of the flowers is wilting and brown.

You pour a potion on the flower.\!
It springs back to full life.

A glimmering mass of magic jumps from the
flower into your inventory.

Raw mana +1!

passages.name: Old Farmer's market — Dead flower — p2
passages.content: The flower looks nice and healthy now.

passages.name: Old Farmer's market — Garden sign — p1
passages.content:
GARDEN CLOSED
DUE TO LACK OF
FUNDS.

passages.name: Old Farmer's market — Garden sign — p2
passages.content:
GARDENS
           UNDER RENOVATION

passages.name: Old Farmer's market — Fortune teller — p1
passages.content:
Fortune Teller:
Welcome child.  Have you come to hear the
wisdom of the spirits?

The world is full of mysterious forces, but 
through the cards we may make the unknown
clear.

For a mere $100 I can give you a glimpse of
your future and the past you must take.

Pay $100 for a tarot reading?

Fortune Teller:
Excellent my dear, excellent.\!
Here, sit down and let the cards reveal their
secrets to you.

Fortune Teller:
Now, first we will consider your past.  

These cards indicate things that still influence 
you today, that have carried forwards into 
your present.

She draws a card.

Fortune Teller:
Ah, Death. Do not be concerned! This card 
does not mean mortality, it stands for
*transformation*.

It is the ending of some of what you were, in
order to make way for a new you. 

In the past position it suggests that you have 
been through some abrupt and surprising 
change, but one that makes room for growth
and renewal.

Of course, it will also depend on what else the
cards have to tell us. Let us look at the next
part of your past.

She draws another card.

Fortune Teller:
Ah, the Lovers. It seems there is a connection
to another that is still troubling you. 

There is someone trying to form a connection
with you who has not succeeded, either
because of you or because of them. 

The Lovers can also represent the process of
getting clear on your values and beliefs.  

Taken with Death, perhaps there was an 
unexpected change in your past and you are 
still figuring out how you feel about it.

The third card of your past should make 
things more clear.

She draws another card.

Fortune Teller:
This\..\..\.. shouldn't be possible?\!
Perhaps I mixed up my decks, let me draw
another.

She draws another card.

Fortune Teller:
...

And another.

// String of cards here, getting progressively more lewd.

Fortune Teller:
Okay!\!
Well!

You've obviously got some absolute mystical
bullshit going on here, so I'm getting out
before I get caught up in it!

Good luck to you!

Fort

passages.name: Pet shelter 2 — Dog Lover — p1
passages.content:
Shelter Head Felix:
Thank goodness you're here.

Shelter Head Doug:
What just happened?\!
No, seriously, what?

Shelter Head Felix:
I have no idea...\!
But something has panicked all the dogs!\!
They're running wild!

Shelter Head Doug:
Hey, the cats are causing just as many 
problems!

Shelter Head Felix:
\..\..\..Either way, we could calm them down 
if we weren't, you know...

He gestures at how they've somehow ended
up wedged into some of the animal cages.

We just need you to get us the keys! They're
in a cabinet in the back.

Shelter Head Doug:
Please, we need to help the animals!

passages.name: Pet shelter 2 — Dog Lover — p2
passages.content:
Shelter Head Doug:
The dogs are acting *extremely* protective...\!
What could set them off like this?

passages.name: Pet shelter 2 — Keys
passages.content:
Finally, keys!

You grab them and head back to the entrance.

Shelter Head Doug:
I am so glad to get out of there.

He stretches.

Shelter Head Felix:
I don't know, there was a *very* exciting
mouse toy near me.

Doug rolls his eyes.

Anyway, the animals need our help!

He beelines straight for the nearest dog,
pulling treats from his pockets as he goes.

Shelter Head Felix:
Thank you for your help.\!
Now, if you'd please give us some space to
calm down the animals...

You hear the door lock behind you as you
leave.

The dog barks angrily.

Fire Minion:
Burn...

Fire Minion:
Pet...\.\. kitty?

Fire Minion:
Kitty?

Fire Minion:
Kitty!

The monster is so focused on chasing the cat
that it runs straight into you.

You hear a voice from farther in.

Shelter Head Felix:
Hey!\. Hey!\.
Please come help!

passages.name: Pet shelter 2 — Minion cutscene — p1
passages.content:
You see one of Arcadia's minions ahead, 
cornered by angry animals.

Fire Minion:
...Burn?

The minion tries to back away, but runs into
the wall.

Fire Minion:
Burn...

You could probably pull the animals off them.
if you wanted. But you'll probably get pretty
scratched up in the process.\!
Do you bother?

You do.

...You only get a little mauled in the process.

The minion gives a little bow to you, before
vanishing in a puff of flame.

You leave them to their fate.

Water bowls, food bowls, piles of wet and dry
food\..\..\..\..\..
No keys.

passages.name: Pet shelter 2 — Cabinet
passages.content:

\..\..\..\..\..No keys.
