passages.content: BEVERAGES

passages.name: Pet shelter 6 — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
I've never had catnip tea before, I wonder
how it tastes.

passages.name: Pet shelter 6 — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
I can't have pets in my apartment, so I'm so
glad I can come here to play with them now!

passages.name: Pet shelter 6 — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
I'll give the spice tea a try.\!
It's for a good cause, after all.

passages.name: Pet shelter 6 — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
I found the perfect friend!

The cat next to him meows happily.

passages.name: Pet shelter 6 — Felix after opening
passages.content:
Shelter Head Felix:
It boggles the mind how many people are
showing up for our opening.

We're going to find homes for so many pets!

passages.name: Pet shelter 6 — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
I'm going to get the cutest puppy!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Computer
passages.content:
You overclock your computer.

It now loads forums twice as fast!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Mirror
passages.content:
You concentrate and your hands fly to your
face. The quickly begin scrubbing it free of dirt
you didn't even realize was there.

Hey, you clean up nice!

And your face is left pleasantly tingling from
the cleaning.

Though it looks a little different than before.
Must have been more dirt on it than you
thought.

Your face is still clean from the last time. No 
need to clean it again.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Exit — p2
passages.content:
\n[2] calls over as you head for the door.

\n[2]:
\n[10], could you come over here? I have
something to show you!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Exit — p3
passages.content:
Goddess Earth:
Hero \n[10], what the Me just happened?!\!
There was a massive flare of power from 
the dark goddess!

Goddess Florauna:
I felt a great disturbance, like a thousand
voices cried out in a catchy pop tune.\!
Still stuck in my head, honestly.

I wouldn't mind hearing it again.\!
And do they have any more?

Goddess Earth:
The important thing is what the dark goddess
did!

We can tell she changed a lot of people, but
it felt unfinished. Uncontrolled.\!
Whatever you did to stop her, keep it up!

Goddess Florauna:
Though that much power leaking is going to
have,\. uh,\. other effects.\!
Space has gone a little squishy.

Not that it's bad!\!
I've used it to add a walk-in closet!

I am going to be *so* fashionable now that
I have room to add more outfits.\!
I saw the cutest little number, that had this
*adorable* ruffled skirt, and-

Goddess Earth:
What we mean is to keep an eye out,
Hero \n[10]! 

There may be room for more things to 
change, now that there's so much power
floating around!

You glance over towards the bathroom.\!
That does make some things a little clearer.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh, and I'm looking at this *wonderful* top-

Goddess Earth:
We'll keep doing what we can to fight the dark
goddess! Keep up the good work draining her 
power!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Exit — p4
passages.content:
You reach out to the door,\.\. then wait a minute
to see if anyone else is going to interrupt.\|
Then you head outside.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bed — p1
passages.content:
Go to bed for the night?

You slide into bed and close your eyes.

As you start to fall asleep, your mind drifts
back over the events of the day.

Your initial change is still a shock. But you've
managed to avoid anything else happening.

Several parts of your body have started to
shift as the game does... \.\. whatever it's 
doing.

You've changed quite a bit, your body shifting
time and time again.

You're almost starting to get used to the 
sensation of flesh reshaping itself.

Your last thoughts about the day, just before
you finally drop into a deep dreamless sleep,
are mostly:

Time passes.

Unwillingly, you start to slowly wake up.

Trying to move as little as possible, you feel
around for your glasses and slide them on. \.\.

You open your eyes to the sight of Kaede,
virtual hands groping through your chest.\.

\N[2] is futilely trying to pull her away.

\N[2]:
Stop that already!

Kaede:
But aren't you curious?

\N[10] grew these in a day! \.\.

Don't you want to know how they feel?

Look at the bountiful breasts \N[10]
already has! And they grew them in a day! \.\.

Don't you want to know how they feel?

\N[2]:
No, just stop!

Kaede:
You don't understand how rare it is for a mortal 
to have this much flexibility. And I can feel 
they have the potential to be so much more.

Kaede:
There has been little change, but there is so
much potential here. So many slumbering
possibilities.

She licks her lips and gives \N[2] a
too-large grin.

Kaede:
Won't it be fun to find out how much 
\N[10] can grow?

You must have moved, because they both
suddenly notice you're awake.\.
\N[2] starts babbling apologies.

\N[2]:
I'm sorry! I tried to stop her but she wouldn't-

Kaede grins at you and takes one last swipe
through your chest. Then she moves back to
let you up.

Kaede:
Aren't you curious too?

You may have rejected the Goddess's 
blessing, but you must realize how rare it is 
for a mortal like you to get this much of a 
chance to change.

Kaede:
I can see you're uncer

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bed — p3
passages.content:
You're not tired yet. There's a whole day of

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bed — p4
passages.content: Go to sleep for the night?

passages.content:
You're not tired yet. There's a whole day of

passages.content:
Go to sleep for the night?

// Run cutscenes, if any need to be run. Remember to change this in 
both ARG and real if adding additional cutscenes.

// If the player has read Arcadia announcing herself on the forum, the 
next night Arcadia will create minions to go out and change things.

// Boolean to make sure only one cutscene is played per morning, 
even if the requirements for multiple are met.

Goddess Arcadia:
Hero!\!
My minions have reported that you spent all
today getting your rocks off!

I knew you'd start to enjoy yourself 
eventually!

You hear muffled whispers, and one or two
cries of "Burn!"

Goddess Arcadia:
\}What...\. What do you mean that's not what
they did? You said-\.\.
Wait, really?

She nervously clears her throat.

Goddess Arcadia:
Well, this still counts as my victory!\!
\}No I will not be taking any questions.

The feeling of her presence fades.

// Boolean to make sure only one cutscene is played per morning, 
even if the requirements for multiple are met.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Escaped cat — p1
passages.content:
There's a cat sleeping in your kitchen.

How did she even get here?

You give Felix a call, and he shows up to
collect the cat.

Shelter Head Felix:
Oh hello Rip Van Winkle.\!
Did you have a good nap?

He coaxs her into a carrier, where she
immediately goes back to sleep.

Thank you!\!
That's \v[143] out of 3 cats rescued!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Iterate day — p2
passages.content:
You wake up slightly during the night when
something soft and warm slips into your bed.\!
Purring, it lulls you back to sleep.

// Morning cutscenes. Each cutscene should be wrapped in its own 
chack for switch 160, so that only one can trigger.

You are brushing your teeth when you hear a
noise.

Kaede:
Hero \n[10]! 'Tis done!

Kaede:
Thy domicile now hast what any true home
requires: a bath!

And as I am a gracious host, I desire to share
it with all.\!
Cease thy nightly ablutions, the time has come
for water and carousing!

You follow her in.

Your glasses briefly fog up as you enter the 
steamy room.

\n[4]:
I didn't think it was possible, but fuzzbrain's
actually made a pretty nice bath.

You have to agree. Somehow, she's managed
to transplant a small forest clearing to your
apartment.

Steaming water bubbles up from the ground, 
collecting in a small pool before flowing off to 
the north.  

Warm mist gently wafts between the soft grass,
more comfortable than any carpet.

You all stare for a moment in wonder.

Kaede:
Come all, 'tis not an experience to be taken
with thine eyes alone!\!
To the bath!

She leaps into the spring, shedding her clothes
as she does.

Kaede:
Come, all that we needst for a most joyous
time ist here!

The water, to sooth aches and pains of body
and mind both!\!
The forest, to calm the mind and lull the 
spirit!

She raises a bottle.

Kaede:
And no carouse might be complete without the
libations!

Let us toast ourselves, our heroics, and the 
goddesses themselves!

\n[4]:
Yeah, sure, why not.

\n[4]:
It's no magma pool, but I gotta admit this is
pretty refreshing.

\n[2]:
That is nice!

Kaede:
Come fine Hero \n[10], 'tis
plenty of room!

The hot water is looking pretty incredible.\!
Your apartment doesn't even have a tub; it's
been forever since you've had a bath, much
less something like this.

There's only one question.\!
Swimsuit or naked?

You head back to your room for a pair of
swimtrunks.

Then pause, look down at your chest, and

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Underwear — p1
passages.content:
You quickly gather up your clothes and stuff 
them in your laundry basket.

Kaede:
Hey!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Smaller clothes pile — p1
passages.content:
You quickly gather up your clothes and stuff 
them in your laundry basket.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Kaede — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
This abode lacks some luxury, but 'tis still a
cozy little lovenest!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Kaede — p2
passages.content:
Kaede:
I knowst not how thou hast managed to fit so
many parchements within such a tiny box, 
but tis a wonderful way to pass a day.

And 'tis a wonder the heights to which human
creativity has soared!\!
Truly, thou art blessed to live in an age full of
such tales.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Elina — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
Thank you for the room \n[10]!

Maybe now everyone will stop being so 
obsessed with rock paper scissors.

How are they so bad at it?

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Elina — p2
passages.content:
\n[2]:
I've rethought all of the things I was planning
to investigate!\!
...And I still want to try most of them.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Elina — p3
passages.content:
\n[2]:
A computer all my own!\!
It's fascinating!

Did you know a group of hippos is called a 
"bloat"?

Also that hippos exist?\!
And a continent called "Africa"?

And continents!\!
There are seven of them!\!
On a round planet!

Oh, and there's this thing called "space"...

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Boulder
passages.content: Huh, so that's where the boulder went.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride — p1
passages.content:
\n[4] is pacing back and forth, muttering to
herself.

\n[4]:
Okay, so what if the world turned out to be 
bigger than I thought?\!
So what if what I knew was wrong.

It's just a new challenge!

Just need to figure out the levers of power
in this new world. \!
Money?\!
Money's always a good one.

She notices you.

\n[4]:
Hey, \n[10], thanks for the room.

And I actually mean that in a totally sincere
and non-sarcastic way.

It's got real underworld lava and everything.\!
Very homey.

But do you think the department store could
also get me one of those computer things?

I need to do research. For reasons.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride — p2
passages.content:
\n[4] is pacing back and forth, muttering to
herself.

\n[4]:
Okay, money.\!
So many ways to make money.

How to leverage them?

She notices you.

\n[4]:
Yes, excellent, the computer is just what I 
need!

You remind her she promised to hold off on
conquering the world until *after* you've 
resolved this whole Arcadia situation.

\n[4]:
Of course!

\n[4]:
Please. I'm barely scheming at all!

At *most* I might get us a little more power.

There's nothing to worry about!

\n[4]:
For you.

You give her an unimpressed look.

\n[4]:
Okay, I'm just trying to procure some 
additional funds.

Through entirely \}technically\{ legal means.

You sigh.\!
As long as she's sure whatever she's up to
won't backfire on you all.

\n[4]:
Of course not!\!
Just wait and see, I promise this is genius.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG
passages.content:
A browser is open to Wikipedia.

About 150 tabs in it are open to Wikipedia.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bottle 3
passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG
passages.content:
A browser is open to a bunch of sites with
names like "$$$$Make Money FAST!!!!$$$$"

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride computer chair — p2
passages.content:
\n[4]:
Be prepared!\!
Tomorrow I shall once more release my
genius, and the world shall cower before us!

...Peacefully and heroically.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride computer chair — p3
passages.content:
\n[4]:
Are you ready to go rescue my foolish 
minions yet?!\!
Time is money!

Even if I haven't figured out how to convert
it.\!
(Maybe the right magic...)

Head out?

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride computer chair — p4
passages.content:
\n[4] is busy working through a dozen
business spreadsheets.

\n[4]:
(And the most profitable method to 
incorporate the business is...)

\n[4]:
Well, that did not work out as planned, but
once more we see that a genius can extract
gold from even the most foolish of dross!

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Blocker
passages.content:
The stream stretches off into the forest, 
swiftly vanishing into the mist that rises from
the steaming water.

Wandering blindly into that strikes you as the
sort of thing every fairy tale has ever warned
you about.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG
passages.content:
A browser is open to google.\!
Someone has been searching for "places
where I might slake mine lusts."

Wow.\!
That's a *lot* of porn.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bottle 3
passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bottle 3
passages.content: Empty.

passages.content: Empty.

passages.content: Empty.

passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bottle 3
passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Bottle 3
passages.content: Empty.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride shenanigans  — p1
passages.content:
\n[4] calls you over to the computer as you
come in.

\n[4]:
Mwahaha, \n[10], come and gaze upon 
my genius!

As promised I have found a source of funds
to help us in our fight!

You ask her what she's figured out.

\n[4]:
Behold!\!
Non-fungible tokens!

\n[4]:
Yes, befuddlement is exactly what I would 
expect from anyone not possessing my 
genius.

(I will refrain from telling fuzzbrain, her tiny
perverted brain might explode.)

You see, these tokens, these "NFTs", are
practically the perfect item to sell.

You're selling people a picture.\!
But not a real picture, there's no need to
actually make anything.\!
It's a picture on the computer.

But you're not even selling them the computer
picture, you're selling them a note that says
they have the right to look at the picture!

She sighes happily.

\n[4]:
So little work for such a payoff, even the greed
spirits would be jealous.

And thanks to my genius it is fully within our
grasp!

Sure.\!
Sure, this sounds entirely legitimate and
unlikely to go wrong in any way.

\n[4]:
Not with my genius running the show!

See, look.

She turns back to the computer and pulls up
a file.

\n[4]:
I've already sourced the art.

She scrolls through a set of images of the
sexier characters you've interacted with from
the game.

\n[4]:
I'm making those fools behind all this 
nonsense work for us!

And don't worry, I checked and it's *very*
uncommon for someone to sue for copyright
infringement after they've been exploded into
tiny pieces.

I've put together the advertising campaign.\!
I've done the initial sales projections.\!
I've even found the minions to mint the NFTs
for me!

Tomorrow we release, and then we will be
simply rolling in the money.\!
And even a dark goddess must bow before
the power of enough wealth!

She leans back and stretches happily.

\n[4]:
I will allow you to praise me for my genius.

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride shenanigans  — p3
passages.content:
You walk in to hear \n[4] shouting at her 
computer.

\n[4]:
You fools!\!
Most foolish of fools!\!
How could you fail such a simple task!?

She turns to you.

\n[4]:
Those utter simpletons!\!
All they had to do was mint the NFTs!

We had it all!\!
The pictures!\!
The advertising campaign!

The technically not-entirely-misleading 
promises!

And somehow the utter fools failed at their
one task!

She turns back to her computer screen, 
displaying panicked messages.

\n[4]:
Look!\!
Somehow the blithering idiots managed to 
make the tokens fungible!

Not only that, they already let them fungie!

\n[4]:
Ugh.\!
We should go see if we can rescue my minions
from the consequences of their own idiocy.

And see what we can salvage.

Fortunately I had them provide their full
contact information.\!
Shall we go?

\n[4]:
Yes, I too wish I could avoid having to witness 
this idiocy.

But sometimes personal intervention is all that
can salvage things.

Just talk to me when you're ready to deal
with these fools.

\n[4] calls you over to the computer as you

\n[4]:
Mwahaha, \n[10], come and gaze upon 
my genius!

As promised I have found a source of funds
to help us in our fight!

You ask her what she's figured out.

\n[4]:
Behold!\!
Non-fungible tokens!

\n[4]:
Yes, befuddlement is exactly what I would 
expect from anyone not possessing my 
genius.

(I will refrain from telling fuzzbrain, her tiny
perverted brain might explode.)

You see, these tokens, these "NFTs", are
practically the perfect item to sell.

You're selling people a picture.\!
But not a real picture, there's no need to
actually make anything.\!
It's a picture on the computer.

But you're not even selling them the computer
picture, you're selling them a note that says
they have the right to look at the picture!

She sighes happily.

\n[4]:
So little work for such a payoff, even the greed
spirits would be jealous.

And thanks to my genius it is fully within our
grasp!

Sure.\!
Sure, this sounds entirely legitimate and
unlikely to go wrong in any way.

\n[4]:
Not with my genius running the show!

See, look.

She turns back to the computer and pulls up
a file.

\n[4]:
I've already sourced the art.

She scrolls through a set of images of the
sexier characters you've interacted with from
the game.

\n[4]:
I'm making those fools behind all this 
nonsense work for us!

And don't worry, I checked and it's *very*
uncommon for someone to sue for copyright
infringement after they've been exploded into
tiny pieces.

I've put together the advertising campaign.\!
I've done the initial sales projections.\!
I've even found the minions to mint the NFTs
for me!

Tomorrow we release, and then we will be
simply rolling in the money.\!
And even a dark goddess must bow before
the power of enough wealth!

She leans back and stretches happily.

\n[4]:
I will allow you to praise me for my genius.

You walk in to hear \n[4] shouting at her 
computer.

\n[4]:
You fools!\!
Most foolish of fools!\!
How could you fail such a simple task!?

She turns to you.

\n[4]:
Those utter simpletons!\!
All they had to do was mint the NFTs!

We had it all!\!
The pictures!\!
The advertising campaign!

The technically not-entirely-misleading 
promises!

And somehow the utter fools failed at their
one task!

She turns back to her computer screen, 
displaying panicked messages.

\n[4]:
Look!\!
Somehow the blithering idiots managed to 
make the tokens fungible!

Not only that, they already let them fungie!

\n[4]:
Ugh.\!
We should go see if we can rescue my minions
from the consequences of their own idiocy.

And see what we can salvage.

Fortunately I had them provide their full
contact information.\!
Shall we go?

\n[4]:
Yes, I too wish I could avoid having to witness 
this idiocy.

But sometimes personal intervention is all that
can salvage things.

Just talk to me when you're ready to deal

passages.name: Apartment 3 ARG — Pride reactions
passages.content:
\n[4]:
Ugh, that took *forver* to get fuzzbrain 
clued in.

But at least now we've got the power of
\}begrudging acquintainceship
\{friendship on our side, that makes us 
unbeatable, right?

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Mushroom blocker front — p1
passages.content:
The hallway is blocked by an enormous 
overgrowth of mushrooms. 

\N[2]:
Remember, we just need to find bathroom
cleaning supplies and some vinegar!

We've just got the vinegar left to find!

We only need the cleaning supplies!

Then we'll get to try something really 
interesting!

Your hands leap into action, tearing out
mushroom after mushroom.

But they grow back as fast as you remove 
them.\!
You're going to need something more 
powerful to get through this hallway.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Mushroom blocker front — p2
passages.content:
You mix together the chemicals and pour them
on the mushrooms.

Ugh!\!
What is that smell?!

It's clawing at the inside of your nose.\!
It feels like someone's flaying the inside of
your sinuses!

As you cough and hack and flinch back, the
mushrooms begin to wilt.

\n[2]:
It's working!

She bends down and examines the 
shriveling mushrooms.

\n[2]:
Wow, look at that!

She looks back at you.

This is fascinating!\!
Now, the computer told me that this was a
horrible idea.

That you should never, under *any* conditions,
mix these chemicals.\!
So of course I had to see what happens!

She takes a deep sniff, then bursts out 
coughing.

So that's what "chlorine" smells like!

Kaede:
Didst thou say that these vapors be plagueish
and vile?\!
Shouldst we not-

\n[2] holds up a hand, staring at the
mushrooms.

\n[2]:
Oh, just look at this!

The mushrooms have started to bubble and
hiss, releasing great streams of purple and
green smoke.

\n[2]:
It's some kind of secondary reaction.\!
That's new!

There must be something in these mushrooms that-

She stands up, swaying unsteadily on her
feet.

\n[2]:
Yeah, look at these physiological effects!

...You don't feel so good.\!
You start to take an unsteady step back.

At that very moment the mushrooms burst,
sending a dense wave of smoke down the 
hall.

You feel better as the enemy fades away.\!
Huh, violence really does solve all your
problems!

In front of you the hallway is clear.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Mushroom blocker — p1
passages.content:
The hallway is blocked by an enormous 
overgrowth of mushrooms.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Mushroom blocker — p1
passages.content:
The hallway is blocked by an enormous 
overgrowth of mushrooms.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Cabinet — p1
passages.content:
Full of absolutely disgusting green goo.\!
You spot one interesting thing in the sludge.

Rare candy acquired!

\n[4]:
There is no way you are making me eat that.

\n[2]:
I'll try it!\!
I wonder how it changed the taste.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Cabinet — p2
passages.content:
Full of absolutely disgusting green goo.\!
The fungus must have hit their pantry
especially hard.

\n[4]:
I have the terrible suspicion that it looked like
this before these fools ever touched an NFT.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Sparkle — p1
passages.content:
You dig through the bathroom supplies.

\n[2]:
There, grab that one!\!
And that one.

Cleaning supplies acquired!

\n[4]:
I don't know why those fools even have these.\!
Look at this place, I doubt they've ever 
bothered to use them!

\n[2]:
That's everything, we should head back!

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Sparkle — p1
passages.content:
\n[4]:
Well?\!
Is the vinegar in there?

\n[4]:
Hurry up and find it already.\!
I want to get this foolishness behind us as
soon as possible!

\n[4]:
And you!

She prods \n[2], who is crouched down and
examining the mushrooms.

\n[4]:
Get over there and assist!

\n[2]:
Give me a moment, I'm sure I've read about
these before...

\n[4]:
Hmph, with how things are going they're 
probably hideous death shrooms or something
similar.

Hurry up and let's get out of this spore-infested
hovel!

You pull a bottle out of the cabinet and hold it
up for \n[2].

\n[2]:
That looks right.

\n[4]:
Good!\!
Then let's \.get\. going!

Vinegar acquired!

\n[2]:
That's everything, we should head back!

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Sparkle — p2
passages.content:
You don't need another bottle of vinegar.\!
Or another ten bottles.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Cabinet — p1
passages.content:
There's something glimmering at the bottom
of the cabinet.

Raw mana found!

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
You arrive at the apartment to find the path
forward completely blocked by massive 
mushrooms.

Faintly you hear the sounds of an argument 
from the other side.

Voice:
Of course this happens.\!
I told you NFTs were a bad idea.

Other Voice:
No you didn't!\!
You said they were the wave of the future and
we'd better get in on the ground floor!

Voice:
Well you at least should have known better
then to work with some sketchy rando on a
forum! I knew this would happen!

Other Voice:
Really.\!
You knew our apartment would get infested 
with weird mushrooms.

Voice:
Well I knew something would happen.\!
You should have too!

Other Voice:
You were even more eager for this than I was!\!
But enough already. Do you have any *actual*
suggestions for getting out of here?

Voice:
...\!
Wild experimental lesbian sex?

Other Voice:
For the seventh time, not now!\!
We need to get out of here first, then we can
try it!

You call through the mushrooms.\!
The voices reply.

Voice:
Hello?\!
Is someone out there?

Other Voice:
Is that you, Greatest In The World Who All 
Will Inevitably Bow Before?\!
You came?

Kaede gives \n[4] a look.\!
\n[4] sniffs.

\n[4]:
What?\!
I wanted to make sure everyone knew who
they were dealing with.

Other Voice:
So, as you can see, something went wrong
with minting the tokens.

The tokens fungied.\!
We fungied.\!
The entire apartment fungied!

Can you help get us out?

Voice:
You owe us!\!
We did this for you!

Other Voice:
Quiet, don't irritate them!\!
We need their help!

You take a look at the hallway.\!
It's filled with tough, rubbery mushroom flesh, 
squeezed together so tightly that you can't
see the other end.

Nothing you do even makes a dent in it.\!
For once violence *isn't* solving a problem.\!
Bizarre.

\n[4]:
Of course more idiocy stands in our way.

The universe goes out of its way to impede
me at every point.

\N[2]:
I think I have this.\!
I've been reading about something fascinating,
and this is the perfect chance to try it out!

Did you

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment
passages.content:
You burst into the room.

Well, \n[4] bursts into the room.\!
The rest of you follow.

\n[4]:
Alright, everyone stop!\!
You!\! Fools!\! Over there!\!
What idiocy have you done?!

Other Voice:
Uhhh....

She stares at \n[4] and your 
exaggerated proportions.\!
At \n[2], who's crouched down to stare 
at the mushrooms again.

She stares at \n[4] and your 
exaggerated proportions.\!
At \n[2], who's crouched down to stare 
at the mushrooms again.

She stares at \n[4]'s exaggerated 
proportions.\!
At \n[2], who's crouched down to stare 
at the mushrooms again.

At Kaede's ears and tail.

Other Voice:
Neil, am I high?\!
Are we high right now?\!
Is that what's going on?

Neil grabs her arm and licks it.\!
Her pupils dilate really wide for a moment.

Neil:
Whoa.\!
Well I wasn't high *before*.

She squeezes one of her breasts.

Neil:
Mmmm.\!
No, these things are *definitely* real.

Finn, see for yourself!

She makes a grab for her companion's chest.

Finn bats her hands away.

Finn:
No!\!
Eighth time!\!
We have other things to deal with!

Neil:
Fine!

She turns to you.

Neil:
Then would *you* like to have wild 
experimental le-\. *Ow!*

Finn thwaps her on the back of the head.

\n[4]:
Silence fools!\!
Tell me! What happened to the NFTs you were
supposed to mint?

What have you done to my genius plan?!

Neil:
Huh.

She looks \n[4] up and down.

Finn:
Yeah.

Yeah, that's pretty much exactly the behavior
I'd expect from someone who called 
themselves Greatest In The World Who All 
Will Inevitably Bow Before.

Neil:
Yeah, that's some really impressive arrogance,
isn't it?

\n[4]:
Enough!\!
What have you fools perpetrated?!

Finn shrugs.

Finn:
I mean, we tried.\!
We tried minting the NFTs, but it just\..\..\..
failed.

Neil:
They fungied!

Finn:
We kept trying, but it just didn't work.\!
And then we noticed the mushrooms.

Neil:
Then we noticed the boobs.\!
We saw the mushrooms *after* that.

Finn:
I thought it was a bad idea to continue, but
*someone* kept trying.

Neil:
I was tr

Surprisingly fungus free.\!

Toy cubes, many of them glued together.\!

Okay, yes, your blockchain does use much

Toy cubes, many of them stuck together.\!
Someone has glued an ethernet port to one
end.

A note says VERSION 2.

passages.content:
A note on the pillow says NFT TESTBED.

A picture of an ape has been tucked into the
covers.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment
passages.content:
You start to move closer to inspect the 
furniture, but then decide to table the motion.

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Sink
passages.content: You ever get that sinking feeling?

700 BE bucks found!

Decayed T-Shirt obtained!

Piled high with rotten and crumbling clothing.

NFTrousers acquired!

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Fortune teller — p1
passages.content:
Fortune Teller:
Welcome child.  Have you come to hear the
wisdom of the spirits?

The world is full of mysterious forces, but 
through the cards we may make the unknown
clear.

For a mere $100 I can give you a glimpse of
your future and the paths you must take.

Pay $100 for a tarot reading?

Fortune Teller:
Excellent my dear, excellent.\!
Here, sit down and let the cards reveal their
secrets to you.

Fortune Teller:
First we will consider your past.

We will draw three cards that sum up what has
brought you here, the things that have made
you and the things that you still have to 
resolve.

She draws a card.



Fortune Teller:
Ah, Death. \!
The unlearned take this as a terrible sign.

But do not be concerned!\!
The Death arcana does not stand for what you
think.
 

It does not mean mortality, it means 
*transformation*.

It is the ending of some of what you were, in
order to make way for a new you. 

In the past position it suggests that you have 
been through some abrupt and surprising 
change, but one that makes room for growth
and renewal.

Of course, it will also depend on what else the
cards have to tell us. Let us look at the next
part of your past.

She draws another card.



Fortune Teller:
Ah, the Lovers. It seems there is a connection
to another that is still troubling you. 

There is someone trying to form a connection
with you who has not succeeded, either
because of you or because of them. 

Later cards should tell us how you might 
build the connection, or cut them off entirely.

The Lovers can also represent the process of
getting clear on your values and beliefs.  

Taken with Death, perhaps there was an 
unexpected change in your past and you are 
still figuring out how you feel about it.

The third card of your past should make 
things more clear.

She draws another card.



Fortune Teller:
The\..\..\.. Lovers?\!
There shouldn't be another of these in the
deck.

But sometimes things get mixed up, let me
draw again.

She draws another card.



Fort

You'd rather go for a walk.\!
Ooo, and maybe chase some squirrels!

And maybe shoes.\!
Ooo, and chase sticks too!

You feel something shift within your soul.\!
As if a switch deep within you has just 
changed from "cat" to "dog".

Sticks are wonderful, aren't they?\!
Yeah!\!
You could chew on this thing forever!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad — p1
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Bro, you were totally right.\!
Bigger is *always* better.

But I was thinking, what do I do to get bigger?\!
Where do I go?

Then I realized.\!
Gains! I'm talking about gains!

I'm so glad this place is open again bro, it's
got the best weights.

Here, c'mon, there's one station open. Spot 
me on the breast press!

You follow Brad over to the weightlifting 
bench, standing behind it ready to grab the
bar if necessary.

You have to rest your massive chest on top of
the bar to get close enough, but you don't
think Brad minds.

Not that you can see her face with your
ridiculous chest pillows lying between you.

Player Brad:
Okay, here we go.

She grabs the bar and sets herself.

Player Brad:
And...

She heaves the weights off the bench with
one practiced motion.\!
And is barely able to slow them as they drop,
squeezing her breasts out heavily to the sides.

Player Brad:
Grmph\..\..\..\..\!
Urg\..\..\..\..\!
A\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.A\.A\.A\.A\.A\.AARg!

Struggling, panting and sweating, she\. ever\. so\.
slowly\.\. inches the weights back up.

Bit\.\.\.
By bit\.\.\.
By bit

Until she finally gets them back on the stand,
arms shaking like mad.

She clings to the bar, great heaving breaths
causing her chest to shake and quiver in her
overstretched shirt.

Player Brad:
I'm fine.\!
I'm fine.

She pants heavily.

Player Brad:
C'mon Brad.\!
This is an easy weight.\!
I've done this tons of times.

You gotta keep going!\!
Just a few more!\!
For the gains!

She keeps trying to pysch herself up, clutching 
the bar, redfaced and panting.

Player Brad:
Just a little more energy.\!
Get the energy.\!
For the boobs!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
He's too busy lifting weights to talk.

Not too busy to grunt though.

You've never heard such a scornful grunt.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
The tits: bigger.\!
The grunt: still scornful.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:

This is how...

Weightlifter:
A real man lifts!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
This is how...

She carefully lowers the weights down.

Weightlifter:
A real man-

way.

Weightlifter:
-Lifts????

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
You sure you're in the right place?\!
This is a room for *serious* weightlifters.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p3

passages.content:
He's listening to headphones and doesn't

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:

Going\..\..\.. for\..\..\.. a new\..\..\.. record...

Weightlifter:
Hah! Four hundred pounds!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Hah! A new record!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1

Finally decided to talk to the top dog here?

I've got the biggest muscles, I lift the biggest

Still top dog!\!

Weightlifter:
One, two, three, four...

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
She's doing arm curls.

Weightlifter:
One, two, three, four...

Weightlifter:
What are you staring at?

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Hey, they store the girly weights down the
hall.

You should go check those out.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2

Doesn't that chick over there know there's

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p3

This\..\..\.. is what a *real*\..\..\.. workout\..\..\..

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1

Form is so important on these things to not

And there we go!\!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1

Call me-\.\.\. *huff*-\.\.\. a bit of an ass, but-\.\.\.

Weightlifter:
.......\!
(Did I set the weight too high?)

100!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Weight obstacle — p1
passages.content:
A dumbbell lies here, blocking the way 
forward.

You pick it up and move it out of the way.

You tug and strain, but the weight refuses
to move.

You try to pretend like no one in the room is
laughing at you.

Emotional damage taken!

If only you were stronger...

Weightlifter:
Hey, watch out, stepping on dumbbells is 
dangerous.

A weight turns under your foot!

You barely manage to keep your balance.

Weightlifter:
Just move the stupid thing!

He pulls the weight away.

You trip and slam your head into the ground.

If only you were more agile...

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Weight obstacle — p1
passages.content:
A dumbbell lies here, blocking the way 
forward.

You pick it up and move it out of the way.

to move.

Weightlifter:

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Get out of here if you're not here to lift.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p3
passages.content:
Brad is still lying here, panting and sweating.

Player Brad:
You can do it.\!
Just, get the energy.\!
Just a few more reps.

She strains at the bar for a moment.
It starts to rise, ever so slowly\..\..\..\..\..
Then drops back to the rack after barely half 
an inch.

She slumps back down.

Player Brad:
Whoa!

She lifts the bar and does a smooth pushup,
bouncing it off her boobs at the bottom.

Player Brad:
I dunno what you did, but thanks bro!

She does a few more reps, quickly and 
easily.

Player Brad:
Time to get those gains!

...\!
Is weightlifting supposed to make her glow
like that?

She starts to crackle with electricity, growing
with each movement, until lightning arcs from 
her and hits you right in the chest!

But you have no time to focus on the warmth
it leaves behind, Brad is continuing to charge.

Electricity arcs across the room.

And again.

And again.

Smiling happily, Brad does one last rep and 
racks the bar.

Player Brad:
Now that's a workout!

Around her the room has fallen into a 
(literally) shocked silence.

The only sound is the ripping noise as her poor
shirt finally gives up.

Player Brad:
No thanks bro, now's not the time to hydrate.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p4
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Thanks for the help bro!

She smiles down at herself.

Player Brad:
Did you see my shirt burst?\!
That was awesome!

I gotta figure out what I'm gonna try next.

Can't weightlift two days in a row, you gotta
mix up your training for best gains.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p5
passages.content:
Looks like there's finally a weightlifting station
free. You could probably get in a few reps.\!
Give it a try?

You load a few weights on the bar and lie 
back.

A quick heave pulls the bar off the rack, then
smoothly down and up.\|
Then another rep.

Yeah, you hit just the sweet spot on the 
weight. Bar goes up, bar goes down, and 
you're getting that pleasant burn of effort
in your arms and your chest.

Especially in your chest, actually.

It's a very familiar warmth.\!
You're not even surprised when you start to 
feel a little more resistance against your chest
at the bottom of your lift.

Warmth and tingling, now.\!
And is your chest shaking a little bit more 
with each movement?

...Right, this was the weight bench Brad
used.\!
You probably should have seen this coming.

The thing is, you're only halfway through your
set.\!
Do you keep going?

Of course you keep going, this is just another
type of gains.\!
And you have to finish the whole set, you need
that power!

So you keep pumping the weights, even as you
seen your chest jiggle more and more in the 
bottom of your vision.

That was a good workout!\!
ATK +5!

Nope, you are done with this!\!
You rack the bar and get out.

You still got some gains, even if you ended
early.\!
ATK +2!

You decide exercise can wait.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p6
passages.content:
She's pumping the bar up and down, breasts 
shaking wildly as she does.

Weightlifter:
Hah!\!
This is the perfect weight set!

Look at me! I'm getting so pumped up!

Your eyes may be fooling you, but you could
swear her breasts are slowly swelling as she 
goes...

Weightlifter:
Back off!\!
I'm getting all the gains here!

You get the feeling you won't be getting to
lift weights here anytime soon.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
His shirt says "DO YOU EVEN LIFT?"

He grunts at you.

He doesn't seem interested in talking to 
someone who doesn't lift.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Her DO YOU EVEN LIFT? shirt is looking a lot
different now.\!
And doing a lot more lifting.

passages.name: Yoga room — Sleeping
passages.content:
Huh, this is an interesting pose. It's hard to
tell what she might be stretching, though it
does look very relaxing.

Instructor:
STAND TO ATTENTION, WARRIOR!

Instructor:
Jane!\!
We've discussed this!\!
Napping in class is unacceptable!

passages.name: Yoga room — Instructor — p1
passages.content:
Instructor:
A new recruit?!\!
WELCOME TO YOGA CLASS.

Instructor:
FREE EXERCISE, CLASS!\!
Choose a pose and stick to it!

Instructor:
You're in luck!\!
Today we have an open mat for trying out THE
BEST EXERCISE POSSIBLE!

Strength!\!
Flexibility!\!
YOU WILL BE SWOL.

Instructor:
And not just that, yoga is also an exercise of 
DEEP SPIRTUALITY.

We're not just stretching, we're CHANNELING
THE ENERGY OF THE WORLD.

...Feels like we've been channeling a lot more
of that energy recently, for some reason.

But REGARDLESS.\!
Look around. See what everyone is doing. 
FIND THE EXERCISE THAT SPEAKS MOST TO 
YOU.

Then go to your mat and we will DO YOGA.

Your glasses click on.

Kaede:
Well.\!
'Tis a bit unorthodox, but any form of power 
might aid us 'gainst the dark goddess.

passages.name: Yoga room — Instructor — p2
passages.content:
Instructor:
Talk to everyone!\!
SEE THE WONDERS THAT YOGA HAS TO 
SHOW.

Then go to the empty mat when you want to
try one out!

passages.name: Yoga room — Instructor — p3
passages.content:
Instructor:
Welcome back!\!
We don't have any empty mats today, but 
you're welcome to watch!

passages.name: Yoga room — Cat pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
Yes... right... there...

She drops out of her pose as she notices you
watching.

Yoga Student:
What. What are you looking at?

She licks the back of one hand and starts 
using it to brush back her hair.

Yoga Student:
My cat pose is very elegant, but that's no 
reason to stare.

Instructor:
WHO IS A KITTY.

Kaede:
I seest little use in this one.

\n[2]:
Though you would look cute with cat ears!

\n[2]:
Especially when you can have cat ears 
whenever you want!

passages.name: Yoga room — Cow pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
There's something just so relaxing about cow
pose.

She moos softly in contentment.

Kaede:
Ah, a mighty form indeed! Like the minotaurs
of old!\!
A strong choice indeed Hero \n[10]!

passages.name: Yoga room — Jacko pose
passages.content:
Instructor:
THE CLASSIC-\!
I... don't recognize that pose.

Dalia! Are you memeing again?\!
No memeing in class!

passages.name: Yoga room — Empty mat — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Hero \n[10]! It dost seem that there art a few
poses that might help us with our trials.

I wouldst say that the noble cow pose and the
hottest of yoga stood far above the rest.\!
Which wouldst thou choose?

You get down on your hands and knees and 
arch your back. 

Instructor:
Yes!\!
You have assumed the pose, recruit!

As you settle in, you can feel yourself relax.\!
Your muscles start to stretch.\!
Your\..\..\..\.. chest start to tingle?

Ah, that was relaxing!

Mmmmm, yes.

You bite your lip and squeeze your arms 
together, making sure to push your chest at
the instructor.

You bend down for a big stretch, making sure
to give your classmates a wonderful view of
your ass.

Then sit down and spread your legs *super*
wide to the room, giving them all an inviting
smile.

That really does warm you up!

A portion of that heat seems to settle 
permanently between your legs.

Yeah, no.\!
You can see where this is going and you
refuse.

Instead you get the instructor to run you 
through some boring regular stretches and
exercises.

AGI +2!
ATK +2!

You don't feel like you've yogot a yogreat
idea yet. Better keep looking.

// Also mountain pose?

passages.name: Yoga room — Empty mat — p2
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
I'm a good yoga student!

She wags her tail happily.

Instructor:
Tiffany!\!
It's DOWNWARDS-FACING dog!

Stop looking up!

passages.name: Yoga room — Warrior pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
Know that it is an honor for a peasant such as

pose.

She sniffs.

Yoga Student:
Perhaps one day you too might attain such
elegance.

Kaede:
She truly ist the opposite of a warrior.\!
I think this shalt be a pass, hero.

\n[4]:
\}And we don't need two people who talk like
that.

passages.content:
Yoga Student:
I'm working on fish pose!

\n[2]:
...\!

passages.name: Yoga room — Mountain pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:

Boulders have *nothing* on me.

Kaede:

GROW HEAVY THINGS!

Your companion coughs.

Kaede:
I must tender mine apologies, hero.\!
I knowest not what came over me.

She looks consideringly at the yoga student.

Kaede:
Yes, she dost look most soft.\! 
And most comfortable.\!
And sexy.

And-

She shakes her head.

Kaede:
Anyway. Anyway.\!
'Twould be a fine form to take, most pleasing
to the goddess.

But methinks it shouldst wait until the trial
before us ist resolved.

...Perhaps we might return then.

passages.name: Yoga room — Eagle
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
Check out my eagle pose!

She flaps her wings.

Kaede:
A fine and noble form. Why-

\n[4]:
Nope.

Kaede:
Pardon?

\n[4]:
We already have fuzzbrain, there's no way

Vetoed.

passages.content:

Yoga Student:
Why hello there.

She licks her lips.

Yoga Student:
I'm doing hot yoga.

She winks at you, shifting position to better

Yoga Student:
Like what you see?

Kaede turns to you.\!
Though you can see her eyes still keep 
darting to the student's ass.

Kaede:
A strong contender.\!
The subtle arts canst accomplish much that
force cannot.

\n[4]:
Of course *you* would consider this subtle,
fuzzbrain.

passages.name: Yoga room — Cat pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
Hey, so this is chair pose.

Yoga Student:
I don't feel like I'm getting much out of it.

Kaede:
I must agree, methinks this one hast little
use.

\n[2]:
Looks comfy though!

passages.name: Yoga room — Eagle
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
I've gotten so much more flexible since I 
started doing cobra pose!\!
Yoga is so great!

Kaede:
Hmm, there art impressive things that canst
be done with such a form, but most art
unsuited for the battlefield.

passages.name: Beach — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
You're blinded by sunlight as you walk through
the door.

But you can hear the cries of gulls.\!
Feel sand shift under your feet.\!
Smell the salt in the air.

Wherever you are, it's definitely a beach.

Kaede squints at something out in the water.

Kaede:
Dost mine eyes deceive me?!

Kaede:
It canst not be!

Kaede:
Yet it is!

Kaede:
Hero! Dost thou remember how I gave mine
word to show you the wonder and glory of
the goddesses?

Well behold! If mine vision does speak truly,
then before us lies the great temple once
built to honor all the goddesses, in all their
magnificence!

You squint.\!
There does seem to be something out in the
water.

The tops of a few towers barely poke up 
above the waves.

Kaede:
Why, it was thought forever lost!\!
Foul knavery from enemies of all that is good
sunk it beneath the waves.

Kaede:
Or wert it an argument between the 
goddesses that had an unfortunate victim?

Kaede:
Or the great Boobpocalypse of '47?

It matters not! All that is important is how
blessed we art to find it!

'Tis where the greatest minds of the ages 
gathered to offer their praise and gratitude
towards our divine protectors.

The art...\!
The tales...\!
The blessed artifacts...

All wonders that couldst never even be 
imagined by those foolish mountebanks that
thou believes stand above us all.

Come, if the sights to be seen dost not 
convince thee of the truth of the great 
goddesses' existence then thou art deaf, 
blind and dumb!

Kaede:
Ah, it has been many an age since I last
feasted mine gaze upon such beauty.\!
Let us make haste! 'Tis but a walk away!

She strides forward, vanishing underwater.

\n[2]:
We get to see ancient artifacts?\!
Forgotten lore?\!
Aquatic wildlife?!?!

Come on \n[10], let's go!

She submerges.

\n[4] shares a look with you.

\n[4]:
Maybe something there will help fuzzbrain see
reason.\!
\}I knew telling her was going to be a pain.

She sighs.

\n[4]:
No way out but forward, I guess.

She walks out into the ocean.

Well.\!
You watch

passages.name: Beach — Autoplay — p3
passages.content:
Kaede:
Worry not about the goddesses.\!
I shalt ensure they art informed of our plans.\!
\..\..\..and the truth of the world.

But for now, let us return to thy domicile.\!
I find myself in much need of rest.

passages.name: Beach — Florauna — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Oh hero, I so look forward to seeing what 
swimsuit you bring me! 

You can tell so much about a person from 
what they wear. Are you going to be sporty,
or sexy? What colors are you going to choose?

What have you brought me?

// 1 = generic, 3 = micro, 4 = trunks, 5 = store

Florauna frowns down at the swimsuit.

Goddess Florauna:
Ugh.

She looks back up at you.

Goddess Florauna:
No no darling, it's all fine!\!
It's just...\.\. did you *have* to go for 
something so *plain*?

She sighs.

Goddess Florauna:
No, no, I'm sure it's fine.\!
We all have our own sense of style.

And some people will cling to theirs even when
an actual goddess tells them it's too boring.

She forces a smile onto her face.

Goddess Florauna:
Regardless, you have brought me a swimsuit
as requested and will have my blessing!

Goddess Florauna:
Ooo, what a daring little number!\!
Hero, I never knew you had it in you!

She raises up the tiny scraps of cloth.

They burst into a spray of light, drifting out
over the beach to the east.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh darling, I can't wait to see what this seed
will grow!

Florauna glances at your chest.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh, now this is a statement.

Daring!\!
Sexy!\!
Transgressive!

Darling, I just love it!

Florauna nods knowingly.

Goddess Florauna:
Ah, darling hero, still trying to cling on to
something?

She dramatically presses her hand to her 
chest.

Goddess Florauna:
Far be it from me to interfere!\!
All things will blossom in time.

She raises up the swimtrunks.

They burst into a spray of light, drifting out
over the beach to the east.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh darling, I can't wait to see what this seed
will grow!

Goddess Florauna:
Ooo, Hero \n[10], such a fascinating
choice!

It looks normal, but there's something about
it...

She raises up the swimsuit.

It begins to glow.

Brighter.

And brighter.

And then the light all focuses on *you*.

Sudden massive pleasure burns in your chest.

You collapse forward with a moan, too 
ov

passages.name: Beach — Florauna — p2
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Such a delight to work with you, Hero.\!
Now my sisters' tasks await!

passages.name: Beach — Florauna — p3
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Darling Hero! I'm so impressed you
completed all our tasks!

The time has come to answer your prayers!

The other goddesses gather around Florauna.

Goddess Florauna:
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here to
witness the union of a hero and a blessing.

Such a union is a joyous thing, a cause for
great celebration...

As Florauna continues to praise the 
"new pairing", a thought occurs to you.

You lean over to Kaede.

Florauna is really getting into her speech. But
even if she's describing this ritual as a "sacred
joining", the blessing isn't an actual person,
right?

Kaede chuckles.

Kaede:
Nay Hero \n[10], 'tis but a portion of our
Lady's grace.

She merely enjoys a touch of ceremony from
time to time.

And truly, is it not a fine chance to rest for a
nonce?

We hast spent so much time rushing hither
and yon, and I canst see how much wear it
hast put on thee and thy companions!

We shalt fight all the harder if we but take a
moment to relax.\!
Breathe.\!
Pause and count our blessings.

She looks over at Florauna.

Kaede:
...One.

She gives a satisfied nod.

Kaede:
That truly was refreshing!

Florauna seems to come to the end of this
part of her speech.\!
She raises her hands.

Goddess Florauna:
Sisters!\!
The time for judgement has come! 

Please, grant me thy wisdom. Is this mortal
worthy of our blessing?

Goddess Hadea:
The mortal has completed my task.

I couldn't have done better myself. They'll go
far with that sort of business sense.

And shown themselves to be utter morons
when it comes to business.\!
That's still better than most heroes can 
manage.

They're...

She shrugs.

Goddess Hadea:
Okay?\!
I'm just saying, we don't pick heroes for their
brains.

They are worthy.

Goddess Fittina:
They totally did what I asked!

They proved themselves full of heart!\!
And chest!

They didn't win, but there's always next time
dude!

Totally worthy!

// 1 = generic, 3 = micro, 4 = trunks, 5 = store

Goddess Florauna:
And I-\!
Well...

She pouts.

Godd

passages.name: Beach — Florauna — p4
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Good luck Hero \n[10]!

And remember the first rule of diving: don't
surface too fast or you'll get the curves!

\n[2]:
Um, excuse me Goddess, but do you mean 
the bends?

Goddess Florauna:
Oh, probably!

passages.name: Beach — Hadea — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Hero \n[10], you must commune with the
spirits!

And serve them to mortals in exchange for
currency.

Seek a white-haired woman in the back of the
beach, far from the ocean.

passages.name: Beach — Hadea — p2
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Hero \n[10], I sensed that you have spent
your time communing with the spirits!

A decent job, though somewhat unsanitary.\!
But at least your customers had a happy
ending!

I can see that my sister of blossoming has
found her place in your heart.

Which is fine, sure, but she has her *own*
task. She shouldn't interfere in mine!

She scowls at Kaede.

Goddess Hadea:
You're a bad influence.

Kaede scoffs.

Kaede:
'Tis not mine fault that the glories of vastness
wert so self-evidently true to the hero.

I'm sure your customers will enjoy their new
forms.\!
Normal humans can be so boring, I agree.

Goddess Hadea:
You have proven yourself worthy of my
blessing.

Speak to Florauna and we can finally get this
ritual over with.

But my sisters' tasks still remain before we
can be bothered to grant you passage beneath
the waves.

passages.name: Beach — Hadea — p3
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Good job \n[10], you've completed my
task and the others.

Go talk to Florauna to get the ritual started
and we can all get on with our lives.

Goddess Hadea:
Good job with the spirits.\!
Ah, I love to see a business taking off.

passages.name: Beach — Hadea — p4
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Underwater is like a stupider, less interesting
underworld.

Enjoy I guess.

\n[4]:
At least fish should be less frustrating than
trying to organize spirits...

Dude, have you communed with volleyball

Goddess Fittina:
Don't worry about losing dude, that's just how

Just do a few reps of that every day and I'm

Oh, and Florauna's been working on that

Go check it out!

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer — p2

passages.name: Earth room ARG 2 — Earth — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Earth:
Hello Hero. The extra space that just arrived
has let me summon some help to take a look
around.

And...

What have you people DONE to your planet?!

We leave you alone for a few millenia and you
fill the atmosphere with carbon dioxide, of all
things?

And what's this I hear about microplastics? 
Or the ozone layer?

She rubs her face tiredly.

Goddess Earth:
Ugh. This is going to need so much looking 
into.

What can I do for you in the meantime?

Goddess Earth:
This is such a mess.\!
What do you want.

Fine.

You feel over your body as the sensations
fade. Did something change this time?

Earth:
*Laughs nervously* I'm sure that was nothing.
Maybe it's just lingering essence from the belt.

Anyway, I don't know how you'll get stronger
if you don't absorb the powers of your 
equipment.  You'll need that power to find my
sisters.

And I don't think you'll be able to find your
dick wizard without it either.

And besides, what's the worst that could 
happen?

Goddess Earth:
Would you like to merge something else?

I need raw mana first.

You try to explain about progress, and the
tragedy of the commons, and the bigger
tragedy of rich assholes, and...

Goddess Earth:
Fine. Fine!\!
Go about your hero business. I'll look into
this... this...

She flails angrily.

Goddess Earth:
This MESS.

No wonder you people have made such a 
mess of your planet, you haven't had any
goddesses to watch over you!

I'm glad you finally managed to remedy that.\!
\}So much work to do.

Fine.

You feel over your body as the sensations
fade. Did something change this time?

Maybe it's just lingering essence from the belt.

Anyway, I don't know how you'll get stronger
if you don't absorb the powers of your 
equipment.  You'll need that power to find my

And I don't think you'll be able to find your

And besides, what's the worst that could 
happen?

passages.content:
\}Goddess Earth:\.\.

Goddess Earth:
Hero, what happened up there?!

Goddess Florauna:
I felt a great disturbance.\!
As if thousands of voices suddenly cried out
in orgasm, then went silent.

Well, most of them went silent.\!
Some are discussing going another round.\!
Some rolled over and went to sleep.

One is still going and I am SO\. IMPRESSED\.
with their stamina.

Earth coughs.

Goddess Earth:
Yes, we all felt a disturbance.\!
Something major has changed in the world.\!
What happened?

You explain, as best as you can.\!
The new being and her plans for the world.

Goddess Earth:
Oh dear. This may be the awakening of a new
dark goddess.

We will need time to figure out if there is 
anything that can be done.\!
Return to us tomorrow Hero and we may have
an answer for you.

passages.name: Earth room ARG 2 — Autoplay event — p4
passages.content:
You arrive in Earth's room to see all the
goddesses have gathered again.

Goddess Earth:
\N[10]! It is good to see you again!\!
The new dark goddess has not been idle.

Goddess Florauna:
I sensed her spread her power out over town
last night.\!

She has changed something. Maybe many 
things.

Goddess Hadea:
Now, on the down side, she's reshaping your
reality to fit her whims, like a child might 
play with clay.

She chuckles.

All the rules you've lived your life by could be
warped in an instant. \!
Your whole world could become 
unrecognizable!

Earth glares at her.

Goddess Earth:
Except we determined she didn't have *that*
much power. \!
Surface changes, not fundamental.

And her power is limited too.\!
Whatever she did last night weakened the
barrier she summoned to protect herself.\!
Just a little, but it shows her power is finite.

Goddess Florauna:
So darling, your path is clear!\!
Just bait out more changes from her, and 
she'll expose herself!

Goddess Earth:
She's stirring up the spiritual environment too,
which may reveal more of our sisters.

If you free them, we could combine our power
to help break the barrier.

Florauna licks her lips.

Goddess Florauna:
And then you can strike for her unguarded 
core.\!
Strike deep, and hard, and long...

Earth clears her throat pointedly.

Goddess Earth:
Also, don't worry about the people she 
changes.

As far as we can tell, for a dark goddess, her
changes are surprisingly\..\..\.. friendly, for
lack of a better word.

All her changes are something the subject
actually wanted, deep down inside.\!
Or something they'd enjoy once they tried it.

Or at worst, something that they wouldn't find 
more than mildly inconvenient.

Hadea smirks at you.

Goddess Hadea:
Which raises some questions, Ms. 
I-Want-The-Dick.

Goddess Earth:
She does seem to have a grudge against you
in particular.

Earth claps her hands together.

Goddess Earth:
So!\! Hero \N[10], your path is clear!\!
Drain this new dark goddess's power, and save

THEY KNOW ABOUT.

passages.name: Arcade — Vending machine
passages.content:
You scan through the vending machine's 
offerings.

passages.name: Arcade — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Nothing looks off when you enter the arcade.

This...\!
This just looks like a normal game of Tetris.

A little old, but still in good condition and
running fine.

You hit the start button.

Game Cabinet:
Welcome to-

An image suddenly appears on the screen.

Goddess Arcadia:
\{\{\{YOU.

How dare you.

I'm doing everything I can to make you and
every other human happy, slaving away to 
make sure the world is just perfect, and you're
PLAYING OTHER GAMES?!?!

She sniffs, lip quivering.

Goddess Arcadia:
I'm trying so hard! And you're not even
paying attention???

She pulls herself back up, glaring.

Goddess Arcadia:
Well it won't work!

Part of making you happy is keeping you from
being distracted by dumb unsexy boring 
games that can't even talk.\!
There's nothing for you here!

Hmph!

That's fine.\!
This is fine.

You really aren't craving tetris so much that 
you'd anger a dark goddess for it.

So how about everyone just turn around and
leave and it'll all be good-

Kaede:
Aha! It seems yon dark goddess thinks she
might make a japery of us!\!
Pull the wool uponst our eyes!

\n[4]:
What are you *talking about*, furbrain?!

Kaede:
Canst thou not see?
Her cunning and vile plan?

Kaede:
Oh Hero \n[10], not even thou hast
managed to divine it?

'Tis truly a blessing of the Goddesses 
themselves that I art here to avert disaster!

Kaede:
Hero, think! What ist the root of all our woes?\!
A video game!

The dark goddess sprang from such a shell,
ripe with malice and scheming!

She gestures widely to the building around
you.

Kaede:
And nowst we come to a place full of the 
vile things. 

If a single game, unguided, canst hatch a new 
dark goddess, what might a brace of them do
when she ist left free to work her evil ways
upon them?

Already each of these hutches mightest hold 
a dozen eggs of dark potential, fertilized by
her evil scheming!

Arcadia sputters.

Goddess Arcadia:
You're implying I did *WHAT*?!\!
With these inferior-

Kaede:
Thou putest up a fine facade indeed

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
The screen just shows a picture of Arcadia
scowling at you.

Her eyes follow you around the room.

Kaede:
The dark goddess hast truly hidden her 
schemes well, I sense naught present.

OKAY THIS ONE HAS SOME BOOBS BUT IT'S
STILL NOT NEARLY ENOUGH.

Kaede:
Dost this hint that she hast hidden her 
darkness within a more boobful container?\!
'Tis not here.

CARS AREN'T SEXY EITHER.\!
OKAY SOME PEOPLE SEEM TO HAVE A WEIRD
THING ABOUT THEM BUT IT'S STILL NOT AS
GOOD AS SEX.

Kaede:
'Tis apparent yon goddess dost not desire
such conveyances either.\!
No darkness here.

passages.content:
It's a prize machine!\!
Thank goodness it takes BE Bucks, you were
worried you'd have to play a ton of minigames
to get anything.

The screen just shows a picture of Arcadia

Her eyes follow you around the room.

Nothing here.\!
We art so close to the end, where else might
the goddess have hidden her schemes?

passages.name: Arcade — UFO Catcher
passages.content:
Oh hey, a UFO catcher!\!
Give it a try?

You catch a whole bunch of aliens!

These things are never worth it.
